Roles & Responsibilities: Lead the design, implementation, and maintenance of highly available and scalable systems. Monitor and troubleshoot production issues, ensuring timely resolution and minimal downtime. Automate manual processes to improve system efficiency and reduce human error. Develop and maintain documentation for system architecture, processes, and procedures. Professional & Technical Skills: Must To Have Skills:Strong experience in Site Reliability Engineering. Good To Have Skills:Experience with DevOps. Experience with cloud infrastructure, such as AWS or Azure. Experience with automation tools, such as Ansible or Puppet. Strong understanding of networking and security principles. Experience with monitoring and logging tools, such as Nagios or ELK stack. Additional Information: The candidate should have a minimum of 5 years of experience in Site Reliability Engineering. The ideal candidate will possess a strong educational background in computer science or a related field, along with a proven track record of delivering reliable and scalable systems. This position is based at our Hyderabad office. Qualification Any graduate

column2: Project Role : Program/Project Management Lead Project Role Description : Lead business and technology outcomes for assigned program, project, or contracted service. Leverage standard tools, methodologies and processes to deliver, monitor, and control service level agreements.  Must have skills : Program Project Management Good to have skills : NA Minimum  7.5  year(s) of experience is required Educational Qualification : As per Organization Standards Summary :The SAP - IBP is a demand planning project in MSC space. We need to have a Senior Level Project Manager who has expertise in SAP integration projects. We are looking for candidate having more than 15 years of experience and preferably in Planning space. Looking for a Senior Project Manager with experience in SAP - ERP space.  Ensures that all requirements are agreed and documented and are managed effectively through the full project lifecycle. Engages with stakeholders to identify and analyze potential risk scenarios, plan risk responses and mitigating actions, and monitor/control risks for the project. Identifies appropriate responsible owner(s) for each risk. Keeps sponsors and other key stakeholders informed of risk status. Identifies and implements project quality requirements, standards, measures, and processes. Ensures mandatory reviews and audits are conducted on schedule and according to procedure, and initiates reviews or solicits outside opinions when project deliverables or parameters have a risk of being compromised. Implements resultant recommendations to address shortcomings. Creates a motivated high-performing team through team building, information sharing, workload management, and appropriate recognition. Delegates meaningful tasks to team members and coaches them so that they develop or enhance their skills. Balances execution efficiency with risk mitigation and value delivery. Exercises good judgment regarding when and how to escalate issues. Plan for and acquire resources (Shell and/or third party, with preference given to low-cost locations), materials and services to ensure success of the project, using standard Shell processes and tools (e.g. Resource Management). Monitors the performance of resources or services and adjusts the resource plan and procurement approach as project needs change. Establishes and maintains appropriate Governance structures and procedures to obtain resources, drive decisions, resolve issues, and deliver project/programme objectives. Monitors the governance and acts when required to address ineffective stakeholder representation, improve timeliness or quality of decisions, or broker consensus or compromise among conflicting stakeholders. Partners with the Business Interface to identify, measure, and track planned vs. achieved benefits. Assigns responsibility and accountability for the realization of benefits to ensure that the benefits can be sustained. Understands, articulates and applies the terminology, metrics, and calculations relevant to business specific measures and KPIs, such as return on investment (ROI), stakeholder value, benefits realization and capability improvement. Leads Shell IT's largest and most complex projects and programmes with a focus on value and strategic outcomes. Identifies, assesses and addresses the major factors, assumptions and risks (including technical, business, adoption, organizational, government, cultural, etc.) that may influence project/programme direction and success. As parameters and external influences change, adjusts the project/programme approach to improve the delivery of intended benefits. Leverages the programme to offer staff development and to grow both individual and collective project and programme management capability. Uses creative costing and business models to capitalize on greater lever age power (e.g. award or penalty contracts instead of standard execution measurement contracts). Prioritizes and adjusts resources, activities, and schedules across projects and programme to balance risk and effort between strategic business change and ongoing operations. Optimizes resource allocation based on organizational priorities, capacity, skills, and development needs, exploiting. the Resource Management tool and taking advantage of cross-business sharing wherever possible. Assesses changes in risk and scope throughout the project to reduce contingency (both cost and schedule) and predict Latest Estimate. Coaches individuals and groups on advanced project and programme management principles and techniques, particularly entrepreneurial skills such as estimating, risk management, stakeholder partnership, decision making, and team leadership. Champions the development of long-term Project and Programme Management capability within Shell through bringing external perspectives, identifying and promoting best practices and contributing to community building.Proficiency Levels Training Curriculum Qualification As per Organization Standards

Must have skills : Program Project Management Good to have skills : NA Minimum  12  year(s) of experience is required Educational Qualification : As per the Organization Standards Summary :As a Program/Project Management Lead, you will be responsible for leading business and technology outcomes for assigned programs, projects, or contracted services. Your typical day will involve leveraging standard tools, methodologies, and processes to deliver, monitor, and control service level agreements.  Roles & Responsibilities: Lead the planning and execution of programs, projects, or contracted services, ensuring alignment with organizational goals and objectives. Develop and maintain project plans, schedules, budgets, and resource allocation plans, tracking progress and ensuring timely delivery of milestones. Collaborate with cross-functional teams, including business stakeholders, technical teams, and vendors, to ensure successful project delivery. Manage project risks and issues, developing mitigation strategies and contingency plans as needed. Communicate project status, risks, and issues to stakeholders, providing regular updates and ensuring alignment with project goals and objectives. Professional & Technical Skills: Must To Have Skills:Strong experience in Program and Project Management. Good To Have Skills:Experience in Agile methodologies, Change Management, and Risk Management. Excellent leadership, communication, and stakeholder management skills. Strong analytical and problem-solving skills, with the ability to make data-driven decisions. Experience in managing large, complex programs or projects with multiple workstreams and stakeholders. Solid understanding of project management tools and methodologies, including Waterfall and Agile approaches. Additional Information: The candidate should have a minimum of 12 years of experience in Program and Project Management. The ideal candidate will possess a strong educational background in business, engineering, or a related field, along with a proven track record of delivering successful programs and projects. This position is based at our Bengaluru office. Qualification As per the Organization Standards
column11: project management, project / program management, stakeholder management, waterfall, project management tools, risk management, mitigation, management skills, change management, budgeting, resource allocation, project delivery, agile, agile methodology

column2: Skill required:  Project Management - Program Project Management Designation:  Associate Manager Qualifications: Any Graduation,12th/PUC/HSC  Years of Experience: 10-14 Years  Language - Ability: English - Proficient; Hindi - Proficient  What would you do? You will be aligned with our Insights & Intelligence vertical and help us generate insights by leveraging the latest Artificial Intelligence (AI) and Analytics techniques to deliver value to our clients. You will also help us apply your expertise in building world-class solutions, conquering business problems, addressing technical challenges using AI Platforms and technologies. You will be required to utilize the existing frameworks, standards, patterns to create architectural foundation and services necessary for AI applications that scale from multi-user to enterprise-class and demonstrate yourself as an expert by actively blogging, publishing research papers, and creating awareness in this emerging area. You will be working as a part of the Digital Marketing team to understand and help clients market their products or services using digital technologies, mainly on the internet, but also including mobile phone apps, display advertising, e-commerce/online shopping website, and any other digital medium. The team also leverages popular tools such as Adobe Creative Suite, Workfront Work Management Software, HTML, Javascript, Atlassian Jira, etc. In this role, you will be responsible for improving a piece of writing whether short or long-form, to fit the marketing or communication channel and medium where the writing will be used. This includes enhancing the story flow such as clarity, readability, Accenture/Client brand voice, tone, grammar, word choice, storytelling, etc. You will also assess and question the statements and assertions, flags omissions, check facts and accuracy, and restructures as needed. You will also help write original and engaging copy for a range of product categories across digital and print, adhering to the tone of voice guidelines specified by category/brand. What are we looking for? Ability to establish strong client relationship  Ability to handle disputes  Ability to manage multiple stakeholders  Ability to meet deadlines  Ability to perform under pressure  Roles and Responsibilities: In this role you are required to do analysis and solving of moderately complex problems  May create new solutions, leveraging and, where needed, adapting existing methods and procedures  The person would require understanding of the strategic direction set by senior management as it relates to team goals  Primary upward interaction is with direct supervisor  May interact with peers and/or management levels at a client and/or within Accenture  Guidance would be provided when determining methods and procedures on new assignments  Decisions made by you will often impact the team in which they reside  Individual would manage small teams and/or work efforts (if in an individual contributor role) at a client or within Accenture  Please note that this role may require you to work in rotational shifts Qualification Any Graduation,12th/PUC/HSC

column1: Principal Project Management Spec - Mobile App Projects
column2: SUMMARY OF POSITION The individual will work closely with the cross-functional project teams in MEIC and GBUs. Individual will lead Medium to high complexity breakthrough Software development projects through existing products improvements or new features implementation.  This position will play a vital role in growing business engagements & enabling value add through process improvements and adopting best practices. ESSENTIAL DUTIES AND RESPONSIBILITIES Performs duties as the leader of the project team. Develop and execute master project and engagement plans including schedules, budgets, and resources Accelerate and develop well-functioning Agile teams by facilitating daily Scrums, backlog refinement, identification of risks and ensuring teams are communicating with each other and enabled to own their commitments Responsible for facilitating the scrum process on scrum teams with cross-functional impacts that involve moderately complex project, non-project, or maintenance work. Uses empirical data to help the team(s) assess their Scrum Maturity, optimize scrum team velocity to organizational KPIs, and identify improvement opportunities to achieve higher levels of team performance. Proactively addresses systemic impediments to team agility and guides the team(s) on methods to escalate when needed to prevent challenges from becoming blockers. Coaches scrum team(s) to deliver capabilities using agile practices while also following the Software Development Lifecycle, business process mapping, and various release processes as appropriate to ensure all risk, security, and development requirements are met. Ensures conformance to design controls requirements per quality system. Define project resource requirements and negotiate team assignments with functional managers Plan, coordinate, track, communicate project activities / status Management of project budget and oversight of capital expenditures Develop and monitor risk mitigations plans to ensure business and project objectives are met Challenge functional groups to meet project goals and commitments Provide routine project status communications to project team, management and stake holders Ensure communication across MEIC and Global Business Units EXPERIENCE Minimum 13 years of relevant experience with 5+ years in project leadership role Hands on experience in Agile methodology is essential. ? Good to have project experience in enterprise software development project / mobile / Cloud application KNOWLEDGE, SKILL, AND ABILITY Familiarity with FDA Quality System Regulations (820.30 design controls), European Regulatory Requirements (ISO 13485), and specifically IEC-62304. Project management skills Track record of managing projects to schedule, Budget and scope Knowledge about burn down and burnup metrics, velocity, and user stories etc. Good hands on experience using Project management tools (e.g., MS Project, Visio, Jira, Confluence) Experience with Industry standard Project Management methodologies, frameworks (e.g., Agile, Waterfall, or SDLC), and processes Excellent interpersonal and influence management skills including evidence of managing multi-discipline teams Ability to effectively handle conflict through proactive action, and direct and timely communication Experience in managing teams with a diverse cultural background Strong written, verbal, and presentation skills Ensure that the Project Design History File is current and accurate and manage documentation and communication needs for the project, ensuring all regulatory standards are met (e.g. project SharePoint). Support Core Team meetings by preparing the agenda, project updates, taking meeting minutes. Effective planning and organization skills including the proven ability to work against multiple objectives simultaneously Prepare audience specific reports and communications Excellent knowledge of Microsoft Office products EDUCATION Bachelor in Engineering/ B TECH ?Computer Science, Software Engineering, or related Engineering field ? PMP certification & Certified ScrumMaster
column11: Agile Methodology, PMP, Project Management, Mobile Applications, Mobile App Projects, Application Development Projects, Agile

column2: The Project Manager will be responsible for managing the end-to-end delivery of key network automation software projects; spanning supporting pre-sales activities through to development, client acceptance and support. They will be accountable for maintaining and improving the project profitability baseline for automation projects, while maintaining quality, disciplined execution practices, and customer satisfaction.            Impact       Impact is short-term through individual and team contributions. Scope is primarily within own subject area in a function/unit. Actions and errors impact on program, project or function. Provides measurable input into new products, processes, standards or operational plans in support of the organisations business strategies, with some impact on business unit/ function overall results.       Scope & Contribution       Individual Contributor: Operates autonomously in own subject area. Can analyze, develop and implement concepts and solutions as a subject matter expert. Increased awareness of and involvement outside of own subject area. Distills big picture. Makes decisions about and prioritizes own work. Managerial/Supervisory: Clear managerial responsibilities for people. Typically first level of solid line management. Interprets policies. Ensures existing plans are put into operation. Executes and/or oversees processes to meet customer needs. Responsible for analysis, design & development of policies, plans, programs.        Innovation       Carries out specialised activities/projects according to general direction. Influences others to support decisions. Works mostly independently. Analyze situations or data that requires review of relevant factors. Solutions can often be checked and proved. Demonstrates success in multiple roles and is adaptable to manage complex changing business environments.       Communication       Communicates with parties within and outside of own job function and teams, and typically has responsibilities for communicating with parties external to the organisation, which may include customers or vendors.Works to influence others to accept job function s view/practices and agree/accept new concepts, practices, and approaches.Has cross-cultural knowledge and global mindset Requires ability to communicate with executive leadership regarding matters of significant importance to the organisation. May conduct briefings with senior leaders within the job function. May at times be required to negotiate regarding operational issues.       Knowledge & Experience         10+ years of experience in project management in the software industry          Experience managing client-facing engagements          Excellent client-facing and internal communication skills          Solid technical background with understanding and/or hands-on experience in software development and IP networks          Experience working with distributed delivery teams          Excellent written and verbal communication skills          Solid organizational skills including attention to detail and multi-tasking skills          Strong working knowledge of project management tools and best practices               Manage a variety of network automation projects; including custom software development projects and other network management -related engagements         Assist in the definition of project scope and objectives, involving all relevant stakeholders and ensuring technical feasibility          Coordinate internal resources and third parties/vendors for the execution of projects         Work with practice leads and technical primes to ensure resource availability and allocation          Ensure that all projects are delivered on-time, within scope and within budget         Develop a detailed project plan to monitor and track progress          Measure project performance: drive solutions to all risks, report and escalate to management as needed          Manage changes to the project scope, project schedule, and project costs using risk management techniques          Successfully manage the relationship with the client and all stakeholders          Establish and maintain relationships with customers, local Nokia account teams, and third parties/vendors          Create and maintain appropriate project documentation          Conduct post-project analysis and lessons-learned retrospectives to identify best practices and opportunities for improvement          Work with delivery managers to refine software project delivery process          Serve as an advisor; training, coaching, and mentoring peers to learn and apply standard framework, agile techniques, and best practices

column2: I-ERP is a multi-year program modernizing Finance and Purchasing business processes and applications to drive operational efficiency and material cost reduction by adopting industry-leading practices. I-ERP touches on several Ford+ Points including, but not limited to, Modernize Everywhere and Partner for Experience and Efficiency. column2: Summary of the Role: The Principal Project Management Specialist will closely collaborate with cross-functional project teams within MEIC and GBUs.  This role involves leading medium to high complexity breakthrough Mechanical development projects, focusing on existing product improvements or implementing new features and supply chain management.  The incumbent will be instrumental in fostering business engagements, enhancing value through process improvements, and adopting best practices. Essential Duties and Responsibilities: As a Principal Project Management Specialist at Medtronic, the individual will play a vital role in supporting the development and execution of strategic programs. Responsibilities include: Leading the planning, execution, and monitoring of strategic programs to ensure alignment with organizational objectives. Collaborating with cross-functional teams to define project scope, goals, and deliverables. Developing and maintaining detailed project plans, timelines, and resource allocation schedules. Conducting thorough analysis of program performance metrics, identifying trends, and providing actionable insights. Preparing and presenting regular progress reports, status updates, and recommendations to senior management and stakeholders. Proactively identifying risks, issues, and dependencies and developing mitigation strategies. Serving as a subject matter expert on program management best practices. Fostering a culture of collaboration, innovation, and continuous improvement within the program management team. Experience: Minimum of 13 years of relevant experience with at least 5 years in a project leadership role. Hands-on experience in Mechanical or Supply chain projects preferred. Hands-on experience in Agile methodology preferred. Project experience in mechanical, enterprise software development preferred. Knowledge, Skills, and Abilities: Familiarity with FDA Quality System Regulations, European Regulatory Requirements, and IEC-62304. Strong project management skills with a track record of managing projects to schedule, budget, and scope. Proficiency in project management tools (e.g., MS Project, Jira, Confluence). Experience with Agile, Waterfall, or SDLC methodologies and processes. Excellent interpersonal, influence management, and conflict resolution skills. Ability to manage teams with diverse cultural backgrounds. Strong written, verbal, and presentation skills. Effective planning and organization skills, including the ability to work against multiple objectives simultaneously. Proficiency in Microsoft Office products. Education: Master's degree preferred. Bachelor of Engineering in Mechanical, Electronics or related Engineering field. PMP certification and Certified ScrumMaster preferred.

column1: Oracle Cloud Project Manager ( Across India )
column2: LIFT Cloud IMPLEMENTATION Specialist About Oracle Cloud LIFT Services The secret of change is to focus your all your energy not on fighting the old, but on building the new.  If this is something that strikes a chord in you, read on   Oracle?? Cloud LIFT Services sit at the heart of Oracle Cloud Technology?? engagement with our customers. Our mission is to deliver customer?? workload deployment to OCI at velocity, in a simple and effective manner. We also focus on investment in enabling our customers to continue their Oracle Cloud journey with confidence.  LIFT is a multi-disciplinary team of experts operating at velocity, through qualification of opportunities, workload scoping, ??o??or ??o-go??decisions and ultimately delivery across multiple customers in parallel.  The LIFT program is made up of architects, cloud specialists, cloud implementation specialists and project managers. The LIFT Cloud Implementation team works in an international work environment in which you collaborate not only with customers across the EMEA region but also colleagues from various functions/ countries that all have the same goal of customer success. This team is ready to engage with our customers. Are you ready to be a key member of this team? Role Summary An experienced and results oriented professional to be an integral part of the Oracle LIFT organization as a Technical Project manager, managing all aspects of  delivery of LIFT delivery engagements, from managing customer stakeholders through to successful implementation:  Contributing to the Delivery planning and strategy, providing experiences / best practices.  Responsible for the delivery of the agreed Scope of workload implementation.  Assisting in testing of the implemented solution.  Perform Security Assurance Reviews.  Ensuring customer satisfaction Tell me more? Working as an implementer of LIFT projects you will be part of a versatile team of specialists. Collaborating with your peers, Workload Architects, Account Cloud Engineers as well as country-based Sales and Consulting teams will be critical to executing the delivery model.  On a day-to-day basis you will participate in either one or more concurrent engagements, to grow a cloud business for Oracle. Typical LIFT projects include migration & deployment in OCI of the following workloads: database, Oracle applications, reporting & analytics, custom applications / VMs, and some more.  You will be results oriented and focused on customer success. You are expected by our customers to be the best in your area of expertise. You will be focused on managing the delivery of high quality Cloud solutions with your technical or project management expertise. Your aim will be to create an outstanding experience for our customers. What does a LIFT delivery look like?  With opportunities provided by our cloud sales org, the LIFT Team will engage with the customer to ??npack??the business challenge and architectural scope into a delivery plan that we can align with the customer?? expectations. It is likely you will have already been in the loop with the customer during the ??ales cycle?? Once we have a deal signed with the customer, you will work with the customer and the wider LIFT Team to ensure we create a short sharp ??OW??delivery experience for our customers. What do I need to bring to the table? Be a leader, a ??oer?? with a vision & desire to contribute to a business with a technical project focus and mentality that centers around a superior customer experience. Bring entrepreneurial & innovative flair, with the tenacity to develop and prove delivery ideas independently, then share these as examples to improve the efficiency of the delivery of these solutions across EMEA.  Working effectively across internal, external and culturally diverse lines of business to define and deliver customer success. Good communication skills, both oral and written! You are able to      not only understand complex technologies but also to explain to others in      clear and simple terms. You can articulate key messages very clearly. Being able to present in front of customers. Proactive approach to the task and self-learner. Self-motivated, you have the natural drive to learn and pick up new challenges. Results orientation, you won?? be satisfied until the job is done with the right quality! Ability to work in (virtual) teams. To get a specific job done often requires working together with many colleagues spread out in different countries. Comfortable in a collaborative, agile environment. Ability to adapt to change with a positive mindset. Key responsibilities:  Plan, execute, and manage end-to-end Oracle Cloud migration      projects, adhering to established timelines and budgets. Define project scope, objectives, and deliverables, ensuring      alignment with stakeholders' requirements and expectations. Identify and mitigate project risks, proactively resolving issues      to maintain project momentum and quality. Serve as a primary point of contact for stakeholders, providing      regular updates on project progress, milestones, and dependencies. Collaborate with Oracle Cloud architects, engineers, and vendors to      optimize migration processes and ensure seamless integration with existing      systems. Conduct post-migration reviews and analysis to assess project      outcomes, identify areas for improvement, and facilitate continuous      optimization of migration methodologies. Maintain comprehensive documentation of project plans, technical      specifications, and migration procedures to support knowledge transfer and      future initiatives. Required skills: Solid technical background in IT infrastructure and application architectures. (Oracle, AWS, AZURE) Understanding of cloud computing technologies, business drivers, and emerging computing trends. Understanding of cloud migration approaches and supporting tools. Excellent communication and interpersonal skills, with the ability to interact confidently with technical and non-technical stakeholders. Analytical mindset with a keen attention to detail and problem-solving abilities. Ability to thrive in a fast-paced environment and adapt to evolving project requirements and priorities. Experience in using Jira tool Total experience: Minimum of 8 years and above. Work experience in a similar role is an added advantage.  Location: Bangalore / Hyderabad / Pune / NCR / Chennai  What?? in it for me?  Work on one of Oracle?? most important initiatives!  We  provide a vibrant and rewarding workplace in a strategic part of Oracles      business that celebrates diverse, multi-talented teams where everyone can      contribute. We are focused on continuous learning development and committed to your personal growth and development in both hard and soft skills. column2: As a Project Manager, your work will cut across areas of judicious planning, operational excellence, governance and capability improvement       As the Project Manager, you will help in implementing Global business vision and strategy, this position requires big-picture thinking, initiative, zeal, attention to detail, the ability to learn quickly, the capacity to handle internal and external relationships, the competence to work with senior executives, and excellent soft skills         Willing to work in a multi-stakeholder 24/7 work environment       Work location: Any GDC location flex preferably                    Your Impact               Drive programs of strategic importance from the Program Management Office (PMO)             Ability to plan, estimate, budget, ; handle, and control costs so that the project can be completed within the approved budget. Handle project revenue by meticulously tracking as sold margin and as delivered margin for the project.             Conceptualise, analyse and evaluate the needs of different programs; make recommendations with business justification, and finally upon approval, forefront the programs             Understanding of Agile-certified Scrum processes, and current methods of coordinating Business IT. Understanding of Scrum Master concepts and exhibits demonstrably the traits of a successful Scrum Master. Possesses certification in either Agile Scrum Master (ASM) or Certified Scrum Master (CSM) from an accredited Agile/Scrum organization.             Ability to build project timelines to plan and lead all aspects of and report progress within the project environment.             Ability to identify all people or organizations impacted by the project, analyse customer expectations and impact on the project and develop appropriate management strategies for actively engrossing collaborators in project decisions and execution.             Oversee DevOps implementation, deployment, and integration of solutions and responsibility for the successful delivery of projects.                 Minimum Requirements             Ability to collaborate with a customers executives and demonstrate strategic understanding of business needs             Hands-on experience with one or more CRM software products (Salesforce CRM, Siebel, Clarify, Vantive, PeopleSoft, NetSuite) would be a strong asset             Hands-on experience with PM tools like JIRA / MS Project             Any project management-related certification (PMI -ACP / PMP / Prince 2 / PSM II, etc) is an asset             Advanced Microsoft Excel skills (formulas, data cleansing, data manipulation)             Must be ready to travel on a need basis             Nice to have Salesforce Certification             Must have in-depth Salesforce Knowledge

column2: This role is critical to the successful execution of the Project. In this specific case, the position is for Brown Field project (offshore- Oil Gas)                              The role of Project Manager is in charge of the execution of the scope within budget, schedule and quality .                              The PM s main tasks are as follows:                   Schedule management                   Coordination of E, P and C activities                              Fabrication yard subcontract management                              Change management                             The PM will travel to Angola or other centers ( in this case Monaco, Schiedam ) as necessary.                             Previous significant experience in brownfield projects and/or shutdown/turnaround planning and/or maintenance planning is a plus                              Previous experience of contract administration with ExxonMobil or similar client                             Solid knowledge / experience of FPSO projects environment                             Excellent skills of communication and stakeholder management                             The PM will also be responsible to make sure the interface with operations ( for Brown field projects) is working well and for the handover of the data once the offshore works will have been executed offshore (as-builts, vendor document, AMOS data base, etc. ).                       ROLE PURPOSE                     The Project Manager has the overall responsibility to deliver the Project in accordance with both the contractual requirements and SBM s internal requirements.                    You may be assigned to lead Projects or to such tasks as Interface Management, Delivery Management, Area Management, or Change Management, depending upon the size and complexity of the Project.               ROLE CONTRIBUTION                     1. In order to build an    effective project management team    you are to:                            Lead the team inspiring others to achieve the project as per plan                              Define and maintain the project organization, responsibilities and accountabilities                              Ensure the team has the balance of skills and expertise required to deliver the Project.                              Manage communication and reporting across all internal Project members.                              Foster team work and cooperation within the Project and with stakeholders                            2. In order to    deliver project as per plan   , you are to:                            Provide the leadership direction required to successfully deliver (initiate, plan, execute, control, and close-out) a Project                              Lead the HSSE and Quality culture throughout the project.                              Own the Execution Strategy, Project Execution Plan, and Project Business Plan                              Communicate the Project objectives/ targets to the Project team and stake holders.                              Be the primary focal point with the Client and manage the communications, reporting and relationship with the client                              Challenge performance in all aspects of the Project                              Optimize costs and manage project cash flow                              Optimize revenues ensure the Management of Change and Risk processes are followed                              Ensure the contract baseline (costs, schedule, scope, regulatory, rely upon data, client obligations, acceptance criteria, notification requirements, insurance cover, obligations, liabilities etc.) is summarized and communicated to the Project team                              Ensure that the Client is notified as soon as a change in scope is detected in accordance with the terms of the contract

column2: As a Scrum Master, you are crucial in facilitating and shaping our processes as we continue our   agile transformation and adopt a Scaled Agile Framework (SAFe). You'll lead the team, facilitating agile ceremonies while fostering collaboration and alignment. Additionally, you will be a key member in SAFe ceremonies, including PI Planning, ART Sync and Scrum of Scrums. Removing impediments to progress, you will enable the team to deliver high-quality work within sprint cycles. As an offshore coach and mentor, you will guide the team in Agile   practices and continuous improvement and serve as a liaison between the team and stakeholders, ensuring transparency and goal alignment. Strong   interpersonal skills, leadership abilities, and commitment to Agile values are crucial for success.  Facilitates daily sync-up, iteration planning, sprint review, and iteration retrospective  Manage the engineering development projects and facilitates sprint releases  Guides team in time estimating practices and facilitates team estimates  Drive team iteration execution, communicates with management and stakeholders, protects the team   from uncontrolled injection of work (changes are evaluated/intentional)  Manage project conflicts, challenges and dynamic business requirements to keep operations   running at a high performance  Work with the team leads   to resolve people problems and project roadblocks  Able to do post mortem   and root cause analysis to help teams continuously improve their practices to   ensure maximum productivity  Leads team effort in   relentless improvement, define and implement improvement stories to increase   the velocity and quality of the program Implement and support principles,   rules and processes  Proactively identify and eliminate impediments and facilitate flow  Maintain team data in   project management software (i.e. JIRA,Confluence, etc.) to support estimates   and execution  Presents high level project readouts for senior management  Supports product owner(s) with intra-team dynamics with respect to priorities and scope  Manage other special projects as assigned  Other duties as needed Qualifications  Project management experience and experience leading sprints  Demonstrable expertise of agile methodology and frameworks like Scrum, Kanban, SAFe, etc.  Thrives in a highly collaborative, fast paced environment  Deep understanding of the fundamentals of iterative and incremental development  Strong knowledge of Scrum theory, rules and practices  Strong understanding of SDLC and Agile procedures to predict the development teams needs  Solid experience working with Architecture teams to assess and size story/epics  Passionate commitment to   delivering products on time  Comfortable with   presenting project readouts to Executive level audience  Deep understanding of agile metrics (tasks, backlog tracking, burndown metrics, velocity, user   stories etc.) to analyze and improve sprint planning  Strong communication   skills to work effectively with clients and team members  Self-motivated and self-managing, with strong organizational skills  Proven experience with SAFe methodology & implementing Scaled agile.   Experience with managing   projects for Adobe suite (Adobe AEM, Analytics, Launch, Target) will be a huge plus.   Some past experience in software development will be preferred. Excellent communication skills

column2: As a Senior Transition Manager, you will lead and oversee the seamless transition of processes, services, or projects from initiation to full operation within our organization      Your strategic thinking, project management expertise, and leadership skills will ensure successful transitions, fostering operational efficiency and client satisfaction      Responsibilities:      Transition Planning and Strategy:      Develop comprehensive transition plans, outlining objectives, scope, timelines, resource allocation, and risk mitigation strategies.      Collaborate with stakeholders to align transition goals with business objectives and ensure a clear understanding of expectations.          Team Leadership:      Lead and manage cross-functional transition teams, providing guidance, direction, and support throughout the transition lifecycle.      Foster a collaborative and motivated team environment, promoting effective communication and knowledge sharing.          Stakeholder Engagement:      Establish and maintain relationships with internal and external stakeholders, including clients, vendors, and project partners.      Conduct regular communication and status updates to ensure alignment and address concerns.          Process Analysis and Improvement:      Evaluate existing processes, identify inefficiencies, and propose enhancements to optimize workflows and achieve seamless transitions.      Implement best practices and methodologies to drive process improvements during transitions.          Risk Management:      Identify potential risks, challenges, and bottlenecks that may impact successful transitions.      Develop contingency plans and risk mitigation strategies to ensure minimal disruptions.          Resource Management:      Allocate resources effectively, ensuring the availability of skilled personnel, tools, and technologies required for successful transitions.      Monitor resource utilization and adjust plans as needed to maintain project timelines.          Documentation and Reporting:      Maintain accurate and organized documentation, including project plans, status reports, and transition documentation.      Generate comprehensive reports on transition progress, key milestones, and outcomes for stakeholders.          Quality Assurance and Client Satisfaction:      Ensure that transition processes meet quality standards and client expectations, addressing any concerns promptly.      Collaborate closely with clients to gather feedback, resolve issues, and maintain high levels of client satisfaction          Continuous Improvement:      Facilitate post-transition reviews to assess outcomes, gather lessons learned, and identify areas for improvement.      Use insights from transitions to enhance future transition processes and contribute to organizational growth.          Qualifications:      Bachelors degree in Business, Project Management, or a related field (Masters degree or PMP certification is a plus).      Proven experience in transition management, project management, or related roles, with a focus on large-scale transitions.      Strong leadership and team management skills, with the ability to motivate and guide cross-functional teams.      Exceptional organizational, analytical, and problem-solving abilities.      Excellent communication, negotiation, and stakeholder management skills.      Proficiency in project management software and tools.      Strategic thinking and ability to align transitions with broader business goals.      Flexibility to adapt to changing priorities and navigate complex environments.
column11: PMP, Manager Quality Assurance, Team management, Project management, Transition management, Analytical, Risk management, Resource management, Continuous improvement, Operations

Set deadlines, assign responsibilities and monitor and summarize progress of project. Prepare reports for upper management regarding status of project.      The successful candidate will work directly with stakeholders to ensure deliverables fall within the applicable scope and budget. He or she will coordinate with other departments to ensure all aspects of each project are compatible and will hire new talent as needed to fulfill client needs.      Requires a bachelors degree and 10+ years of experience in the field or in a related area.      Familiar with a variety of the fields concepts, practices and procedures.      Rely on limited experience and judgment to plan and accomplish goals. Perform a variety of tasks. Lead and direct the work of others.      A wide degree of creativity and latitude is expected. Typically reports to a Sr. Program manager or head of a unit/department.      Enhance department and organization reputation by accepting ownership for accomplishing new and different requests; exploring opportunities to add value to job accomplishments.        Responsibilities:        Coordinate internal resources and third parties/vendors for the flawless execution of projects      Ensure that all projects are delivered on-time, within scope and within budget      Assist in the definition of project scope and objectives, involving all relevant stakeholders and ensuring technical feasibility      Ensure resource availability and allocation      Develop a detailed project plan to monitor and track progress      Assist R&D leader / PMO leader / Engineering team for accelerate organizational goals      Enable Dashboard , Metric & Action closure.      Drive operating mechanism for portfolio      Financial accountability to track manage Budget / AOP      Manage changes to the project scope, project schedule and project costs using appropriate verification techniques      Measure project performance using appropriate tools and techniques      Report and escalate to management as needed      Manage the relationship with the client and all stakeholders      Perform risk management to minimize project risks      Establish and maintain relationships with third parties/vendors      Create and maintain comprehensive project documentation      Meet with stakeholders to take detailed ordering briefs and clarify specific requirements of each project      Track project performance, specifically to analyze the successful completion of short and long-term goals      Meet budgetary objectives and make adjustments to project constraints based on financial analysis      Develop comprehensive project plans to be shared with clients as well as other staff members      Use and continually develop leadership skills      Attend conferences and training as required to maintain proficiency      Perform other related duties as assigned      Develop spreadsheets, diagrams and process maps to document needs                  Must Have: Minimum Requirements            Proven working experience in project management      Excellent stakeholder-facing and internal communication skills      Excellent written and verbal communication skills      Solid organizational skills including attention to detail and multitasking skills      Strong working knowledge of Microsoft Office, Power BI      Project Management Professional (PMP) / PRINCE II certification is a plus Bachelor s Degree in appropriate field of study or equivalent work experience

column2: Management of the internal team and client communication.      The TPMs are the single source of keeping everyone focused on the goals and objectives of the project deliverables.      The TPM needs to possess unique autonomy to be strategic and drive decision-making. They re there from start to finish. They are ready to efficiently plan and prioritize all deliverables and resources working across multiple projects.      Ultimately, the role of the TPM is to become a hub & glue that s holding everything together and leading their teams to create impressive work and build client relationships. They need to make decisions and find solutions quickly and with confidence, and they don t expect someone else to show them the right way forward. Knowledge Managent Experience is mandatory                    Generate and manage internal knowledge management content, create workflows for consumption, track usage and adoption, work to improve user consumption and adoption                Leverage the past experience or gradually pick-up functional aspects which include business processes in the areas of the supply chain, finance, sales & distribution, marketing, retail, eCommerce, etc.            Project/Program Management of various corporate IT programs and large-scale IT implementations            Responsible for planning, resource management, issue/risk management, stakeholder management and reporting on the projects / programs                Identify improvement and efficiency opportunities across the projects            Implement project review and quality assurance to ensure successful execution of goals and stakeholder satisfaction            Be the liaison between senior business stakeholders and technology teams to make programs successful from a business perspective. Manage timely appropriate communication and relationship with clients, vendors, partners, and other stakeholders. Own the project plans delivery on-time and in scope to the satisfaction of all stakeholders. Experience in working in Waterfall, Agile and/or Hybrid project environments            Prior Exposure in FMCG IT Programs will be an added advantage            Strong working experience in Microsoft tools (Excel, PowerPoint etc.) including good presentation skills                Educational Qualifications:                Strong educational background from reputed engineering and management schools with 4-10 years of experience            Certifications in Project Management or Agile domain like PMP, PRINCE2, CSM, CSPO, SAFe preferred                Personal Attributes                Ability to cope in a complex and fast-changing business environment, and to respond calmly and rationally to changing aspirations in a deadline-driven situation. Ensure teams actions are aligned with the strategic vision of the business unit.      Drives numerous concurrent projects to help FCC business units, functional areas, and customers to achieve their strategic objectives by planning and managing projects required to achieve the organizations strategic goals and objectives within scope, schedule and budget while creating measurable business value for the organization. column2: The Project Manager of Client Services serves as a leader in successfully managing assigned client relationships through effective project management coordination and execution. Successful candidates must have 5-7 years of experience as a Project Manager or similar position responsible for defining and managing project scope, timelines, and effective service delivery of eDiscovery Projects.                Roles & Responsibilities:              Consistently deliver proactive communication with clients.          Develop relationships with clients that allows for ease in communications and problem solving.          Initiate and/or lead kickoff calls or high-level design calls with client in addition to preparing monthly forecasting and client cost estimates where appropriate.              Handle review platform (Epiq Discovery or Relativity) specific items including but not limited to:          User requests, database management (archiving/deletion), creation of layouts / views / fields / choices / highlighting / transform sets, creation, and execution of STR s, creation and workflow consultation on redaction sets, creation and management of batch sets, reporting, and creation and execution of production conflict searches          Provide matter specific support on items such as privilege log generation, media tracking, search term formatting and consultation, consultation on processing, production and review workflow, and creation of standard operating procedures (SOPs)          When client issues arise, address, or expeditiously escalate to the Client Services Manager or Sr. Project Manager          Delegate, Mentor and Coach junior members on the team          Troubleshoot issues and recommend solutions, effectively implement, and document for internal and external stakeholders.          Strive to achieve project and revenue utilization targets as set on the job profile.          Ensure that an accurate and up to date record is maintained regarding the status of all projects being worked on              Create playbooks for all clients to standardize service delivery and drive repeat business.              Participate in process improvement initiatives across organization; work with teammates to standardize and improve the customer experience.          Delegate to team members through continuous training of project related tasks, such as processing and review workflow, productions, etc.          Participate in personal professional development across the department.          Embody company values to team members and across the department.                  Required Qualifications & Characteristics              Minimum of 5-7 years of project management or case management experience within the legal/eDiscovery industry.          Experience with providing consultative approach to clients.          Experience with litigation support/eDiscovery platforms both for processing and review          Bachelors degree or equivalent practical experience.          Hands-on experience with working on Relativity          Demonstrated success in working on multiple simultaneous projects with eDiscovery clients and managing projects with close deadlines.          Excellent Oral and written communication skills that demonstrate a white glove approach to legal service.          Client relationship skills which include the ability to proactively manage client expectations, recognize client needs, and adapt to consistently meet client requirements.          Capacity to learn quickly and adapt to changing industry trends.          Flexibility to work both night shift timings and on weekends is required as this role requires working directly with Clients across different time zones.

column2: Summary of the Role:  The?Principal Project Management Specialist will closely collaborate with cross-functional project teams within MEIC and GBUs. This role involves leading medium to high complexity breakthrough Mechanical development projects or Mobile Application Projects focusing on existing product improvements or implementing new features and supply chain management.  Responsibilities include: Leading the planning, execution, and monitoring of strategic programs to ensure alignment with organizational objectives. Collaborating with cross-functional teams to define project scope, goals, and deliverables. Developing and maintaining detailed project plans, timelines, and resource allocation schedules. Conducting thorough analysis of program performance metrics, identifying trends, and providing actionable insights. Preparing and presenting regular progress reports, status updates, and recommendations to senior management and stakeholders. Proactively identifying risks, issues, and dependencies and developing mitigation strategies. Serving as a subject matter expert on program management best practices. Fostering a culture of collaboration, innovation, and continuous improvement within the program management team. Experience Required: Minimum of 13 years of relevant experience with at least 5 years in a project leadership role. Hands-on experience in Supply chain projects preferred. Hands-on experience in Agile methodology preferred. Project experience in mechanical, enterprise software development preferred. Strong project management skills with a track record of managing projects to schedule, budget, and scope. Proficiency in project management tools (e.g., MS Project, Jira, Confluence). Experience with Agile, Waterfall, or SDLC methodologies and processes. Bachelor of Engineering in Computer Science, Mechanical, Electronics or related Engineering field. PMP certification and Certified Scrum Master preferred.

column2: In this role you will be working alongside a globally renowned and award-winning design, development and technology teams who are passionate about what they do and how they do it.              Responsibilities          DELIVER - Driving integrated teams to deliver solid technology solutions in support of key client initiatives      OUTCOMES - Work closely with multi-disciplined teams of product owners, architects, engineers and quality assurance to drive estimates, delivery plans and retrospectives      TRACK - Manage and track team velocity, financials (Project PL) and KPIs in relation to the project plan and expected deliverables      Create and maintain the Project Plan and budget for all projects during build and run phase, ensuring that project(s) are delivered and managed successfully      COMMUNICATE - Continuously evaluate and communicate and escalate project status, risks and issues to upper management and external partners. Assessing the need and acting on the sending of interim reporting and risks during key phases of the project.      Maintain dependency plans between planned sprints across engineering, infrastructure and third-parties.      LEAD - Ensure deliverables are high quality and clearly documented; conduct daily stand-ups and retrospectives at the end of each sprint and ensure the team is continuously learning from the past      Ensure that key Project Artefacts (RACI Matrix, RAID Log, CR Log, Comms Plans) are in place on your projects.      RELATIONSHIPS - Manage high-level client relationships, looking for opportunities to up/cross-sell Deltatre s products and services through effective account and relationship management      Identify and evaluate project risks and issues, devising and implementing effective mitigation, and ensuring internal escalation when necessary      Ensure all operations involved with the projects are delivered to the highest possible standards in collaboration with the live operations team      PROCESS - Assisting with effort and cost estimates for professional services engagements, RFIs and the generation of Statements of Work (SOW)      Awareness and understanding of project related legal and contractual matters      National and international business trips might be required from time to time.              Requirements              Minimum of 3 years experience in managing complex projects, with a duration of up to 12 months and associated budget in excess of 500,00+      Agile and Scrum management of development teams to deliver technology solutions that meet customer expectations for timeliness and quality, preferably in an agency environment      Strong business acumen, backed up by a good technical understanding      Atlassian toolset experience, in particular JIRA and Confluence (desirable)      Excellent verbal and written communication skills with the ability to effectively manage communication at all levels of an organisation      Fluent in verbal and written English      Experience working for a global employer      A motivated, passionate and collaborative approach with an open and team focused working style      Solutions orientation and proven experience in dealing with ambiguity, driving process and achieving results without direct authority      Able to work on a hybrid basis with at least 2 days working in the Mumbai office in Goregaon      Knowledge and interest in cricket will be a bonus for this role          We are looking for someone who is:          driven to push the boundaries and lead change and performance      communicative to leave no-one in the dark and to work with your team successfully      reliable so we know that we can call on you to meet deadlines      passionate about the latest technologies and standards      proactive to suggest improvements, identify and fix potential issues      solid technically speaking, to advise both Clients and internal teams          Some of our Company perks                      Global company with huge growth potential      Small, creative, close-knit Engineering/Tech team who love to collaborate      Support with your career development and access to training      Regular company and team social events      24/7 casual dress code      Free refreshments in the office

column2: As a Facilities Program/Project Manager, you need to play an instrumental role in executing and sustaining functional, aesthetically pleasing workspaces at Seagate. Play a pivotal role in overseeing the efficient and effective operation of a facility or multiple facilities within an organization including both utilities and soft services.                               Ensuring all systems, equipment, & services of electrical, HVAC, fire systems, pantry are functioning effectively and efficiently and safely, included but not limited to managing maintenance activities, coordinating repairs, coordinate & escalate to vendors, and optimizing facility workflows to maximize productivity and minimize downtime.     Stay abreast of advancements in technology, automation, and smart building systems to identify opportunities for innovation and improvement. This could involve evaluating new technologies, conducting feasibility studies, and implementing solutions to enhance facility performance and functionality.     Maintain document and records to demonstrate compliance with regulatory requirements.     Represent Facility in quality, safety and any other audits both internal and external. Take measures to comply with the health and safety standards.     Direct technical facility operations/staff, provide training, conduct safety audits, emphasizing UPS, Precision Air Condition, VRV, BMS, Fire & PA system and critical FM equipment supporting onsite technical operations.     Ensure optimal performance and 100% Uptime of Seagate Critical areas Data center, Labs without business impact.     Prepare and manage budgets, tracking Budgets Vs Actuals, and initiate cost-saving measures.     Collaborate cross-functionally to address facility issues, ensuring Workplace Services align with business needs.     Ensure compliance with local, state, and federal regulations for facility maintenance.     Execute office fit-out projects and efficiently manage refurbishment initiatives.     Liaison with building owners to minimize building-related impacts on Seagate operations.     Oversee day-to-day operations site includes soft services, consumables, stock management, waste. Support employee services, including pantry, cafeteria, event management, and Transport Management.     Review utilities and other stock consumption and strive to minimize cost.     Supervise facility staff (housekeeping, technicians, parking staff)     Control activities like parking space allocation, space allocation, waste disposal etc     Manage vendor sourcing, PR processes, invoices, and vendor relationships.     Responsible for Surplus Asset management.     Added advantage of having knowledge of National Building Code, IEEE, ISHARE, NFPA etc                         About you:                               Minimum educational requirement: Bachelors degree in Electrical or Electronics     Extensive knowledge in Facilities management, Project Management, covering MEP systems, BMS, Data center, HVAC/ Air-condition, Fire System, ESD/Lab Clean rooms operations, and regulatory compliance.     Strong communicator with good written skills and interpersonal skills.     Good team player, problem solving and ability to get work done     Pro-active approach to go beyond standard duties and work with limited supervision.     Demonstrate a passion for service, self-motivated, process oriented and able to multi-task.     Embrace a positive attitude and work ethic, fostering adaptability, continuous learning, and exploration of new ideas.     Demonstrating strong organizational skills and attention to detail.     Good data analytic skills     Accountability, Integrity, Customer Focus,     Proficient in MS Office, knowledge of MS Excel and Smartsheet for analysis and refining present data effectively. SAP ERP experience preferred.                         Your experience includes:                               Working experience in IT company. Worked in a Semiconductor or Storage Industry, managed ESD labs will be an added advantage.     Insightful knowledge of Facility equipment and infrastructure, abreast with latest technology.     Cost Saving Initiatives, Improvement in Efficiency and effectiveness, Enhances Safety and Compliance, Sustainability initiatives and Facility Project Management.     Ability to collect and compiling data, analysis and provide reports.     Summarizing data and formatting in presentation form     Managed Employee Transport     Experience of Surplus Asset/E-waste/Harzadous Waste Management

column2: Life at UiPath The people at UiPath believe in the transformative power of automation to change how the world works       We re committed to creating category-leading enterprise software that unleashes that power     To make that happen, we need people who are curious, self-propelled, generous, and genuine     People who love being part of a fast-moving, fast-thinking growth company     And people who care about each other, about UiPath, and about our larger purpose     Could that be youYour Mission As a Global Product Support Project Manager, you will play a critical role in leading all aspects of the project management lifecycle     You ll develop collaborative partnerships with leaders, peers and project teams and be seen as a trusted consultant and advisor as you lead projects with a focus on growth mindset and change management principles     What youll do at UiPath At UiPath our Project Managers are focused on 5 key areas of responsibility: Relationship Management, Project Documentation Management, Risk Management, Change Management, and Communication as they work to manage a portfolio of global projects     Relationship Management Establish strong relationships with leaders, stakeholders, peers, and project teams, while driving collaboration and communication     Employ strong stakeholder management skills with the ability to proactively manage stakeholder issues with professionalism and tact     Drive efficient and effective decision making in a timely manner     Organize and motivate project teams while keeping all involved well informed of project status, risks, and issues     Project Lifecycle Management Develop and maintain project plans, including project charters, business requirement documents, project schedules and implementation plans     Manage the flow of work through the life of the project     Risk Management Proactively identify risks, issues, gaps, and improvement opportunities     Assess and propose strategies for mitigating risks     Assess, track, and lead the resolution of issues     Escalate issues and risks that may compromise key aspects of project success     Change Management Include change management principles in the scoping, planning and execution of all projects     Assess the organizations capacity to change and develop plans to mitigate or incorporate change strategies     Assess readiness for launch and ensure end users are ready for the transition through proper planning, effective communication, training, and readiness assessment activities     Communication Maintain open lines of communication with leadership, stakeholders, and project teams     Present project dashboard status reports to all levels with regular updates on progress against plan     Coordinate feedback and insight from stakeholders to improve the product, delivery, and overall customer experience     What youll bring to the team 6+ years of previous work experience in program/project management     BA or advanced degree in business, operations, organizational development, or related field     Experience leading project and program strategy, end to end project delivery and communication progress results to leadership     Proven experience and practical application of Waterfall and Agile methodology with direct responsibility of managing multiple global projects and schedules simultaneously     A strong background and practice of change management principles     Experience in proactive risk assessment and management in project delivery     Experience in business process development     Strong conceptual and analytical skills with demonstrated outside-the-box problem solving skills     Possess highly effective written and verbal interpersonal communication and presentation skills     Strong organizational and time management skills     Ability to work independently and manage multiple priorities in a fast-paced environment     Proficiency in both written and spoken English is necessary     Proficient in Microsoft Office applications; specifically Excel and PowerPoint     Experience with project management tools and process design tools     These qualifications are a plus Certification in Project Management (eg, PMI, PMP) is a plus     Experience working with Smartsheet, Salesforce or Jira project management tools     RPA knowledge is a plus     #LI-MR1 Maybe you don t tick all the boxes above but still think you d be great for the jobGo ahead, apply anyway     Because we know that experience comes in all shapes and sizes and passion can t be learned     Many of our roles allow for flexibility in when and where work gets done     Depending on the needs of the business and the role, the number of hybrid, office-based and remote workers will vary from team to team     Applications are assessed on a rolling basis and there is no fixed deadline for this requisition     The application window may change depending on the volume of applications received or may close immediately if a qualified candidate is selected     We value a range of diverse backgrounds, experiences and ideas     We pride ourselves on our diversity and inclusive workplace that provides equal opportunities to all persons regardless of age, race, color, religion, sex, sexual orientation, gender identity and expression, national origin, disability, neurodiversity, military and/or veteran status, or any other protected classes     Additionally, UiPath provides reasonable accommodations for candidates on request and respects applicants privacy rights     To review these and other legal disclosures, visit our privacy policy

column2: - Customer Interfacing with technical Software Engineering related implementation for Payment   related solutions.   - Having experience on Agile/Scrum   - Having Experience on JIRA   - Experience required in various types of IT project methodologies and life cycles, e.g., conversions,   incremental, rapid delivery, classic or traditional waterfall phases of analysis, design, development,   testing, implementation, and the correct project application   - Experience in Payment domain, Payment Gateway, Mobile Payments( UPI), Digital system.   - Experience in an organization in Cards / Digital Payments space   - Advanced skill in the use of project management software to manage projects, e.g., MS Project or equivalent     ? Manage project initiation activities, including identifying contractual obligations, client needs and   goals, existing situations, necessary contacts, and access to existing information as needed.   Ensure requirements for internal technology projects align with operational standards and develop   alternate requirements or document exceptions as appropriate.   Develop, define, and execute project plans, project scope, activities, schedules, budgets, and   deliverables. Coordinate activities and tasks among project team members, other internal departments, and client   or vendor/subcontractor organizations to meet project goals and ensure project completion is on   schedule, within budget constraints, and of appropriate quality standards for the project scope.   Assign and monitor work of project team providing technical and analytical support and direction.   Manage project risks, issues/problems, and activity progress to ensure project goals (e.g., deadline,   scope, and quality) are achieved. To maintain strong relation with DISCOM/other project superior officers, GETCO & GUVNL officer.     To provide daily project progress report and weekly summary.     To provide daily activity report to reporting officer own & team in provided format.     To ensure quality work at site.     To ensure all safety standard & to guide team members for same.     To maintain Installation, service & analysis report as per requirement in provided format at central level.     To research and analysis of failure & corrective action for not repeat the fault.     To coordinate and track record of panel testing, delivery and commissioning and follow up with concerned Discom/other project.     To maintain complaint record and provide the status to central team on daily/weekly basis.     To provide training to site team & customer.     To manage site technician for timely execution (Installation, commissioning and maintenance).     To manage Sim card record at central level Discom/other project/feeder/consumer wise.     To maintain lifetime file of all panel at central level.     To ensure web portal readiness in advance in line with feeder commissioning.     To support production team for firmware configuration and Inspection.     To ensure faulty material & new material record.     To check daily report of Feeder & communication availability, Three phase running hours and WDD running hours, Feeder loss, Error and billing and to plan accordingly to achieve zero defect.     To get signed commissioning/ project report & certificate from respective DISCOM/other project agency.     To submit reports for project management & reporting.     To hand over the site to service team & DISCOM/other project via proper documentation.     To prepare daily/weekly plan and tracking of same accordingly.     To ensure data backup & back fill at server.     To submit energy summary report.     To provide per head cost daily/weekly/monthly for site engineers.               Desired Candidate Profile             BE Electrical / Instrumentation / EC     Experience in Substation Work will be plus

column2: A day in the life of an Infoscion As part of the Infosys project management team, your primary role would be to take end-to-end bottom line responsibility for a Project.  You will lead the proposal preparation, review the project estimations, capture inputs from key stakeholders to position Infosys suitably in order to seal the deal.  You will schedule assignments, monitor, review and report project status regularly in order to manage project risks and ensure successful project delivery and implementation.  You will also coach and create a vision for the team, provide subject matter training for your focus areas, motivate and inspire team members through effective and timely feedback and recognition for high performance.  You would be a key contributor in creating thought leadership within the area of technology specialization and in compliance with guidelines, policies and norms of Infosys. If you think you fit right in to help our clients navigate their next in their digital transformation journey, this is the place for you! Technical and Professional Requirements: Primary skills:Technology->Java->Java - ALL,Technology->Java->Springboot  Preferred Skills: Technology->Java->Java - ALL  Technology->Java->Springboot  Additional Responsibilities: Project Management fundamentals  Project Lifecycles on development & maintenance projects, estimation methodologies, quality processes. Knowledge of one or more programming languages; knowledge of architecture frameworks, and design principles; ability to comprehend & manage technology, performance engineering. Domain Basic domain knowledge in order to understand the business requirements / functionality. Ability to perform project planning and scheduling, manage tasks and coordinate project resources to meet objectives and timelines  Ability to work with business and technology subject matter experts to assess requirements, define scope, create estimates, and produce project charters  Good understanding of SDLC and agile methodologies is a pre-requisite Awareness of latest technologies and trends Logical thinking and problem solving skills along with an ability to collaborate  Educational Requirements Master Of Engineering,Master Of Technology,Master Of Comp. Applications,Bachelor Of Technology,Bachelor of Engineering
