column2: COMPANY TE Connectivity Ltd. is a $16 billion global technology and manufacturing leader creating a safer, sustainable, productive, and connected future. For more than 75 years, our connectivity and sensor solutions, proven in the harshest environments, have enabled advancements in transportation, industrial applications, medical technology, energy, data communications, and the home. With 80,000 employees, including more than 8,000 engineers, working alongside customers in approximately 140 countries, TE ensures that EVERY CONNECTION COUNTS. Learn more at www.te.com FUNCTION DESCRIPTION  TE Connectivitys Engineering Project Management Teams manage cross functional engineering projects. They work with Product Management, Sales, Quality, Manufacturing, Finance, and other functions across TE to assure projects meet financial, schedule and customer expectations. They are responsible for defining and creating project schedules, portfolio management, communication and execution of programs, identifying resource constraints and working with management for resolution, while adhering to LEANPD processes.  ROLE OBJECTIVE  Overview:  The PJM is a ??ini General Manager??of New Product Development projects. The candidate should possess strong leadership and project management skills. The candidate should also have a strong engineering background.  RESPONSIBILITIES  Responsible for planning, execution & delivery of high complex projects/ Program/ portfolios  Manage the development of all project activities from the initiation to the closure, covering the scope of all Functions.  Responsible for defining & managing the project budget, resource and schedule.  Lead the decision-making process at project level.  Identify the risks, issues, and manage the associated preventive and corrective action plans.  Challenge the functions to take ownerships of the project objectives and meet commitments.  Organize, lead and motivate project team.  Provide the project evaluation and project status report to management on a regular basis  Drive fast NPI execution in global setting.   Work with team for well control of project documentation following LEANPD process EDUCATION/KNOWLEDGE Bachelor?? degree or plus in engineering or in Business administration A minimum of 10 years professional experience & at least 5 years in Project Management with a proven track record of successful Delivery, Project roll-out. Experience in electrical engineering is a plus. Skills:  Demonstrate successful problem-solving skills. Fluency, written & spoken in English.  Good presentation and excellent communication skills. Ability to work in fast-paced, team- oriented environment. Team spirit A conceptual thinker with strong attention to detail Good analytical skill and data driven decision making.

column2: Meeting the need for smart mobility solutions      We re making the lives of people who travel easier and more enjoyable whileconstantly developing new, intelligent mobility solutions.     Your new role - challenging and future-oriented      T   o    manage the project within time, budget and quality framework:Ensuring economic success and customer satisfaction for projects of mediumcomplexity: (e.g., use of complex techniques and medium project risk) Carryingthe entire project risk, both technical and commercial. Representation of theproject in all decision-making bodies. As a Project Manager , you will beresponsible for -        Project planning, project-controlling and project reporting:   Derivation of the comprehensive project objectives from the contract and offerdocuments. Preparation of the project planning and the required projectdocuments. Ensuring compliance with defined procedures/processes for projectcontrolling and reporting.       Project organization and management:    Handle the project within thedefined financial targets (budget, target costing, target profit), Setting upthe Project Organization, roles responsibilities, Optimize projectprofitability and ensuring business success, Implement procedures to resolveissues and problems (identification, analysis, measures and monitoring) withall relevant internal and external partners, define procedures and requirementsfor quality management, manage regular project review meetings and organize theprerequisites Gate reviews.       Project implementation:    Coordination of the complex projectimplementation with national or international partners. If necessary,participation in negotiations with subcontractors, possibly also withinternational suppliers together with the commercial project manager. Ensuringthat the project goals defined with the customer and all project participantsare achieved.       Application Engineering Management:    Manage the ApplicationEngineering and System Design for Project Specific Hardware/Software, thisincludes management of Hardware and Software/Data engineering, Lab testingactivities and verification of the Detailed Design.       Stakeholder-Management:    Negotiate with stakeholders on requests forchanges, implement strategies to strengthen customer relations, collectinformation on the customer requirements / goals and provideinformation/feedback to customers on a regular basis.       Exploration of further business opportunities:    For projects of mediumcomplexity: (e.g., use of complex techniques and medium project risk)Identification and exploitation of additional business opportunities duringproject implementation.       Risk management:    Ensure that all risks are identified, assessed andsupervised in all project phases (including Compliance), define measures suitable strategies for minimizing (eliminating, reducing) risks and ensureissue in good time       Leadership:    Technical leadership of the project team including staffresource planning, coordination with the organizational units involved andeffective team collaboration.       We don t need hard workers, just super minds        You have Bachelor s degree or equivalent experience in engineering, preferably in electrical / electronic engineering.     You carry 10-15 years telecommunication experience in Project Management     Advanced know-how of Railway/metro project telecommunication Systems.     Have experience of budgeting, risk management, planning skills and project management skills     You are fluent in English.

column2: Clarivate requires a self-motivated, detail-oriented and highly organized individual to support its Marketing Operations department      This is a role within Marketing PMO office managing strategic marketing projects across marketing functions      The successful candidate will be expected to provide significant support to the Marketing leadership team and is responsible for ensuring project management best practices in a way that encourages collaboration, standardization, overall improvement, and on-time completion of complex marketing programs      It is expected that this individual would be willing to manage routine processes to ensure the smooth functioning of the office with a high level of engagement and attention to detail      Types of programs to be supported range from implementation of marketing technologies, migrations of marketing functions and systems for acquired companies, and development and execution of complex marketing promotional campaigns      The individual will need to foster a collaborative environment that stretches across marketing functions and extends to other departments within Clarivate                  About You - experience, education, skills, and accomplishments                      MBA/ Bachelor s degree in marketing or related field.      Minimum 7 years experience as part of a corporate marketing team      Experience in delivering transformation change in Marketing functions      Working knowledge of project management techniques and technologies      Strong knowledge of marketing automation platforms, SFDC, BI and analytics tools      Strong MS Office skills, especially Excel and PowerPoint and ability to integrate various technologies to support marketing efforts      Ability to strategize based on current and historical data      Experience in the identification, evaluation and documentation of process flows, risks and controls                  It would be great if you also had . .              A clear vision of market trends      Management of processes      Ability to manage multiple projects in parallel      Campaign design and management      Knowledge of audience segmentation and analyzing information      Marketing strategy and optimization                  What will you be doing in this role?                      Provide strategic and operational support to ensure timely completion of designated marketing programs, including development and maintenance of detailed project plans.      Work with relevant marketing teams to allocate and assign resources and develop overall project timelines. Manage execution of marketing programs and support implementation of Clarivate s marketing technology stack.      Focus on the end goal and quickly adapt to changing business priorities. Establish and maintain scalable project management processes that ensure best practices in campaign development, execution and measurement.      Evaluate new project management technologies and add-on applications to improve and optimize marketing team performance.      Participate in cross-functional meetings to resolve recurring issues. Coordinates across functions including: Project Management, Finance, Global Operations and others.      Develop clear understanding of business levers and use this to support the program. Provide project status reporting to management and project teams.      Highlight project risks and opportunities, and develop alternative solutions to keep programs on track.

column2: People       Manage Hyderabad team of IC/HW technical program managers     Establish team vision, mission, and objectives in line with overall PMO and company vision     Set direction, guide, and mentor project management team in realization of the vision while promoting continuous learning and growth within the team     Mentor and develop program management talent, building a high-performing team capable of delivering strategic outcomes.     Foster strong working relationships with all organizations outside the PMO - collaborate and influence RD, Product Management, Business teams in progressing the Product Portfolio.       Product Development Execution       Provide overall program management leadership for new products from concept to production and market release     Collaborate with leaders and individual contributors across the spectrum of functional teams such as IC Design, HW design, Test Managers, SW development, Applications, validation, Operations and Product Management to create, manage and execute schedules     Develop and execute program management strategies and initiatives that support organizational objectives and drive towards PMO and Silicon Labs goals.     Organize and facilitate cross-functional activities, nurturing collaboration and ongoing alignment to ensure requirements are met, on schedule and within resource constraints     Create bottom-up program/project plans including WBS, scheduling, resource forecasts, team enablement and executing using project management best practices and tools     Record detailed requirements, commitments, constraints, dependencies, and assumptions with team members to form the program charter and project management plan.     Monitor schedule and criteria performance using appropriate tools and techniques to measure the progress and health of the program     Proactively recognize risks and deviations from plan, create options and drive approved actions and workarounds required to mitigate and minimize the impact to the program     Ensure requests introduced to the program that affect scope are manage appropriately through established processes and do not impact planned execution prior to acceptance       Process / Tools       Drive continuous process improvement across cross-functional teams to enable efficient execution and ensure visibility into what we are doing and why we are doing it.     Improve, enhance, and expand the program planning framework from concept through production and market release.     Work to enhance tools, processes, and framework on our HW prioritization, planning, and delivery execution models.     Enhance and augment existing tools, metrics, and decision data to drive decision making and KPIs for all deliverables.             The role               This role offers the opportunity to drive continuous improvement in project management at Silicon Labs while working on high-impact products that directly contribute to the Silicon Labs success     Guide the project management team, foster a culture of learning and growth, and collaborate with various stakeholders across the company     This role requires excellent communication and relationship building while partnering with stakeholders such as RD, Product Management, Business teams, and the executive team                 Skills You Will Need         Demonstrated leadership and influencing skills, with the ability to foster relationships, build trust and influence, inspire and motivate teams, and drive change at the senior leadership level     Working knowledge of, or experience with, wireless SoC IC design, HW/SW development tools, modules and their interactions/enablement of the platform system solution     Ability to maintain a healthy pressure and challenge teams where there might be opportunity or need to improve or change an outcome     Advanced degree in engineering or MBA and certifications in project management considered a plus               Education and/or Experience:           BS/MS in Electrical Engineering, Computer Engineering, or related technical field     10+ years of experience in program management or related roles, with a proven track record of leading a team and delivering complex, strategic initiatives
column11: Product management, Wireless, Product launch, Semiconductor, Project management, SOC, Process improvement, Scheduling, Silicon, Continuous improvement

column1: Hiring For Project Management - Chemveda Life Sciences
column2: Position Details : Position Name: Executive/Sr.Executive Department: Project Management Work Location: Mallapur/Uppal Experience - 1 to 5 years Qualification: M.sc(Chemistry) or M.pharm or MBA in Project Management with chemical background Role & responsibilities Daily project Management throughout the life cycle. Processes with appropriate tools from project initiation to project closure. Prepare weekly reports for upper management regarding status of projects. column2: Continuing with the tradition of innovation, MetLife, as part of its Data and Analytics function, has established a Data and Analytics (DnA) center in India. The setup of DnA Hyderabad center is a key multi-year strategic initiative focused on scaling data governance, data architecture, data engineering, data science/machine learning/ artificial intelligence, visualization, agile delivery capabilities, enabling a more cost-effective analytics operating model, and increasing data and analytics maturity across the MetLife global community.   Role Value Proposition:           Driven by passion and a zeal to succeed, we are looking for accomplished project manager with agile expertise to structure, plan and handle multiple projects with minimum supervision and will be responsible for successful completion of projects with various strategic initiatives in development and successful implementation of Analytics lifecycle and its practices.   This position will report to Delivery Manager and be part of Analytics Delivery function at DnA Hyderabad and would be responsible for complete adherence of the projects and its objectives and support all aspects of project management. This role will also support development of best practices, processes, and framework to achieve standardization and streamlining across various initiatives           Job Responsibilities:               Manage and deliver end-to-end projects by adhering to the Analytics Lifecycle and Agile delivery model   Responsible for defining, delivering, implementing and executing data and analytics programs from development to production   Develop artifacts and project documentation required for compliance and audit   Prepare project status reports for review with stakeholders and ensure appropriate governance checks are maintained   Track project progress, risks, and issues to ensure timelines and deliverables are met and regular cadence with key stakeholders is in place   Work with release manager to get projects in deployment queue and operationalize   Run project/program specific scrum meetings and perform all scrum activities like backlog grooming, sprint planning, sprint retrospective etc.   Work with multiple Analytics Leads in US and other geographies to gather requirements as needed and implement it for successful project closure   Gather process improvement requirements and develop/update processes and frameworks as needed and provide suggestions to governance team   Development of detailed documentation and strategic presentations for executives         Update roadmaps and process workflow charts as per requirement               Knowledge, Skills and Abilities           Bachelors degree in Computer Science, or related field   Master s in business administration is preferred; IT/Analytical certification is a plus         5- 8 years of experience in project management preferably in insurance/financial/healthcare industry working in Analytics domain/team Proficient in MS Office suite: Excel, PowerPoint, Project.         Experience running projects delivery using Agile methodologies         Understanding of analytical tool stack, Azure Devboards, Jira, SharePoint is a plus   PMP/Prince2, CSM, SAFe Agilist certifications are preferred   Ability to identify risks to project success and recommend course of action to prevent risk from negatively impacting the project; Effectively recognize when to escalate issues and options to senior management for resolution   Strong communication skills to lead interactions with business and technology leaders   Strong networking ability to communicate interact with diverse talent and an attitude to thrive in a fun fast paced startup like environment   Strong communication skills, Negotiation skills, influencing skills, collaborative mindset, getting things done mindset.

build plan and schedule for agreement with the internal stakeholders      Arrange key internal and external stakeholder meetings     Track the delivery of activities (including managing issues and risks) and support follow up     Support required submission, compliance/ approval activities, and ensure compliance with publication processes and end-to-end publication management tools for given >2 therapeutic areas with high priority brands (eg, iEnvision - previously, Datavision/Matrix) and update as required with approval/compliance tools (eg, PromoMats, NAYA)     Support the management of the assigned publication or medical education in line with the agreed budget     Support and manage as required external spend tracking (eg, approvals, purchase orders, and goods received)     Support adherence to associated compliance related activities and approvals (with internal stakeholder taking accountability for compliance)     Take lead in liaising with global stakeholders for publication planning and coordinating medical events     Maintain integrated scientific communication plan with quarterly updates in consultation with Publication Leads     Help in coordination of medical events and advisory boards and other medical events, as appropriate     Track and reconcile publication open access charges     Collaborate effectively with stakeholders: Scientific communication global and/or local teams; and medical content enhancement teams                 People: (1) Maintain effective relationship with the end stakeholders (medical scientific community) within the allocated Global Business Unit and product - with an end objective to develop education and communication content as per requirement; (2) Actively lead and develop SGH operations associates; and (3) Ensure new technologies are leveraged             Performance: (1) Ensure publication/medical education materials (slide decks, abstracts, posters, and manuscripts etc) are delivered, stored as per agreed timelines and quality; (2) Develop tools, technology, and process to constantly improve quality and productivity             Process: (1) Support delivery of projects in terms of resourcing, quality, timeliness, efficiency, and high technical standards for deliveries made by the medical writing group, including scientific documents and clinical/medical reports; (2) Contribute to overall quality enhancement by ensuring high scientific standards for the output produced by the medical writing group; and (3) Secure adherence to compliance procedures and internal/operational risk controls in accordance with any and all applicable regulatory standards             Stakeholder: (1) Work closely with scientific communication/medical content enhancement teams to ensure the end-to-end effective project delivery of the designated publication/medical education deliverables                   About you             Experience   : 5-8 years post qualification experience        Soft skills   : Stakeholder management; communication skills; and ability to work independently and within a team environment        Technical skills   : Project management; Scientific/Medical writing/communications; Pharma experience (including but not limited to therapeutic area/domain knowledge exposure; and/or publication submission)        Education   : University degree level (Graduate degree, preferably in science). Additionally, relevant advanced/postgraduate degree in life sciences/pharmacy/similar discipline desirable        Languages   : Excellent knowledge of English language (spoken and written)

column2: We are searching for a composed and astute junior project manager to help conceptualize and oversee multiple projects within our organization.      To this end, the junior project manager is responsible for detecting gaps that can be closed by projects, collaborating with coworkers to propose suitable endeavors. In so doing, you should follow the deadlines that are set.     ?To be successful as a junior project manager, you should be able to track performance across an array of developments and teams.          Required Qualifications:       We are a startup and expect each team member to wear multiple hats, take initiative, and spot and solve problems.        Identifying needs that can be successfully addressed by projects.          Pitching project ideas and securing approval before each project commences.          Developing new project plans in consultation with stakeholders, including clients and staff.          Outlining the human and material resources required to successfully complete each project.          Formulating a resource allocation strategy and utilizing this to distribute work and finances.          Monitoring staff performance to ensure excellence and adherence to specified deadlines.          Evaluating each projects effectiveness by consulting with clients, consumers, and staff.          Reporting on each projects utility upon the uptake of outputs.          Consulting with the leaders to seek guidance and input during the key phase of each project.          Track and manage the risks of the project          Additional Qualifications:         Possessing a bachelors degree in relevant field          Knowing project management methodology          Knowledge of product development and SDLC is a plus          What are we looking for?         Great attention to detail and effective communication skills (written and spoken)          An analytical learning mind who is curious to learn new things          Excellent problem solving and multitasking skills

column2: As a Project Manager, your work will cut across areas of judicious planning, operational excellence, governance and capability improvement       As the Project Manager, you will help in implementing Global business vision and strategy, this position requires big-picture thinking, initiative, zeal, attention to detail, the ability to learn quickly, the capacity to handle internal and external relationships, the competence to work with senior executives, and excellent soft skills         Willing to work in a multi-stakeholder 24/7 work environment             Work location: Any GDC location flex preferably                    Your Impact               Drive programs of strategic importance from the Program Management Office (PMO)             Ability to plan, estimate, budget, ; handle, and control costs so that the project can be completed within the approved budget. column2: Building on our past.Ready for the future           Worley is a global professional services company of energy, chemicals and resources experts.  We partner with customers to deliver projects and create value over the life of their assets.  We re bridging two worlds, moving towards more sustainable energy sources, while helping to provide the energy, chemicals and resources needed now.   Designation- Project Manager/ Manager Of Projects     Global Level Summary Typically manages specialized, complex (high-impact) single projects or multiple, but similar type projects.  This includes small and medium projects or a portion of a large or mega project.  Develops and oversees project plans, including business, production, and/or organizational priorities.  Produces integrated solutions to strategic issues and presents recommendations to customers.  Solutions are derived from knowledge gained through past experiences and consultation with internal and external resources.  May serve as a proposal manager for small to medium projects. Project Size Category Medium, LargeTypical Project RiskDecision Making Makes independent decisions and recommendations in the course of managing a project.  Broad knowledge of functional area and ability to implement and lead organizational project change effectively.  Solutions are derived from interpreted and applied general information and   consultation with other individuals       Supervision Received Works with self-initiated interaction with supervisor and self-initiated technical guidance.  Influence over duties.  Receives administrative direction based on project and organization policies and objectives.  Work is reviewed to ensure conformity with project directives, policy and for coordination of other Worley departments.  Supervision Authority Assigns project work and gives technical guidance to people assigned to work on medium to large sized projects.  Reviews work for technical accuracy and adequacy.  May have direct and indirect reports and authority for performance evaluations impacting pay.  May make recommendations concerning selection, training, rating and discipline of people.  Systems & Tools(Essential) Advanced understanding of systems, processes and tools related to field.  Able to assist others and troubleshoot issues.  Competent in Microsoft Outlook, Word, Excel, Teams and PowerPoint.  Can organize information from many sources and retain as per the prescribed format and policies. Systems & Tools(Desirable) May be involved in the development of new systems, processes and tools; Competent in Microsoft Access and Visio.     Key CompetenciesHealth & Safety   Understands and embraces Life.    Demonstrates full commitment to all health and safety matters and provides safety leadership to project team.    Satisfies all requirements of project safety compliance including Safety by Design, Constructability and Maintainability.    Has led or participated in Constructability, Operability and Maintainability Workshops.  Leadership   Defines and selects team required to deliver scope of work.    Effectively leads project team comprised of multi      discipline/ multi       location members.    Sets clear objectives for the project team including scope, schedule, productivity and budget targets.    Oversees, motivates and monitors the performance of the team, ensuring quality and timeliness of assignments and roles, and addresses any performance gaps.    Implements communication tools and process to ensure all team members are informed about project status and key performance indicators.    Demonstrates the ability to build support for ideas, presenting alternatives and recommendations persuasively.  Technical Expertise   Ensures Worley methodologies, processes, tools and systems are used throughout the project and compliance requirements are met/satisfied.    Applies knowledge of all aspects of a project (engineering, procurement, quality control, etc).  to oversee the successful execution of the project plan.    Ensures design team is aware and complying with customer Basis of Design and applicable codes and regulations.    Demonstrates attention to detail.    Demonstrated understanding of engineering project delivery workflow and coordination.    Experience with procurement/subcontracting and on-site construction support.    Has completed a full project from start to finish and spent time supporting the field to implement what was engineered.  Financial Acumen   Applies in      depth knowledge of customer contract to the oversight and management of the project.    Strong understanding and application of business drivers, financial reporting standards.    Tracks cost and schedule and uses analytical skill to forecast trends.    Project deliverables and design quantities are tracked and analysed.    Understands project cost buildup including gross margin together with risks that may erode margin and opportunities to improve margin.    Ensures proper change control processes are understood and used by the project team.    Manages cash flow requirements, including accounts receivable, and work in progress to minimize days sales outstanding (DSO).  Execution Planning & Performance   Experienced in developing/reviewing Project Execution Plan covering all aspects of the scope.    Applies lessons learned as inputs to planning the project execution.    Manages execution, coordination, and implements regular reviews/controls to track project progress.    Good understanding of Project Control Reports, identifies problem areas and implements recovery plans.    Interprets and understands key elements of the project schedule and resource plan.    Incorporates Value Creation and Sustainable Solutions objectives into project plan, measures and delivers to objectives.    Experienced in successful workshare execution.  Communication &Networking   Effectively communicate and take a leadership role in preparing and presenting proposals and reports to staff and management.    Implements clear communication protocols, processes and tools for the project team.    Clearly communicates project requirements, contractual requirements, customer expectation, KPI and project status with project team.    Creates an environment for open communication and builds high performing team on trust and respect.    Resolves issues and conflicts within the project team including customer.    Effectively relates with people across levels, functions, geography and cultures.    Works collaboratively with others across the organization to achieve shared objectives. Customer &StakeholderManagement   Identifies and understands the customer s key drivers (KPIs).    Manages customer representatives and other significant stakeholders.    Manages and nurtures customer and stakeholder relationship based on established expectations and communication protocols.    Develops a relationship of trust and respect with ability to discuss project progress, challenges and issues in a transparent manner. Risk & OpportunityManagement   Understands commercial and legal risks in the contract, prepares and manages mitigation plans.    Identifies potential risks or new risks as the project progresses and effectively develops risk mitigation, contingency and resolution plans.    Follows Worley risk management procedures.    Keeps detailed risk register that stays current and is tracked & communicated on a regular basis (at least monthly).    Utilizes Risk Register items as the basis for any project contingency budget.             Qualifications, Accreditation, Training(Essential) : Trained in leadership and project execution. Will be actively licensed with a local engineering governing body where required by law.           Qualifications, Accreditation, Training (Desirable) :Training in risk management or quality.           Job Specific Knowledge /Experience (Essential) Has a strong understanding of cross-discipline work, interfaces, and sequencing. Well versed in project setup, instituting work processes, monitoring a team, execution, and closeout. Skilled in estimating project costs and writing proposal content. Adept at budgeting and cost control.           Typically has 15+ years of relevant discipline experience and 5+ years in project leadership.         Job Specific Knowledge /           Experience (Desirable) Experience in project management, risk management, quality, procurement, or construction execution           Decision Making As a member of the Project Management Team, recommendations relate to processes, systems, and project execution strategy. Empowered to make the necessary decisions to achieve the engineering goals in line with the execution plan and with the approval of the Project Manager when there are deviations. Alternatives to technical design are normally contained within the disciplines to ensure accordance with standard engineering principles and company policy.         Supervision Received Operates with broad management authority, receiving minimal technical guidance and control.           Supervision Authority Cross-discipline Lead Engineers and Lead Designers on the project.           Communication Effectively communicate and present complex proposals and reports to senior or executive level management. Participative management style with a cooperative team approach. In highest tier, leadership skills in multi-cultural/national environments                   Systems & Tools (Essential) Competent in Microsoft Outlook, Word, Excel, Teams, and PowerPoint. Can organize information from many sources and retain as per the prescribed format and policies. Has functional awareness of cross-discipline tools. Experienced in coordinating the establishment/use of integrated tools and delivering the benefits of data centric engineering.           Systems & Tools (Desirable) Competent in Microsoft Access and Visio. Able to touch type.                       Moving forward together           We re committed to building a diverse, inclusive and respectful workplace where everyone feels they belong, can bring themselves, and are heard. We provide equal employment opportunities to all qualified applicants and employees without regard to age, race, creed, color, religion, sex, national origin, ancestry, disability status, veteran status, sexual orientation, gender identity or expression, genetic information, marital status, citizenship status or any other basis as protected by law.         We want our people to be energized and empowered to drive sustainable impact. So, our focus is on a values-inspired culture that unlocks brilliance through belonging, connection and innovation.       And were not just talking about it; were doing it. Were reskilling our people, leveraging transferable skills, and supporting the transition of our workforce to become experts in todays low carbon energy infrastructure and technology.       Whatever your ambition, there s a path for you here. And there s no barrier to your potential career success. Join us to broaden your horizons, explore diverse opportunities, and be part of delivering sustainable change.

Creative designers, developers, testers and other support functions     Strong commercial acumen i.e. understanding of pricing models, delivery P&L, budgeting, etc. Basic level understanding of contracts     Industry experience on Retail, Financial Services, Energy & commodities, Travel & Hospitality, Automotive, Consumer products is preferred.         Nice to have Experience & Credentials          Diverse experience across more than one service offering such as application development and maintenance, application/ product support, systems integration, product engineering, package implementation, project management consulting, etc.     Practitioner experience as an Agile Coach     Delivery experience with scaled agile engagements     Certifications: SAFe or other scaled agile related certifications

column1: Senior Analyst - Product Development & Project Management
column2: ?           As marketers at one of the most iconic brands in the world, we play a major role in building authentic relationships with customers who impact life and business around the world. Here, creativity and inspired storytelling combine with powerful data-based marketing and hyper-personalized digital communication to create a genuine human connection that drives business results. As a part of our diverse community of marketers, you can have a breadth of different marketing experiences and do virtually anything from connecting small businesses to new customers to uncovering insights that inspire the future of payments. Create a dynamic career while doing work that matters for people and businesses everywhere. Find your place in marketing on #TeamAmex.                   How will you make an impact in this role                     This role involves driving product initiatives for Corporate card business in India along with managing high priority technology regulatory projects to drive growth, and compliance.                      Support Product team and be responsible for delivering the implementation and project management of some of the product teams initiatives (be it new products, capabilities or servicing changes) to better meet corporate customer needs and maximize business economics. You will support NPD Product managers to ensure efficient and effective project roll out ensuring all initiatives are delivered flawlessly on time and within budget.                  Ensure corporate regulatory initiatives are proactively followed up and closed with respective stakeholders.                  Leads and executes project work plans and revise as appropriate to meet changing needs and requirements                 Manages day-to-day operational aspects of a project and scope                  Assume full responsibility for and manage effectively and efficiently all project activities and resources in order to meet expected results                      Plan and schedule project timelines and milestones using appropriate tools                      T     rack project milestones and deliverables                 Develop and deliver progress reports, proposals, requirements documentation and     presentations                  Develop best practices and tools for project execution and management                      Work closely with teams like GSN, GBI, Technologies, Risk, Acquisition, Finance and Communications. Key to this role is to be personally accountable for the detail required to effectively implement initiatives and be innovative in their application and proactively identify issues and ensure facilitation to close them.                  Ensure compliant process for all initiatives and due Ops risk governance process is followed.                      Minimum Qualifications                     Post-graduate with 5+ years experience with a confident self-starter attitude.                  Strong ability to work independently and drive results.                  Strong numerical and analytical ability.                  Excellent communication skills.                  Good technology systems and application knowledge.                  Ability to work in a team environment fostering teamwork and driving collective performance.                         In-depth understanding of corporate products and process is a must.                  Ability to work across business lines/geographies and manage multiple stakeholders.                     Preferred Qualifications                               Amex systems and functional knowledge will be preferrable.                                        PMP certification, Six Sigma will be an added advantage.             Benefits include:                Competitive base salaries                  Bonus incentives                  Support for financial-well-being and retirement                  Comprehensive medical, dental, vision, life insurance, and disability benefits (depending on location)                  Flexible working model with hybrid, onsite or virtual arrangements depending on role and business need                  Generous paid parental leave policies (depending on your location)                  Free access to global on-site wellness centers staffed with nurses and doctors (depending on location)                  Free and confidential counseling support through our Healthy Minds program                  Career development and training opportunities

column1: Senior Executive / Manager - Project Management Office (PMO)
column2: Qualification:    MBA              Job Summary:          We are seeking a dynamic and experienced Project Management Office (PMO) Manager to    oversee the planning, execution, and delivery of projects within our organization.          The ideal    candidate will be highly organized, possess strong leadership skills, and have a proven track    record of successfully managing project portfolios.          The PMO Manager will be responsible for      establishing and maintaining project management standards, processes, and methodologies    to ensure projects are delivered on time, within budget, and to the highest quality    standards.           Key Responsibilities:           ?       1.     Establish PMO Framework   : Develop and implement a standardized project management framework, including processes, tools, templates, and methodologies, to govern project delivery across the organization.             2.     Project Governance   : Define and enforce project governance standards, including project initiation, planning, execution, monitoring, controlling, and closing phases. Ensure compliance with organizational policies and procedures. Facilitate all Internal & client calls; track all minutes and share with stakeholders.             3.     Executive reporting   : The ability to report and present to executive management.             4.     Resource Management   : Collaborate with project managers and department heads to allocate resources effectively, ensuring optimal utilization and alignment with project priorities and organizational goals.             5.     Risk Management   : Identify project risks and develop mitigation strategies to minimize potential impacts on project objectives. Monitor and report on project risks throughout the project lifecycle and highlight to stakeholders.             6.     Quality Assurance   : Establish quality assurance processes to ensure project deliverables meet stakeholder expectations and quality standards. Conduct regular quality reviews and implement corrective actions as needed.             7.     Performance Monitoring and Reporting   : Define key performance indicators (KPIs) and establish mechanisms for monitoring and reporting project performance. Prepare regular progress reports for stakeholders, highlighting achievements, issues, and areas for improvement.             8.     Stakeholder Management   : Build and maintain strong relationships with internal and external stakeholders, including project sponsors, steering committees, and business partners. Communicate effectively to manage expectations and address concerns.             9.     Continuous Improvement   : Drive continuous improvement initiatives within the PMO, identifying opportunities to enhance project management practices, streamline processes, and optimize resource allocation.             10.     Training and Development   : Provide training and coaching to project managers and project team members on project management best practices, tools, and techniques. Foster a culture of learning and development within the PMO.             Qualifications:         Bachelors degree in business administration, project management, or related field.      Masters degree preferred.     Hands on experience on MS suite - Project, Planner, Lists, Power Automate, VISIO     Minimum of [5] years of experience in project management.     Strong understanding of project management methodologies, such as Agile, Scrum, and Waterfall.     Proven track record of successfully managing large and complex projects from initiation to closure.     Excellent leadership, communication, time management and interpersonal skills.     Ability to work effectively in a fast-paced and dynamic environment, managing multiple priorities simultaneously.     Ability to work in grey areas and move them towards logical direction.         Preferred:         Project Management Professional (PMP) certification or equivalent preferred.     Certification/Knowledge of Six Sigma/ Lean/ Statistics

column2: Job Title: Technology Project Manager Job Summary: We are seeking an experienced and highly organized Project Manager to join our dynamic technology team. As a Project Manager, you will be responsible for overseeing and successfully delivering technology projects from initiation to completion within the given constraints of time, budget, and scope. You will collaborate closely with cross-functional teams, including software developers, engineers, designers, and stakeholders to ensure projects are executed efficiently and meet business objectives. Responsibilities: Lead the end-to-end      project management lifecycle, including project planning, resource      allocation, timeline management, risk assessment, and quality control. Define project      objectives, scope, deliverables, and success criteria in collaboration      with stakeholders and project teams. Develop comprehensive      project plans, including task assignments, timelines, milestones, and      dependencies. Coordinate and      collaborate with internal teams and external vendors to ensure project      progress and resolve any potential issues or conflicts. Effectively communicate      project status, updates, and risks to stakeholders, ensuring transparency      and managing expectations. Monitor and track      project progress, identifying and mitigating risks, and taking corrective      actions when necessary to ensure successful project delivery. Foster a collaborative      and positive team environment, promoting effective communication,      knowledge sharing, and cross-functional collaboration. Conduct project      post-mortems to identify lessons learned and implement improvements for      future projects. Stay informed about      industry trends, emerging technologies, and best practices in project      management, and apply relevant knowledge to enhance project outcomes. Act as a mentor and      coach to team members, providing guidance, support, and professional      development opportunities. Requirements: Bachelor's degree in      Computer Science, Information Technology, or a related field. PMP      certification is a plus. Proven experience as a      Project Manager in the technology industry, successfully delivering      complex technology projects within budget and time constraints. Strong understanding of      software development methodologies (e.g., Agile, Scrum) and project      management frameworks. Proficient in project      management tools and software for planning, scheduling, and collaboration      (e.g., JIRA, Microsoft Project,Notion). Excellent leadership and      team management skills, with the ability to motivate and inspire      cross-functional teams. Exceptional      organizational, analytical, and problem-solving abilities, with a keen      attention to detail. Effective communication      and interpersonal skills, capable of building strong relationships with      stakeholders and team members. Ability to thrive in a      fast-paced and dynamic work environment, managing multiple projects      simultaneously. Knowledge of technology      trends, emerging technologies, and industry best practices. Experience in the      technology industry or with software development projects is highly      desirable.

Monitors the standards and embeds project control, quality assurance and governance for the project / programme delivery lifecycle, including pre-approval of business cases. To manage the planning and delivery processes by collecting and maintaining data in a consistent form and giving advice and guidance as necessary.     Support in providing and maintaining a capacity planning and resource tracking/management across the Programmes.     Update and maintain the centralised Risk Log, Action Log, Decisions Log and Issue Register.     Ensure the appropriate programme benefits are identified, quantified and their realisation planned      Ensure cross-programme dependencies are managed and the dependency log is accurately maintained.      Provide a quality assurance role in line with defined Programme Management Office process.      Coordinate project closure to distil good practice and ensure lessons learned are logged.     Responsible for the management of the PMO functions and resources.     Provide support for Project planning, Milestone management, Scope management, Resource forecasting; Financial Management; Change Management across the project portfolio.     Prepare regular status reporting to all levels of the business.     Ensure efficient change control methods and process are utilised.     Identification of enhancements which may lead to improvements initiatives/projects.     Responsible for the ownership and management of the PPM tool including overall maintenance, governance and transitions of new projects to the toolset.     Works with senior people responsible for the line business operation, to ensure maximum improvements are made in the business operations as groups of projects deliver their products into operational use.     Provides general and specific advice and authorises the issue of formal reports to management on the effectiveness and efficiency of control mechanisms. Preferably educated to Degree level or holds a relevant project management professional qualification. Coordinating and updating project/programme plans.     Effective Relationship Management, high experience with working and establishing relationships at all levels within an organisation and third parties.     Ability to apply innovative thinking to problem solving. Require the individual to be proactive, detail oriented and have demonstrable experience working within a structured project environment.     Line Management or team leadership experience.     IT literate in Microsoft Office applications (Word, Excel, MS Project, PowerPoint and SharePoint) are essential.      Familiar with the project development lifecycle, methodologies and general project management.     Be an excellent communicator at all levels both verbally and in writing.     Excellent Organisational & time management skills.     Enthusiastic attitude, discipline and approach.     Can demonstrate independent working. Ability to work under pressure with a view to attaining monthly targets

column2: About Us HighRadius, a renowned provider of cloud-based Autonomous Software for the Office of the CFO, has transformed critical financial processes for over 800+ leading companies worldwide. Trusted by prestigious organizations like 3M, Unilever, Anheuser-Busch InBev, Sanofi, Kellogg Company, Danone, Hershey's, and many others, HighRadius optimizes order-to-cash, treasury, and record-to-report processes, earning us back-to-back recognition in Gartner's Magic Quadrant and a prestigious spot in Forbes Cloud 100 List for three consecutive years. With a remarkable valuation of $3.1B and an impressive annual recurring revenue exceeding $100M, we experience a robust year-over-year growth of 24%. With a global presence spanning 8+ locations and a recent addition in Poland, we're in the pre-IPO stage, poised for rapid growth. We invite passionate and diverse individuals to join us on this exciting path to becoming a publicly traded company and shape our promising future. Job Summary The Project Manager (PM) is responsible for delivering consulting projects to Fortune 1000 clients. He/ She will be owing client engagements and running these projects parallel till closure. The PM is also responsible for creating project plans, executing those and delivering on time with high quality, value and with customer delight. This is a highly visible and complex role since the candidate will be the point of contact and work with executives and users across the entire organization. The successful candidate must be extremely well organized, focusses on details, ?process-oriented, quality- minded and has the ability to articulate in written/verbal form. He/ she will not only use the existing methodologies/ templates for effective project execution, but also have opportunity to recommend process improvements. Key Responsibilities   Handle a portfolio of projects and clients in parallel from Fortune 1000 companies and across geographies.   Establish and maintain strong relationships with product delivery, the sales team, client and account managers.   Plan for a quarter ahead and develop an execution plan for projects and people in the team.?   Monitor and Track Projects to ensure the Scope is delivered within Budget and Schedule per plan. Also ensure the Value/ROI committed to the customer is delivered.?   Align with the recommended Processes to ensure 100% Quality Delivery with quality Documentation.?   Seek guidance from Program managers and seek guidance to manage escalations, variations, complexities in projects effectively. Skill & Experience Needed?   Bachelor or Master?? Degree (preferably from a top reputed university), with Project Management certification.   Overall 6-10 years of professional services experience   Minimum 2 years of experience as Project manager or equivalent role demonstrating management and leadership experience, preferably in a fast paced consulting / professional services set-up.   Experience in leading and mentoring people as part of the project life cycle.   Strong organizational skills and detail oriented   Strong Communication and presentation skills What You'll Get   Competitive salary.   Fun-filled work culture (https://www.highradius.com/culture/).   Equal employment opportunities.   Opportunity to build with a pre-IPO Global SaaS Centaur. ?

column2: BI Project Manager - Remote/Hybrid - Hyderabad  Responsible for overseeing and managing the implementation of business intelligence projects within an organization.  Work closely with stakeholders, including business leaders, IT teams, and data analysts, to define project objectives, scope, and deliverables. Key Responsibilities : 1. Project Planning: Develop and maintain project plans, including timelines, resource allocation, and budgeting. Identify project risks and develop mitigation strategies. 2. Requirement Gathering: Collaborate with business stakeholders to understand their data and reporting needs. Translate business requirements into technical specifications for the BI team. 3. Team Management: Lead a team of data analysts, developers, and other project resources. Assign tasks, monitor progress, and ensure timely delivery of project milestones. 4. Data Analysis: Analyze and interpret complex data sets to identify trends, patterns, and insights. Use data visualization tools to present findings to stakeholders. 5. Technical Expertise: Possess a strong understanding of BI tools, data warehousing concepts, and data integration techniques. Stay updated with the latest trends and advancements in the BI field. 6. Stakeholder Communication: Facilitate effective communication between business stakeholders, IT teams, and project resources. Provide regular project updates, address concerns, and manage expectations. 7. Quality Assurance: Ensure the accuracy, completeness, and reliability of data and reports generated by the BI system. Conduct thorough testing and validation to identify and resolve any issues. 8. Change Management: Implement change management strategies to ensure smooth adoption of new BI solutions. Provide training and support to end-users to maximize the utilization of BI tools. 9. Project Documentation: Maintain comprehensive project documentation, including project plans, requirements, design documents, and user manuals. Ensure documentation is up-to-date and accessible to relevant stakeholders. 10. Continuous Improvement: Identify opportunities for process improvement and optimization within the BI project lifecycle. Implement best practices and lessons learned from previous projects. Requirements for a BI Project Manager typically include: - Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, Information Systems, or a related field. - Proven experience in managing BI projects, preferably in a project management role. - Strong analytical and problem-solving skills, with the ability to interpret complex data. - Proficiency in BI tools such as Tableau, Power BI, or QlikView. - Knowledge of data warehousing concepts, ETL processes, and data modeling. - Excellent communication and interpersonal skills to effectively collaborate with stakeholders. - Project management certification (e.g., PMP) is a plus. - Familiarity with Agile or Scrum methodologies is desirable. - Ability to work in a fast-paced, dynamic environment and manage multiple projects simultaneously. Note: Interested professional can share their resume to Raghav.b@aciinfotech.com
column11: bi tools, Business Intelligence, PMP, Project Documentation, BI Project Manager, Power BI, data warehousing concepts, data integration

In this role, the senior project manager will support Ansys foundry team to provide the central collaboration point between Customer foundries and Ansys cross-functional teams across all levels of Ansys and customer management. This role will be to work with management team to lead the scoping and planning of key projects and successfully executes against the established commitments. ? Key Duties and Responsibilities? Guide complex semiconductor foundries engagements to successful outcomes using Project Management experience, planning and negotiation skills, subject matter expertise and industry knowledge? Develop and manage Project and Program level initiatives and coordinate project plans? column2: JOB DESCRIPTION   Summary:    Join our dynamic CIO PMO Organization as a Project Coordinator/Project Manager, where you'll play a pivotal role in delivering IT infrastructure, cloud, and security services to our internal clients. You'll lead matrixed resources through the entire project lifecycle, from initiation to close, aligning technology solutions with business requirements. Reporting directly to the PMO Manager, you'll proactively identify opportunities, conduct analyses, and manage delivery schedules to meet business metrics and benchmarks. As a valued member of our cross-functional team, you'll collaborate closely within the broader CIO Org, ensuring seamless communication and coordination.   We're seeking a detail-oriented individual with excellent communication and organization skills. You must excel in reporting project status and results to leadership, possess strong planning and time-management abilities, and thrive in balancing multiple assignments and deadlines.   PRIMARY RESPONSIBILITIES:   Assist project managers or functional leads in managing projects, coordinating resource allocation, and assigning tasks to achieve milestones. Track project changes and produce updated schedules in alignment with other departments, stakeholders, and the PMO. Gather and update project materials, requirements, and lessons learned documents. Serve as a liaison between business and technical teams, providing comprehensive project details from initiation to completion. Monitor risk management and facilitate issue/problem resolution as needed. Communicate project status to internal and external stakeholders, preparing reports for management review.   REQUIREMENTS: Bachelor's Degree in Project Management, Computer Science, Information Technology or related field. 3+ years of IT project management  experience, demonstrating proficiency in bridging business and technical teams. 3+ years' experience in a defined project management methodology. Advanced skills in Microsoft Excel and Microsoft Office suites. Excellent verbal and written communication skills. Preferred project management certifications:  PMP, CSM, ITIL. Familiarity with procedures, guidelines, process improvement, and product management preferred. Proficiency in collaboration tools such as Smartsheet, MS Project, SharePoint, and TEAMS.   This role offers an exciting opportunity to contribute to transformative projects within our organization. If you're passionate about project management and driving business success through technology, we encourage you to apply and become a part of our innovative team!

column2: As a Counterparty Credit Risk Project Manager, you will play a crucial role in orchestrating the successful execution of projects, navigating both Agile and waterfall methodologies. Your responsibilities extend across various project management facets, collaborating closely with Front Office, IT, Analytics (Quants) teams, Architects, and change teams. Ensuring project delivery aligns with organizational processes.  Role & responsibilities     Project Managers operate across the Programmed lifecycle, and must be capable of undertaking various types of change delivery (including Agile and waterfall)  Proficiency in project planning tools and methodologies, with the ability to translate requirements into actionable project plans.  Oversee the execution of projects, ensuring adherence to schedules and milestones. Establish and maintain effective communication channels with stakeholders, particularly Product Owners.  Conduct regular status updates, addressing concerns and fostering collaborative relationships.  Continuously monitor project progress, identify potential risks and issues, and implement corrective actions to mitigate disruptions and ensure project success.  Work closely with teams to implement risk mitigation plans, ensuring project success.  Exceptional reporting and communication skills to convey project status, updates, and challenges to senior management and stakeholders.  Provide regular, clear, and concise project status updates, ensuring that senior management is well-informed about the project's progress.  Works closely with Front Office, IT, Analytics (Quants) teams, Architects, and fellow change team to deliver project/program as per organization processes on time.  Stakeholder management works closely with Product Owners and executes test cases before presenting them  to relevant stakeholders.  Demonstrate strong business knowledge and sound business sense, and stay abreast of the industry, businesswise and technology-wise. Ensure that all project activities align with regulatory standards and industry best practices to meet compliance requirements throughout the project's lifecycle.   Manage project budgets efficiently, ensuring that projects are completed within allocated financial resources.   Implement quality control measures to maintain high standards in project deliverables and seek opportunities  for continuous improvement in project processes and outcomes. Leverage subject matter expertise in Counterparty Credit Risk to contribute to the development and  enhancement of risk models.  Work closely with quantitative analysts and risk modelers to understand and incorporate advanced risk modelling requirements into projects.  Preferred candidate profile  Minimum 10 years of experience, preferably with FRM/CFA certification  Relevant certifications, such as PMP or PRINCE2, are highly desirable.  Sound knowledge of Traded Risk - Counterparty Credit Risk  Simulations, Pricing and Aggregation knowledge is desirable.  Worked on Risk Measures calculation: EEPE (Effective Expected Positive Exposure), EPE (Expected Positive Exposure), PFE (Positive Future Exposure) etc. and Banks Internal Model Method (IMM) implementation.  Strong analytical, problem solving and critical thinking skills.  Solid presentation and writing skills.  Excellent interpersonal skills and ability to work and communicate effectively across multiple teams and functions.  Willingness to learn and continuously expand technical and business skills.    Join our team and make a significant impact in the banking and financial services industry. Apply now!

column2: Org:Growth & Strategy (G&S) - Offering Development (OD) Role:Content Development Lead Industry X and Capital Projects Level:CL7 Manager Location:NCR | Bangalore | Mumbai About the Team At Accenture, we help transform leading organizations and communities around the world by serving 19 Industries across 5 Industry groups, 5 Functions, 5 Services and various strategic practices like Sustainability, Data & Applied Intelligence, etc. The role sits in G&S OD which is part of the Solution Development Hub that reports to Accenture's Chief Asset & Solutions Officer. Infrastructure & Capital Projects is a core solution within Accentures Industry X services, which focuses on applying digital and data to our clients Capital Projects portfolio. Clients come from many industries and are typically owner operators or EPCs.  Our strategic intent As part of transforming Accenture's GTM agenda and to be able to bring the best of Accenture to every client, every time and everywhere, we are building solutions, which are industry led, multi-service, asset-powered propositions, in digital format, anchored in our clients' most strategic and pressing issues. Our stakeholders are senior leaders within Accenture leading the industry, CALs and account teams who directly interface with our clients. We offer each talent an exceptional career experience by giving individuals the opportunity to inspire, innovate and make an impact for our clients, communities, and people. We are always looking for people to push themselves further, have the passion to collaborate, deliver value and help us reach our common goals. We seek exceptional Product Management professionals who help shape and maintain the future of Solutions tablets @Accenture and deliver outcomes to our clients. You are: Content Development Leads  have skills in content curation & development and storytelling. They apply agile ways of working to collaborate across the Accenture network to curate, develop and mature specific content for a multi-service solution. They ensure consistency and enrichment of solution content from businesses, markets, clients, partners, etc. to ensure value of the final product. They mitigate risks by ensuring the content meets the legal standards and requirements. Additionally, they may contextualize horizontal solutions for industries or functions. The Content Developer will be staffed to priority solutions teams based on skills and experience. The Content Developer must have relevant experience in Industry X and Capital Projects domain. Ideally a qualified civil engineer, site engineer or must have worked in construction or Engineering Procurement and Construction firms in the past. A complete understanding of capital build projects would help articulate the processes and nuances while working on the content for the relevant solutions. Qualification Key Responsibilities Responsible to curate, develop and mature content for majority or all of elements of solutions. Ensure consistency and enrichment of solutions through content from businesses, markets, clients, partners, etc. Contextualize horizontal solutions for industries or functions. Work with business stakeholders to incorporate innovation, client /CAL feedback, practitioner content. Adhere to solution tablet standards and agile solution delivery methods.  Partner with business stakeholders and SMEs to meet the needs of the target user personas, using a data-based approach to evolve the current solution. Work with the solution tablet team to identify risks, mitigation strategies, and quality issues as they arise. Required Work Experience & Skills 8+ years professional experience in the Industry X and Capital Projects industry or adjacent industries; with 2+ years of client facing consulting experience as a plus. Proven track record of working as a site engineer, civil engineer, or constructions site manager. Proven track record of working with Digital transformation or Digital technologies such as Control Towers, Digital Twins, Internet of Things (IoT) Proven track record working collaboratively with a multi-disciplinary team. Proven success guiding and partnering with multiple senior executives. Excellent written and oral communication and interpersonal skills. High ability to adapt to dynamic and evolving business needs. Product Management experience and understanding a plus. Understanding of agile ways of working and storytelling a plus. Previous experience building compelling narratives out of existing materials a plus.  Previous experience in sales, proposal development, advertising, marketing, strategy, transformation a plus. column2: Family Description       Applied R&D (AR) consists of target-oriented research either with the goal of solving a particular problem / answering a specific question or for multi-discipline design, development, and implementation of hardware, software, and systems including maintenance support. Supplies techno-economic consulting to clients. AR work is characterised by its detailed and complex nature in order to systematically combine existing knowledge and practices to further developing and incrementally improving products, operational processes, and customer-specific feature development.       Subfamily Description       General R&D Management (GRM) comprises the management of the engineering organisation which includes development and revision of new and existing products or services. Covers monitoring of different engineering dimensions and priority setting and conflict resolution between the different organisational dimensions (if any). Contains formulation of long-term objectives, implementation of policies, and monitoring of engineering budget and development schedule. Comprises optimisation of product delivery and involvement in patent search, technology surveillance, technology trends, and is main contributor in innovation management of the company.           Impact       Impact is short-term through individual and team contributions. Scope is primarily within own subject area in a function/unit. Actions and errors impact on program, project or function. Provides measurable input into new products, processes, standards or operational plans in support of the organisations business strategies, with some impact on business unit/ function overall results.       Scope & Contribution       Individual Contributor: Operates autonomously in own subject area. Can analyze, develop and implement concepts and solutions as a subject matter expert. Increased awareness of and involvement outside of own subject area. Distills big picture. Makes decisions about and prioritizes own work. Managerial/Supervisory: Clear managerial responsibilities for people. Typically first level of solid line management. Interprets policies. Ensures existing plans are put into operation. Executes and/or oversees processes to meet customer needs. Responsible for analysis, design & development of policies, plans, programs.        Innovation       Carries out specialised activities/projects according to general direction. Influences others to support decisions. Works mostly independently. Analyze situations or data that requires review of relevant factors. Solutions can often be checked and proved. Demonstrates success in multiple roles and is adaptable to manage complex changing business environments.       Communication       Communicates with parties within and outside of own job function and teams, and typically has responsibilities for communicating with parties external to the organisation, which may include customers or vendors.Works to influence others to accept job function s view/practices and agree/accept new concepts, practices, and approaches.Has cross-cultural knowledge and global mindset Requires ability to communicate with executive leadership regarding matters of significant importance to the organisation. May conduct briefings with senior leaders within the job function. May at times be required to negotiate regarding operational issues.       Knowledge & Experience       Management Experience / Achieved well-advanced skills of a specific professional discipline combining deep knowledge of theory and organisational practice or expertise. Recognised expert in their field (depth & breadth). Typically requires 5-8 years extensive relevant experience and/or a graduate / postgraduate equivalent degree.     Leads key and less complex projects that positively contribute to business or operation impact such as streamlining processes and tools for efficiency in functional, region or local operation.     Manages the execution of a programme of medium complexity against agreed programme targets.     Is responsible for project execution performance with respect to financial and operational KPIs such as cost, timelines, revenue, project assets, and customer satisfaction.     Interfaces with key stakeholders at business area leadership.     Owns and manages customer relationship for assigned scope in services, delivery and performance areas.     Ensures contract execution is based on PM@Nokia methodology and applicable BG guidelines and processes.     Ensures proper communication to relevant stakeholders for technical requests, emergency cases, outages and project delivery issues.     Monitors, reports and optimises services delivery in alignment with relevant processes and tools providing sufficient operational visibility to stakeholders (EG Project Management, PMO, customer).
