column1: Opening For Project Manager @ Tech Mahindra
column2: Roles & Responsibilities As a vital component of the Strategic Solutioning & Transformation Unit, the Multi Tower Offering Development (MTO) function is dedicated to delivering end-to-end transformative solutions leveraging the capabilities of our various service lines. We are in search of a dynamic and seasoned Techno-Functional Project Manager/Lead to support the development of integrated industry centric solution offerings. This role is pivotal in providing end-to-end storytelling to customers, showcasing our capabilities in areas such as Autonomous Operations, Enterprises of the Future, Telco-to-Techo, Integrated Command Centre, and more. Position Overview: In the capacity of Techno-Functional Project Lead, you will work closely with solutioning team in shaping and execution of our multi-technology/service solution offerings. This role, under the guidance of MTO head and Architecture Review Board (ARB), entails close collaboration with Solution Architects, individual service/competency lines, sales and commercial teams to strategize and develop offerings that meet the evolving needs of clients across diverse industries. New Product Development and Marketing collateral development and how to position the product Primary duties encompass, yet are not confined to: Collaborate with offering development squad to grasp technical requirements and feasibility to develop end-to-end narratives for integrated solution offerings, ultimately delivering compelling stories for customers. Work with individual service lines to seamlessly integrate diverse technologies into cohesive solution offerings as part of the overall offering narrative. Collaborate with key stakeholders to comprehend market trends, client needs, and competitive landscapes. With support of MTOD head and ARB, develop and execute a strategic offering development plan aligned with business objectives. Engage with Sales/Deal Directors to understand their customers challenges and requirements and translate them into actionable insights for offering development process. In collaboration with respective team, support devising pricing strategies, business models, and go-to-market plans for each solution offering, ensuring alignment with market demand. Stay abreast of emerging technologies and industry trends relevant to solution offerings. Support the sales collateral development and sales training programs on the offerings being developed by SST team. Qualifications: Bachelors degree in engineering; MBA preferred. 10-15 years of experience in a techno-functional role within the technology consulting industry. Proven track record in leading the development of multi-technology/service solution offerings is highly preferred. Strong understanding of diverse technologies such as telecommunications, IoT, AI, etc. Excellent communication and storytelling skills. Willingness to undertake various tasks as the unit evolves, in addition to those specified. Ability to collaborate effectively with cross-functional teams. Open to working in multiple time zones; flexible with work timings. Notice Period:  30-90 Days
column11: Project Management, pricing strategies, Pre-sales, telecommunications, IoT

column1: Opening For Project Manager (Market Research) @ Tech Mahindra
column2: Industry research analyst / Market Analysis - Project Manager Roles &   Responsibilities  In the Strategic Solutioning & Transformation Unit's Multi Tower Offering Development (MTO) function, a key role awaits an adept professional to serve as the Market Research and Sales Enablement Strategist.   This multifaceted position plays a crucial role not only in enhancing our sales enablement capabilities but also in contributing a comprehensive market research perspective to enrich the business value of our multi-tower solution offerings. Primary duties encompass, yet are not confined to:  Collaborate closely with the offering development squad in SST and respective service lines to comprehend our capabilities and offerings.  Conduct thorough market research using various channels to formulate a perspective on emerging trends, market needs, and competition to guide new offering development.  Develop business cases and validations for new offerings based on market trends, incorporating Outside-In and Inside-Out views.  Partner with marketing teams to translate technical features into compelling business value propositions.  Formulate and execute a holistic sales enablement strategy aligned with organizational goals.  Craft engaging and informative sales collateral, presentations, and other materials that effectively communicate the value of our services.  Ensure sales teams have access to updated and relevant content to bolster their efforts.  Design and implement training programs for sales teams to enhance their understanding of technical consulting solutions.  Conduct workshops and webinars to disseminate product knowledge, industry trends, and effective sales techniques.  Collaborate with service lines, marketing, and sales teams to gather feedback, fostering continuous improvement of sales enablement materials and programs.  Establish metrics and KPIs to gauge the effectiveness of sales enablement initiatives.  Regularly evaluate the impact of training programs on sales performance and provide data-driven recommendations for enhancement.  Support TML generation activities for NBD accounts.  Contribute to the creation of outreach campaigns to drive NBD. Qualifications:  Bachelor's degree in engineering, preferably with a masters in business or marketing.  In-depth understanding of market research tools, techniques, and technical consulting solutions, with the ability to translate technical concepts into business value.  Excellent communication and presentation skills.  Collaborative work experience in a cross-functional environment, with a preference for those familiar with multiple service lines within TechM.  8-12 years of experience in market research and sales enablement or a related role within the IT consulting industry (flexible for internal candidates).  Willingness to undertake various tasks as the unit evolves, in addition to those specified. Notice Period:  30-90 Days

column2: Ubisoft Entertainment is seeking a highly organized project manager with outstanding communication abilities and proven experience in project management     The project manager will oversee the game from QC perspective to interface with development teams on QC initiatives while identifying and communicating QC needs     The ideal candidate shall have the ability to effectively communicate with both technical and non-technical personnel     Strong game knowledge and product management experience in the game are required     The position will require the person to work closely with QC Teams from multiple studios and the development teams to ensure high level of collaboration on the assigned title         Job Duties /Responsibilities           ?       Project Management         Actively participate in the definition of the Roadmap and strategy for the Tech teams.     Take ownership of the action items defined in the Roadmap and collaborate closely with different stakeholders to ensure traction and establish good governance for progress.     Manage project lifecycles on development and maintenance projects, utilizing estimation methodologies and quality processes.     Identify and mitigate risks affecting ongoing projects to ensure smooth progress and timely delivery.     Perform project planning and scheduling, manage tasks, and coordinate project resources to meet objectives and timelines effectively.     Identify opportunities for enhancing the delivery teams performance and output.     Manage resource movements across projects and effectively allocate resources based on capacity.     Mentor project delivery team members, ensuring adoption of suitable project management techniques.     Establish strong relationships with internal and external teams, managing work-streams with competing priorities.     Compile documentation for reporting, including status reports, development progress, and ensure stakeholders have up-to-date reports, project milestones, and visibility to capacity.     Standardize and optimize processes with checklists, lessons learned, business cases, and documentation.     Plan and conduct training and mentoring sessions for team members.     Assist team members in clarifying their career goals and provide guidance on achieving them within the organization.     Evaluate team performance, provide feedback, and support continuous improvement to drive project success.     Identify relevant trainings for team members based on allocated projects and technical needs.     Manage and plan resource allocation of the production team for current and upcoming work.     Integrate new employees, promote team spirit, acknowledge achieved performance, and maintain high team engagement.     Stay updated on the latest technologies and trends.         Team Management         Create a fun and conducive environment for all the resources in the team to make sure they have maximum throughput.     Regularly conduct meetings with the leads to provide visibility on the project priorities, timeline, production feedback etc     Regularly conduct team meetings to make sure the team provides overall project visibility.     Ensure high level of collaboration between the QC teams, define the best practices to be followed and create information sharing platforms where all involved teams can contribute.     Identify talents within the team and create roles where their areas of expertise can be better utilized within the teams.     Use Pulse Survey data to improve Team engagement.         Resource Management / Planning / Utilization         Ensure 100% utilization of the team ie, every resource should be billed on the project, any resource billed under AVAILABILITY should be discussed in prior with the Program / Operation manager.     Handle downtime [less than 1 week] proactively by planning team development activities.     Proactively communicate any anticipated major down time [more than 1 week] to Program manager and coordinate accordingly to explore if any assistance / support is required on any other project / task.         Team Development         Identify Skills Gaps and plan for training workshops on the topics required for managers in the team.     Create a team-based leadership development program.     Creating and driving a long-term plan for training and development for the project for your project     Developing SMEs and setting up development training with the help of Prod partners     Setting up OKRs for direct reports, reviewing and providing feedback on the progress made by the team member on a quarterly basis.     Looking out for training and development opportunities from other projects, departments, test studios which could be beneficial for the team and project.     Instill a culture of excellence within your team and encourage them to improve on a daily basis. Promote your team success internally and promote a pride feeling within the team.     Create a culture of continuous improvement.         Operational Activity         Ensure the team is operationally efficient while working from office as well as home.     Ensuring team has required infra, space in office to execute responsibilities efficiently.         Core Competencies         Proven Leadership     Being Strategic     Organizational Skills     Strong Problem-Solving Skills     Team Building     People management     Training Development     Managing Performance     Managing Project Collaboration Communication     Stakeholder management         Technical Competencies         Project Management     Project Planning Execution     Data Savvy and Analytics     Project Risk Management     Logical Reasoning     Research Development     Methodical Approach     Persuading and Influencing Staff     Change Management     Think automation and tools improvement     Industrial Awareness         Behavioral Competencies         Empathetic Behavior     Inclusive     Respect and Mindful about the impact of your Action and Words     Act as an ally     Impacting oral and written expression     Positive mindset and working collaboratively in the team     Work towards attaining self, team and organizational objectives     Being Solution Oriented     Problem Solving     Seek for innovation     Open-minded and feedback enthusiast         Qualification         Bachelors degree in a relevant field (preferred).     Proven experience in project management roles.     Certification in project management (e.g., PMP) is a plus.     Strong understanding of SDLC and agile methodologies.     Excellent communication and interpersonal skills.     Ability to prioritize and manage multiple tasks simultaneously.     Demonstrated ability to lead and motivate teams.     Strong analytical and problem-solving skills.     Adaptability and willingness to learn new technologies and methodologies.

column2: Fortis Healthcare Ltd is looking for Assistant Manager - Projects to join our dynamic team and embark on a rewarding career journey     Project Planning and Coordination:        Assist in the development of project plans, timelines, and milestones in collaboration with project managers and stakeholders.      Coordinate project activities, meetings, and resources to ensure alignment with project goals and objectives.      Monitor project progress, track key deliverables, and identify potential risks or issues that may impact project timelines or outcomes. column2: Required Skills :          Impact        Impact is short-term through individual and team contributions. Scope is primarily within own subject area in a function/unit. column2: 1. Stakeholder Communication: Act as the primary point of contact for clients, vendors, and internal teams to facilitate effective communication and resolve any issues or concerns that arise during the project.     2. Budget Management: Monitor and manage project budgets, including tracking expenses, cost estimates, and financial forecasting to ensure projects stay within budget constraints.     3. Risk Management: Identify and assess potential risks that may impact the projects success and develop strategies to mitigate or manage these risks.     4. Schedule Management: Create and maintain project schedules, coordinating tasks and activities to meet deadlines and milestones.     5. Reporting and Documentation: Maintain detailed project documentation, prepare regular progress reports, and communicate project status to relevant stakeholders.     6. Change Management: Handle changes in project scope, objectives, or requirements and assess their impact on the project timeline and budget.     7. Performance Evaluation: Evaluate project performance against established goals and KPIs and implement corrective actions when necessary.     8. Closure and Handover: Ensure a successful project handover to the client or relevant departments, including final documentation, training, and post-project reviews.     9. Continuous Improvement: Identify areas for process improvement and implement best practices to enhance project management efficiency and effectiveness.     10. Diversity is preferred.

column2: Looking for challenging roleIf you really want to make a difference - make it with us           Meeting the need for smart mobility solutions.      We re making the lives of people who travel easier and more enjoyable while constantly developing new, intelligent mobility solutions.           Your new role - challenging and future-oriented        As System Manager / Technical Architect, you will be responsible for following:           Objectives           The objective of the system manager in project (SMiP) is to define the system requirements and establish a system concept which is optimum for complete Projects covering different Subsystem also namely Interlocking, Train Control, Train Supervision and Traffic Management. Consistent system management is to be ensured throughout the entire project execution phase to minimize the technical risks of complex projects.      System Manager role involves an integrative technical management task regarding all involved departments / regions. The SMiP is a project core team role.             Work assignments:           You will take the overall technical responsibility for the mass roll-outs for project based on ETCS L2 technology at its heart, as part of large-scale customer projects within time, budget and quality framework: Carrying the responsibility for the Project architecture, application scope, both technical and commercial.                   Planning and Controlling:               For overall projects derivation of the comprehensive project objectives from the Contract, Customer, Project Management and provided documents. Preparation of the project planning and delivery of project documents.               Application implementation:               Coordination of the complex application implementation with international partners. Ensuring that the application goals defined with the technical management, project management and all project participants are achieved.                       Exploration of further business opportunities:               Identification and exploitation of additional business opportunities during project implementation, e.g. identifying Change Requests or extending the scope towards generic application work packages.                       Leadership:               Technical leadership of the overall system having ETCS L2, Interlocking, Train Supervision and Traffic Management, Project including resource planning and coordination with the organizational units involved. Managing following setup:           -               Design, Interface, Scope and Engineering Input clarification with customer and partners.           -               Interfacing/Clarification with all Project teams for Architecture, Engineering         and alignment with independent safety assessor           -               Evaluation of customer and internal requirements towards establishing suitable project specific solution and requirements engineering/compliance           -               Have performed hands on design engineering activities for System Design, Architecture, Technical leadership, Engineering for wayside and onboard ETCS, Evaluation of operational scenarios, requirements, and interfaces.         Understanding of other subsystem like Interlocking, ATS, Communication and Diagnostic Systems           -               Knowledge on Test Management, Validation and RAMS               -               Supporting installation and tests activities/teams onsite           -               Knowledge of Projects Support functions (RM/DM/CM) and Quality Management           -               Knowledge of Project Management principles towards planning, scheduling and budget controlling.           This role for technical management involves focus on system activities with 80% efforts and also management of team/cost/schedule approximately 20% efforts.                     We don t need superheroes, just super minds                               Degree in electrical/electronics engineering or systems engineering preferably with railway specific specialization                         Extensive professional experience (10+ years) in railway transportation systems, ideally in the rail systems business.                           It would carry additional weightage if you at least have           5+ years of dedicated experience on system management/leading technical project teams with experience on all of these - Interlocking, Train Control and Train Supervision.                         5+ years SW/HW engineering in either IxL, Train Control or ATS/TMS                         Experience with CBTC, ETCS L1 also acceptable, if candidate shows strong technical and managerial skills (alternatively for ETCS L2 experience).         Extensive technical knowledge on operation scenario, national values, terminology and packets/telegrams,      ETCS Subsets and UNISIG baseline 2/3.                         Extensive knowledge on ETCS L1/L2/L3 Hybrid operation scenario, national values, terminology and packets/telegram.                         Willingness for ~5% business travel (Europe, potentially to Egypt).                         Project executions covering activities like customer interfacing, scope clarification, Design/Engineering planning and resource allocation                         Knowledge of project management principles for project realization and execution                         Fluent English essential both written and oral.                         Independent and structured approach to work                         Team leadership and mediation skills between teams         This role is based in Pune. You ll also get to visit other locations in India and beyond, so you ll need to go where this journey takes you. In return, you ll get the chance to work with teams impacting entire cities, countries - and the shape of things to come.

column1: Agile Project Manager III, Enterprise Applications
column2: The Agile Project Manager leads cross-functional teams to provide agile-based project delivery and facilitates the teams work to accelerate delivery of business value by ensuring adherence to Scrum methodologies and processes     Leads the project team through all phases of the Software Development process     Identifies and drives implementation of continuous improvements within the project team     Proactively identifies and helps to resolve issues that impact achievement of team sprint commitments     Regularly reports overall project status to management and key stakeholders, escalating major issues as necessary     Ensures the team is fully functional, cooperating, and productive     Facilitates internal and external communication, removes impediments, and serves as the liaison between multiple stakeholders, delivery managers, and project team members     This role requires a dynamic individual who thrives in a fast-paced environment and enjoys working closely with cross-functional teams     The ideal candidate is passionate about agile practices and is committed to helping teams deliver high-quality products efficiently             Responsibilities:         Administers Agile processes: facilitates day-to-day processes to include Daily Scrum Stand-up meetings, Sprint Planning, Backlog Grooming, Sprint Reviews and Retrospectives. Assists with internal and external communication, improving transparency and radiating information. Reports on sprint metrics, bug/incident tracking, and capacity.     Maintaining delivery momentum: facilitates the delivery flow of teams at scale, managing the pace and tempo. Able to actively address internal and external risks, issues and dependencies including where ownership exists outside the team. Able to provide delivery confidence.     Customer focus and stakeholder alignment: work closely with business stakeholders to ensure their requirements are fulfilled timely and our team supports the overall business growth in the organization. Able to listen to the needs of technical and business stakeholders and interpret them. Able to manage stakeholders expectations and be flexible, can communicate proactively and reactively.     Planning: understands the environment and can prioritize the most important or highest value work (capabilities, features, stories, incidents, problems). Able to use data to inform planning. Able to remove blockers or impediments that affect the roadmap and can develop a plan for difficult situations. Ensures teams plan appropriately for their own capacity.     Team dynamics and collaboration: able to bring people together to form motivated teams. Establishes a team environment by building trust and creating transparency. Guides teams through the implementation of a new process.     Continuous improvement: able to identify and compare the best processes or delivery methods to use at scale. Able to recognize when something does not work and encourages a mindset of experimentation. Able to use a blended approach depending on the context. Able to measure and evaluate outcomes. Continuously improve team processes through inspection and adaptation.     Ensure product backlog management: Assist the Delivery teams in maintaining a well-groomed product backlog. Help prioritize backlog items based on value and ensure that the team understands and commits to the sprint goals.         Skills and Experience:         5+ years of working with cross-functional teams     3+ years working as a Scrum Master or in a similar agile role     Detailed knowledge & experience of the SDLC     Certified Scrum Master or other Agile project management Certifications (CSM, SAFe, PMI-ACP)     Detailed knowledge & experience of Agile (Scrum, Kanban) methodologies     Possess solid interpersonal skills and the ability to effectively organize and communicate with cross-functional and global teams     Experience with Project Management tools, Asana, Microsoft Excel, SharePoint

column2: Job Responsibilities   The Transition Manager shall be responsible for overseeing operational transitions at InfinX and ensure that the transitions are implemented according to schedule and budget.? To ensure success as a transition manager, you should be able to proactively spot any transition challenges and solve them as quickly as possible. Ultimately, a top-notch transition manager should demonstrate mastery of the transition process to minimize any associated costs or risks.  The Transition Manager shall be responsible to create transition plans and documents to outline project expectations, scope, schedule and budgetary requirements  in collaboration with the clients, the CSM team and Operations.? He / she would be responsible to ensure a strong governance around the transition activity by keeping all parties involved with the transition, including the senior management, updated on its progress.? The role would require the spotting of any transition related issues and creating effective solutions to resolve them swiftly.?    Skills:   Bachelor's degree in computer science, finance, or a similar field.  At least 5 to 7 years' experience in transition management.  Project management certification is preferred (PMI/CAPM or PMP, PRINCE2)  Strong inter-personal and communication skills  Strong communication skills (verbal and written)  Experience   10+ years of relevant experience.  Essential Functions of the Job:  Ensure service transition is planned and executed to schedule, budget and scope  Build transition plans including infrastructure/application support models, change management.  Be responsible for coordinating implementation activities, providing effective team leadership, including information flow to and from operations during project work.  Assess, analyze, develop, document and implement changes based on requests for change.  Liaise with business and IT partners to ensure a successful infrastructural set-up in support of the transition activity.  Promotes awareness of transition planning and support process and strategy.  Drive strong governance both within Infinx and also with the customers to ensure timely updates on transition progress, issues, areas where help required etc.,?  Knowledge and Skill Requirements:  Experience of transitioning complex projects with personal accountability for delivering to time and cost for projects.?  Excellent interpersonal, communication, and organizational skills  Ability to work and team effectively with multiple user groups and other management personnel including on a global, virtual basis  Knowledge of service transition methodology, tools and templates  Track record of customer focus, based on openness, trust, and delivering on promises.  Excellent written and verbal communication skills  must be able to communicate fluently in English both verbally and in writing.  Transition manager is expected to act with minimum supervision and to deliver to schedule, budget and scope; support provided as required and requested and is self-driven and motivated.

column2: As a Strategic Program Manager supporting CA&R departments, you manage strategic programs, improve project delivery, and ensure agreement on organizational goals.      Your responsibilities include overseeing project portfolios, implementing best practices, encouraging collaboration, and establishing frameworks to standardize processes for achieving goals.      As the ideal candidate, you have a blend of curiosity and skills. Succeeding in environments, you navigate complexity with ease. Your technical proficiency in tools like Salesforce and Tableau allow you to guide solutions and improve project outcomes.      Collaboration lies at the heart of your approach. You enjoy working with diverse teams and partners, aligning project goals with organizational goals. With experience as a Senior Program Manager, you excel in leading large-scale projects to success. Inspire teams ensure delivery excellence in the face of challenges.      Reporting to the Senior Director, Strategy and Operations within the CA&R function, you help shape project direction. Your skill in driving outcomes in are indispensable to our success.      What you will do      Strategic Planning:    You will develop and implement strategic plans for the PMO to align with organizational goals and improve business growth.        Portfolio Management:    You will manage project portfolios, including prioritization, resource allocation, and risk management to ensure successful project delivery.        Process Improvement:    You will evaluate and improve project management processes and methodologies to enhance efficiency, quality, and effectiveness. Additionally, you will build frameworks for standardization to improve processes across projects.        Partner Management:    You will build relationships with partners across departments to understand our needs, facilitate communication, and ensure agreement of project goals.        Performance Monitoring:    You will establish Goals to monitor project performance, track progress against goals, and improve.        Governance and Compliance:    You will ensure adherence to project management standards, policies, and regulatory requirements, while promoting a culture of compliance within the PMO.        Change Management:    You will lead change management efforts related to projects, driving adoption and ensuring successful implementation across the organization        Reporting and Communication:    You will present regular reports on project status, performance, and main insights to executive leadership and partners.      Qualifications        Bachelor's degree in business administration, Project Management, or related field; master's degree.          Project Management Professional (PMP) certification or equivalent.          Minimum of 12 years of experience in project management, with a focus on strategic planning and portfolio management.          Experience leading complex projects and project teams. column1: SCM IT Project Manager within SAP S4/HANA
column2: As a Project Manager you will be responsible for providing and improving our internal business flow of returning spare parts from our sites globally, back to our global distribution centers, while rollout of our new SAP S4/HANA platform is done globally      You will be supporting the global and local supply chain, with smart and innovative solutions, where your primary tasks will be to take charge of the development and implementation of relevant processes and IT tools              The role includes:          Optimizing IT processes within own areas by on existing IT processes within SAP including development of requirement specifications, solution test, documentation, and training of key users      Working closely with business process specialists and supporting them with best practice SAP solutions to enable world class performance      Working together with IT offshore IT partners and external software providers for alignment on requirement specifications for requested solution      Bridging GAP between existing process and implementation of SAP S4/HANA      Turning the defined improvement areas into smaller projects and be responsible for the total management of the project, i.e. planning, initiating and implementing      Occasional travelling will be expected      You will take part of a large and global project which involves introduction SAP S4/HANA ERP system for all SGRE entities, and your ideas will change how the business works today. We continuously strive to strengthen our position, and we are therefore looking for bright minds eager to join a dynamic, international organization offering unique opportunities for its employees.                    About you              We are looking for you, who want to make real what matters and who wants to change the world to renewable energy.      As a person you are structured and have a strategic and analytical mind-set t      hat allows you to create overview and identify improvement opportunities.      You will be part of a diverse workforce and you must be an outstanding communicator who can work with different nationalities and organizational levels.      You have a master s degree within Supply Chain Management and 3-5 years of relevant business development experience from a consultancy firm or a larger international company.      You have knowledge of best practices solutions within your area of SAP processes, table structures and written/understanding of functional specifications for developers      You can demonstrate documented experience in project management SAP SD/MM/ARM s processes, EDI, as well as profound experience in stakeholder management.      You are fluent in English - written and spoken and other main languages would be an advantage.

column2: The role will be responsible for supporting presales engagements. The typical activities involved with this role are:         Engage with Rackspace sales teams and Solution Architects to lead on presales engagements from pitching, requirements gathering, and scoping through to proposal development, pricing, SOW authoring, and contract closing.     Support presales efforts and deliver proposals and Statements of Work (SOW) documents inclusive of overview, scope, duration, activities, assumptions deliverables, resources, mitigation of shared risk, terms and conditions, assumptions, pricing, and executive summaries.     Act as a source of expertise in SOW generation and negotiation, including the commercialization of risk.     Maintain and keep accurate management information in systems of record such as Salesforce and Financial Force PSA tools.     The Presales resource is expected to engage both directly with Customers and indirectly in support of Solution Architects and Sales executives to support, facilitate, and drive the development and closure of Private Cloud sales opportunities.      Rackspace Private Cloud assist customers with all aspects of their technology transformation lifecycle, offering services from initial technology roadmap development through to initial cloud landing zone deployments and proof of concept projects, through to full scale cloud transition and transformations.      Rackspace Private Cloud also offer services around data and application management and development. The Presales resource will act as a central SME for the broader Delivery team, solution architecture teams, and sales teams across the Rackspace Technology.     You will support sales cycles as an owner of Private Cloud opportunities, leading on SOW and pricing development, negotiation, and deal closure.      You will continuously assist in sales enablement efforts to keep our sales teams informed and updated on capabilities and competencies, as well as coaching and guiding team members on best ways to present, pitch, and close Private Cloud business in support of continued sales and revenue growth.     With significant experience in cloud and / or managed services, you will have a deep understanding of the role of embedded services organisations (ideally in a technology or managed services context).?      You will need to be an excellent written and verbal communicator.?      A team player and true collaborator, you will liaise and coordinate with other Rackspace teams globally, as well as central functions and individual business units across Rackspace to improve operational excellence.     JOB REQUIREMENTS:   Key Accountabilities   General:           Engage with Rackspace sales teams and Solution Architects to lead on Private Cloud presales engagements from pitching, requirements gathering, and scoping through to proposal development, pricing, SOW authoring, and contract closing.     Support presales efforts and deliver proposals, RFP/RFI responses, business case development, Statements of Work (SoW) inclusive of overview, scope, duration, activities, assumptions deliverables, resources, mitigation of shared risk, terms and conditions, assumptions, pricing, and executive summaries.     Excellent spoken written English skills for proposal and SOW development and pitching.     Contribute to the central development of the Private Cloud presales capability through development of reusable IP and collateral to standardise and accelerate the pitching and closing of Professional Services sales opportunities.     Advocate and actively promote the inclusion and positioning of professional services into wider sales engagements across enterprise and mid-market segments. Identify, address, or create countermeasures to increase the adoption of private cloud services as a sales technique to gain customer trust.     Maintain and keep accurate management information in systems of record such as Salesforce and Financial Force PSA tools.     Collaborate with supporting functions such as Commercial Business Operations, Legal, Product Development to drive standards and repeatability.     Collaborate with Sales pursuit teams, Delivery teams Project Managers, Technical Consultants, Solutions Architects, Partners, and extended cross-functional teams during presales and project delivery to ensure timely delivery and awareness of potential problems or risk requiring resolution or mitigation.     Utilise and improve commercial modelling tools in the effort of delivering a sound commercial and technical proposal inclusive of managed services and professional services as the means to help customers realize the value of Rackspace.     Build and maintain a network of cross-functional operational resources within Rackspace and across any relative partnerships to allow for higher productivity, increased business, and rapid resolution of problems and escalations.     Review client contracts, prepare appropriate and pragmatic commentary/mark-up in support of Regional PS Business leaders where needed.     Support the commercialization of packaged services including contribution to SOW templates and financial models.     Internal Partner Relationships:     Act as a point of contact and liaison with other internal business units, alliance, and sales teams for points of knowledge on presales process and Services, in support of Private Cloud leaders.     Support ongoing Private Cloud enablement of the wider business units such as Sales, Marketing, Support and the wider Global Solutions and Services team regarding capabilities and solutions.           Personal Specification   Skills / Knowledge         Background in services sales and understanding of current IT digital transformation market and client requirements.     Background in understanding project programme delivery, including various commercial models and delivery modes including Fixed Fee / Outcome driven projects vs Time Materials / Time Expenses engagements, Waterfall Prince2 delivery vs Scrum Agile delivery.     Background in understanding commercial pricing principles, including revenue, margin, the commercialisation of risk and associated levers pertinent to Services sales negotiation.     Working knowledge of Cloud platforms and providers and offerings including VMware, OpenStack and other private Cloud Solutions.     Deep working knowledge of commercial constructs, contract, and SOW creation.     Deep understanding of managed services and professional services sales cycles     Deep understanding of Programme and Project Management methodologies, deep understanding of Project Management, IT Service Management, and Service Delivery.     Customer centric skills with ability to evaluate and enhance customer experience flows/journeys.     Strong commercial awareness and background in measuring and driving ROI.     The skills to act as voice of the customer, understanding customer needs, motivations, and behaviours.     Proven problem-solving capability and analytical acumen.     Ideally you will have working knowledge of PSA, CRM and / or ERP systems.     Strong communication skills, including presentation skills.     Ability to handle multiple projects simultaneously, prioritizing workloads to meet competing deadlines, and make appropriate decisions considering the relative costs and benefits of potential actions.           Key Performance Indicators and Objectives:         Attainment of Private cloud sales targets       Private Cloud Sales Targets pipeline coverage     Increase in maturity, efficacy, and efficiency of the presales function.     High NPS scores on customer engagements for your team from Customers and other Rackers.     High levels of Racker engagement from your team (Rackerpulse)     360-degree feedback from peers sales     Interaction and contribution to extended peers and cross-functional teams.
column11: IT services, VMware, ERP, Project management, Agile, Presales, Scrum, RFP, CRM, Salesforce

column2: ISS is looking for dynamic individuals in the supply chain, risk and assurance function to drive CUSTOMER VALUE by securing assurance of subcontractors that provide compliance services to ISS.                      You will be responsible for supplier relationship management through remote quality assurance and performance management of key global supplier partners.                      You will deliver ASSURANCE through validating service provided across the globe, reviewing performance according to the customer contracts, providing input to the contract negotiations, maintain relationship with the service provider by ensuring operational performance.                      You will also drive PRODUCTIVITY efficiencies through automated review models and dashboards to deliver transparency. EVIDENCE of Supplier compliance and performance incl. active control of subcontractor deliveries.                        The roles primary focus will be supplier assurance and performance management aligned to the outsourced Compliance scope of services. The role will work cross-functionally to ensure effective supplier management and strong relationships with both ISS functions and countries.                              What you ll do:                            Supplier Relationship Management Ensure focus with global supplier(s), that delivery is consistent, aligned to scope and quality assured.                          Act as point of escalation, demonstrating global single point of contact for supplier relationship management on account(s)                          Ensure suppliers are managed in accordance with ISS and Customer supplier control obligations                          Project management of assurance program within ISS. This requires a hands-on delivery of strategic projects within the area of assurance to Global Key Account customers                          Support strategy of global supplier assurance effort and improve KPIs such as spend under contract, spend with preferred suppliers, % of deliveries managed as per customer assurance requirements, etc.                          Drive and implement industry-specific Supplier Assurance to: Analyse contracts and identify risks to develop relation specific assurance programs. Map account-specific assurance-related requirements, incl. understanding critical customer processes; Adapt and deploy group supplier management processes to other subcontractors, ensuring a close collaboration with our customers account- and site teams; Drive implementation of key strategic procurement initiatives including various supplier assurance activities such as coordinating supplier onboarding, contract SLAs, performance management, audits of suppliers, etc.                          Interact with customer and internal stakeholders and deliver supplier assurance oversight and reporting across key accounts                          Maintain, review and improve subcontractor performance, identify gaps and adjust against service levels, any non-performance claims are tracked and accounted                          Implement ISS best practice operations within supplier relationship management and contract management                          Maintain subcontractor relationship in alignment with ISS s responsible sourcing requirements and work with subcontractors to close any gaps and claims                            Who you ll work with:                            GKA Global Account Director / Global Ops Directors ensure in first instance Compliance Services are managed effectively.                          GKA Functional Leads - Support GKA Operations & functional leads with Stakeholder engagement meetings                          Supplier partner key contacts                          Interact with senior ISS stakeholders in establishing a fact base for implementing and driving performance management of suppliers and subcontractors                          Interact with our customers to define, deliver, and update on the assurance progress and enable a risk                          Drive results through working with country procurement, operations organizations and subcontractor.                            Key qualifications:                            Experience with supply chain and compliance activities in supply chain environments in facility management or mechanical engineering                          Experience in operational vendor / third party risk and compliance                          Experience in Vendor Assurance & SLA compliance in facility management industry                          Experience with working with suppliers of different size and industry.                          Worked with change management and successfully navigated in a complex matrix structure with senior stakeholders.                          Experience from international and multicultural global organizations.                          Excellent English skills written and verbally                            Personal skills you excel:                            On a personal level, you are structured and demonstrates energy, persistence, and determination in the implementation of projects and initiatives.                          You are diplomatic and persuasive and demonstrates good understanding of the general business principles.                          Moreover, you have great interpersonal skills in building relationship and networking with both internal and external stakeholders.                          Knowledge of Technical Services

column2: Rackspace is seeking a Private Cloud Associate Presales Project Manager to join our rapidly growing Private Cloud team     The successful candidate will be experienced in all aspects of services sales & presales, and will be responsible for delivering successful, efficient pre-sales engagements, writing clear and detailed proposals and statements of work, to serve our potential and existing customers requiring assistance in the transformation of IT Services within their business including technology strategy & roadmap development, cloud landing zone design & deployment, Proof of Concept / Proof of Value deployment and pilot migration, infrastructure and application consolidation, full scale cloud migration, transformation, optimization, and lifecycle services     The successful candidate will be adept at proposal and SOW writing, able to work with sellers, project managers, engagement managers, and customers to rapidly understand engagement requirements and outcomes and translate these into proposals and executable Statement of Work (SOW) documents which suitably detail technical scope, assumptions, dependencies, timelines, fees, and pre-requisites     The successful candidate will be dynamic, energetic, adaptable, and able to successfully collaborate and manage a diverse group of stakeholders across the business     The role will be responsible for supporting presales engagements.            The typical activities involved with this role are:         Engage with Rackspace sales teams and Solution Architects to lead on presales engagements from pitching, requirements gathering, and scoping through to proposal development, pricing, SOW authoring, and contract closing.     Support presales efforts and deliver proposals and Statements of Work (SOW) documents inclusive of overview, scope, duration, activities, assumptions deliverables, resources, mitigation of shared risk, terms and conditions, assumptions, pricing, and executive summaries.      Act as a source of expertise in SOW generation and negotiation, including the commercialization of risk.     Maintain and keep accurate management information in systems of record such as Salesforce and Financial Force PSA tools.      The Presales resource is expected to engage both directly with Customers and indirectly in support of Solution Architects and Sales executives to support, facilitate, and drive the development and closure of Private Cloud sales opportunities.      Rackspace Private Cloud assist customers with all aspects of their technology transformation lifecycle, offering services from initial technology roadmap development through to initial cloud landing zone deployments and proof of concept projects, through to full scale cloud transition and transformations.      Rackspace Private Cloud also offer services around data and application management and development. The Presales resource will act as a central SME for the broader Delivery team, solution architecture teams, and sales teams across the Rackspace Technology.     You will support sales cycles as an owner of Private Cloud opportunities, leading on SOW and pricing development, negotiation, and deal closure.      You will continuously assist in sales enablement efforts to keep our sales teams informed and updated on capabilities and competencies, as we'll as coaching and guiding team members on best ways to present, pitch, and close Private Cloud business in support of continued sales and revenue growth.     With significant experience in cloud and / or managed services, you will have a deep understanding of the role of embedded services organisations (ideally in a technology or managed services context).      You will need to be an excellent written and verbal communicator.      A team player and true collaborator, you will liaise and coordinate with other Rackspace teams globally, as we'll as central functions and individual business units across Rackspace to improve operational excellence
column11: IT services, VMware, ERP, Project management, Agile, Presales, Scrum, RFP, CRM, Salesforce

Inclusive culture and career growth opportunities      Global IT Organization which collaborates across U.S., Canada, Europe, India and Australia      Challenging, collaborative, and team-based environment          What you will do:            The Mgr Of Site Integration and Strategy will be a key role at the India Office      The core responsibilities of the role will include onboarding, transitioning, and ramping up new teams to the India office and integrating them into the global workforce      The role initially leads the engineering, product, and delivery teams during the ramp-up phase, and then transitions them to functional leaders while moving on to the next teams      Additionally, this role is also responsible for supporting the site leader in running the overall office through activities such as financial operations, campus hiring programs, innovation initiatives, vendor management, and other partnerships              Site Integration Strategy:          Create and own the playbook for onboarding new teams into the India Office.      Collaborate with global counterparts to align processes, ways of working and best practices for integrating new teams into the broader organization.      Foster a culture of inclusivity and cross-functional collaboration among global teams, encouraging knowledge-sharing and leveraging expertise from diverse locations.      Own and operationalize processes and activities to ensure smooth onboarding, transition and integration of new teams and functions at the India Office.      Establish a continuous improvement process with KPIs to improve the onboarding, transition and integration of new teams and functions at the India Office.          Transition Leadership          Working with senior leadership, develops and executes a comprehensive onboarding and integration strategy for new engineering, product, and delivery teams starting at the India IT office.      Participates in all hiring activities as needed for the teams.      Provide initial transitional people leadership as the organization ramps up and the leader for the team is hired in.      Responsible to build out a strong functioning team with product and engineering excellence to deliver on long term business capabilities.      Guide and lead teams during the initial ramp-up phase, providing direction, support, and mentorship to facilitate a smooth transition.      Create and execute on a change management strategy for the new team.      Facilitate the transition of ramped-up teams to local leader(s) and functional leader(s), ensuring a seamless handover while maintaining strong cross-team collaboration.      During Transitional leadership Role      Partner with key stakeholders & other leaders across all levels to drive solutions to meet business needs      Manage and lead multiple global modernization, engineering, QA, and DevSecOps teams for multiple product and technical domains in an Agile environment      Accountable for the end-to-end technical delivery of complex technical Epics, or technical aspects of larger Epics to achieve business outcomes that may span more than one product team or technical domain      Partners with various leaders within IT as needed to forge key agreements around solution approaches / designs and operating principles      Serves as a liaison with other IT partners for matters relating to their owned products (inc. security related aspects)      Responsible & accountable for structuring & sustaining both the Organization Structure and corresponding Value Delivery Network (Agile Teams)      Sets the vision for the function and ensures the team is comprised of highly skilled professionals who are empowered, engaged in continuous improvement, and invested in developing their capabilities.      Sponsors IT driven initiatives to enable alignment to a domain roadmap or improve operational efficiencies or business effectiveness.      Key point of escalation for team to remove blockers.              Site Ops & Strategy:          Assist the site leader in overseeing financial operations, including budgeting, resource allocation, and cost optimization.      Help in creating and executing strategies to enhance the value proposition of the India Office. Participate / Lead implement new capabilities at the India Office.      Assist and help with campus hiring programs, supporting recruitment efforts to attract top talent and foster a diverse workforce.      Spearhead initiatives aimed at fostering innovation within the office, encouraging creative thinking and continuous improvement.      Promote a culture of innovation by organizing workshops, hackathons, and knowledge-sharing sessions among teams.      Help evaluate and select vendors for various services, negotiating contracts, and ensuring optimal vendor performance and value for the organization. Establish and maintain strong partnerships with external organizations to drive collaboration, expand opportunities, and access new markets.      Implement performance metrics and KPIs to measure the effectiveness of team integration and office operations.      Prepare regular reports for senior management, providing insights into progress, achievements, and areas for improvement.      Facilitate compliance with relevant regulations, policies, and industry standards, safeguarding data privacy and maintaining a secure and compliant working environment.      Help oversee and facilitate facility management          Overall Leadership          Model lean-agile leadership behaviors:      Practice Servant Leadership, enable teams and talent      Foster an Engineering Mindset      Continually focus on eliminating waste and delays      Eliminate demotivating policies and procedures      Create a culture of relentless improvement Provide the space for teams to innovate          Accountable for developing Talent and Effective Teams - including but not limited to:      Demonstrates a commitment and passion for associate development, driving the talent agenda.      Driving a high performance and continuous development culture and focus within the function that meets long term organizational talent needs.      Sets clear goals and expectations around performance, providing timely feedback and stretching targets      Sets the highest standards for talent development, holding self and others accountable for meeting crucial talent needs for the future across the business      Works with peers to identify opportunities to develop cross functionally      Sets a standard for driving continuous improvement and focus upon being a high performance organization.              Special projects as assigned          Influences peer group and senior leadership team on strategic direction for improving the efficiency of delivering IT services and driving value for the business      Comfortable with some degree of ambiguity. Politically astute; able to negotiate under potentially stressful situations.      Engages external business partners, outsourcers, and offshore development partners as needed to supplement in-house staff in the execution of technical project deliverables. column2: Job Description: Project Manager Position Overview:  We are seeking a highly organized and experienced Project Manager to oversee the seamless execution of multiple projects, from contract closure to final deliverables. The ideal candidate will possess excellent communication skills, meticulous attention to detail, and a proactive approach to problem-solving. The Project Manager will collaborate closely with internal teams, external stakeholders, and clients to ensure project success and customer satisfaction. Key Responsibilities: Project Management: Efficiently manage multiple projects simultaneously, adhering to timelines and budgets. Act as the primary point of contact for clients, addressing inquiries and concerns promptly. Ensure all project activities align with contractual obligations and quality standards. Submittal Management: Generate, distribute, and monitor submittals, ensuring timely submission and approval. Custom Product Drawing Flow Management: Facilitate the flow of custom product drawings between LEDPAX Engineering and clients, ensuring accuracy and compliance with specifications. Shipping Schedule and Bill of Materials (BOM) Production: Develop and issue weekly shipping schedules and BOMs to clients, keeping them informed of project progress and delivery timelines. Purchase Order Generation: Create purchase orders accurately and in a timely manner, coordinating with vendors and suppliers to procure necessary materials and services. Applications Engineering Documentation Review: Review and approve applications engineering documentation, verifying technical specifications and requirements. Inventory Management and Logistics Assistance: Oversee inventory management processes, supporting the logistics coordinator in tracking lead times, item reception, storage, and delivery for each project. Change Order Management: Produce and monitor change orders as necessary, documenting alterations to project scope, schedule, and budget. Invoicing: Generate project invoices based on completed deliverables, ensuring accuracy and timeliness in billing processes. Qualifications: Bachelor's degree in Business Administration, Engineering, or related field (preferred). Proven experience in project management, preferably in a technical or engineering environment. Strong organizational skills and attention to detail. Excellent communication and interpersonal abilities. Proficiency in project management software and Microsoft Office Suite. Ability to thrive in a fast-paced, deadline-driven environment. Demonstrated problem-solving skills and ability to make sound decisions under pressure.

Manage end-to-end programme of work focused on closing down a number of end of life??platforms and applications including planning, execution, monitoring, and closing phases.  2.        Develop comprehensive project plans, schedules, budgets, and resource allocation to ensure successful project delivery.  3.        Coordinate with internal stakeholders, such as engineering, operations, and procurement teams, to define project requirements and objectives.  4.        Lead project kick-off meetings, regular status meetings, and project review sessions to keep stakeholders informed of project progress and address any issues or concerns.  5.        Identify project risks and develop mitigation strategies to minimize potential impact on project timelines and deliverables.  6.        Monitor project performance metrics, analyze project data, and prepare progress reports for management review.  7.        Ensure adherence to industry standards, regulations, and best practices throughout the project lifecycle.  8.        Work with Procurement to manage vendor relationships, where applicable. Requirements: 1.        Bachelor's degree in Telecommunications, Engineering, Project Management, or related field. Master's degree or PMP certification is a plus.  2.        Proven experience (10 years) as a Project Manager managing large-scale infrastructure projects.  3.        Knowledge of telecom technologies, networks, and systems, including fibre optic, wireless, and data transmission technologies preferrable  4.        Strong understanding of project management methodologies, such as Agile, Waterfall, and hybrid approaches.  5.        Excellent leadership, communication, and interpersonal skills, with the ability to collaborate effectively with cross-functional teams and external stakeholders.  6.        Proficiency in project management tools and software, such as MS Project.  7.        Demonstrated ability to manage multiple projects simultaneously, prioritize tasks, and adapt to changing priorities in a fast-paced environment.  8.        Analytical mindset with strong problem-solving and decision-making skills.  9.        Flexibility to travel as needed to project sites and vendor locations    Preferred candidate profile   Perks and benefits

column2: Delivery  Lending Profile Project Management Bengaluru Experience:  2 - 6 years What You'll Do: We are looking for a detail-oriented technical project manager to oversee all project operations from inception to execution. A Technical Project Manager is responsible for providing project planning and management for established initiatives within a company. They ensure that projects are completed to specification, within an established time frame and budget. A Technical Project Manager is the lead subject matter expert within the company regarding technology concerns. Additionally, they will hire and train additional support member in a business's tech department.  Meet with clients to take detailed ordering briefs and clarify specific requirements of each project.  Assist in the definition of project scope and objectives, involving all relevant internal stakeholders and ensuring technical feasibility.  Develop a project plan for each client, detailing the tasks that need to be completed for the timely installation of customized software systems.  Analyze, plan, and develop requirements and standards in reference to scheduled projects.  Coordinating with cross-discipline team members to make sure that all parties are on track with project requirements, deadlines, and schedules.  Delegate project tasks based on junior staff members' individual strengths, skill sets, and experience levels.Preparing status reports by gathering, analyzing, and summarizing relevant information.  Facilitating change requests to ensure that all parties are informed of the impacts on schedule and budget.  Obtaining customer acceptance of project deliverables.  Creating a specialized document for each client, detailing all customizations made.  Conducting post-project evaluation and identifying successful and unsuccessful project elements. Who Youll Need To Be:  Bachelors degree in computer science, engineering, computer information science, information technology, or a related field with Masters degree in management.  Proven working experience in project management.  Excellent client-facing and internal communication skills.  Excellent written and verbal communication skills.  Sound technical knowledge.  Basic SQL Knowledge.  Basic Database Understanding.  The ability to multitask effectively.  The ability to work independently and as part of a team.  Strong analytical and problem-solving skills.  Excellent organizational and time management skills.  Fintech domain knowledge is an added advantage. Who We Are:  Home (m2pfintech.com) Founded in the year 2014 and headquartered in Chennai, M2P Fintech is Asias largest API infrastructure company offering a wide gamut of services that enable businesses of any scale to embed financial services. M2P Fintech is an omni-channel platform that operates in over 20 markets across the Asia Pacific, MENA, and Oceania regions. M2P works with over 100+ banks, 100+ NBFCs, and has clocked over 600+ Fintech engagements across various industries serving over 35 million end users. M2P pioneers in next-gen fintech through innovative offerings across the payments, lending, and banking ecosystem. Our comprehensive tech-stack powers the core banking system, core lending suite, BNPL, customized credit cards, prepaid cards, and much more. M2P is backed by reputed investors  fintech industry veterans (such as Amrish Rau  PayU, Kunal Shah  CRED, Jitendra Gupta  Jupiter, etc) as well as reputed international venture capital funds (such as Insight Partners, MUFG, Tiger Global, Beenext, Flourish Ventures and Omidyar Network). Why Join Us:  We are a Fun bunch to be with..!  People First Culture  People Friendly Guidelines  No Queue Leaves  Equal Opportunity Organization  Better Half Program  Buddy Referral Program  Health & Wellness Programs  Comprehensive Medical Insurance for dependents including parents  Tax Saving Structure  Sports Clubs & Fun Committees  Office Libraries  Snack Pantries  and much more fun to be part of Role & responsibilities   Preferred candidate profile   Perks and benefits

column2: Responsible for overseeing and managing the implementation of business intelligence projects within an organization.  Work closely with stakeholders, including business leaders, IT teams, and data analysts, to define project objectives, scope, and deliverables. Key Responsibilities : 1. Project Planning: Develop and maintain project plans, including timelines, resource allocation, and budgeting. Identify project risks and develop mitigation strategies. 2. Requirement Gathering: Collaborate with business stakeholders to understand their data and reporting needs. Translate business requirements into technical specifications for the BI team. 3. Team Management: Lead a team of data analysts, developers, and other project resources. Assign tasks, monitor progress, and ensure timely delivery of project milestones. 4. Data Analysis: Analyze and interpret complex data sets to identify trends, patterns, and insights. Use data visualization tools to present findings to stakeholders. 5. Technical Expertise: Possess a strong understanding of BI tools, data warehousing concepts, and data integration techniques. Stay updated with the latest trends and advancements in the BI field. 6. Stakeholder Communication: Facilitate effective communication between business stakeholders, IT teams, and project resources. Provide regular project updates, address concerns, and manage expectations. 7. Quality Assurance: Ensure the accuracy, completeness, and reliability of data and reports generated by the BI system. Conduct thorough testing and validation to identify and resolve any issues. 8. Change Management: Implement change management strategies to ensure smooth adoption of new BI solutions. Provide training and support to end-users to maximize the utilization of BI tools. 9. Project Documentation: Maintain comprehensive project documentation, including project plans, requirements, design documents, and user manuals. Ensure documentation is up-to-date and accessible to relevant stakeholders. 10. Continuous Improvement: Identify opportunities for process improvement and optimization within the BI project lifecycle. Implement best practices and lessons learned from previous projects. Requirements for a BI Project Manager typically include: - Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, Information Systems, or a related field. - Proven experience in managing BI projects, preferably in a project management role. - Strong analytical and problem-solving skills, with the ability to interpret complex data. - Proficiency in BI tools such as Tableau, Power BI, or QlikView. - Knowledge of data warehousing concepts, ETL processes, and data modeling. - Excellent communication and interpersonal skills to effectively collaborate with stakeholders. - Project management certification (e.g., PMP) is a plus. - Familiarity with Agile or Scrum methodologies is desirable. - Ability to work in a fast-paced, dynamic environment and manage multiple projects simultaneously.

column2: Project Management Manager who will lead our Project Management team in delivering exceptional software implementation projects for our clients in the reconciliation industry. As a Project Management Manager, you will play a key role in ensuring the successful execution of projects, meeting client requirements, and driving continuous improvement initiatives within the organization. As a part of the Project Management Team, your work will include but shall not be limited to: 1. Team Leadership: Provide strong leadership and guidance to the project management team, fostering a collaborative and high-performance work environment. Mentor and coach team members, helping them develop their project management skills and achieve their career goals. Promote a culture of accountability, transparency, and continuous learning within the team 2. Project Planning and Execution: Develop comprehensive project plans, including scope, objectives, deliverables, milestones, and timelines, in collaboration with stakeholders Define project tasks and resource requirements, ensuring optimal allocation of resources to meet project goals. Monitor project progress against plan, identify deviations, and implement corrective actions as necessary to keep projects on track. Conduct regular project status meetings with team members and stakeholders to communicate progress, address issues, and align expectations. 3. Client Relationship Management: Serve as the primary point of contact for key clients, building and maintaining strong relationships based on trust and mutual respect. Proactively engage with clients to understand their needs, preferences, and concerns, and ensure that project deliverables align with their expectations. Effectively communicate project progress, milestones, and deliverables to clients, addressing any questions or concerns in a timely and professional manner. Act as a client advocate within the organization, ensuring that client feedback and requirements are prioritized and addressed appropriately 4. Risk Management: Identify potential risks and issues early in the project lifecycle through comprehensive risk assessments and analysis. Develop risk mitigation strategies and contingency plans to address identified risks and minimize their impact on project outcomes. Monitor and evaluate project risks throughout the project lifecycle, proactively implementing risk responses and adjustments to mitigate emerging threats. 5. Quality Assurance: Maintain a focus on quality throughout the project lifecycle, adhering to established quality standards and best practices. Develop and implement robust testing and quality assurance processes to ensure that deliverables meet or exceed client expectations. Conduct regular reviews and inspections of project deliverables to identify and address any quality issues or discrepancies promptly. 6. Continuous Improvement: Drive continuous process improvement initiatives within the project management team, leveraging industry best practices, lessons learned, and feedback from stakeholders. Identify opportunities to streamline project management processes, enhance efficiency, and optimize resource utilization to improve project delivery outcomes. Encourage a culture of innovation and experimentation within the team, empowering team members to propose and implement creative solutions to project challenges. 7. Cross-Functional Collaboration: Collaborate closely with cross-functional teams, including software development, product management, sales, and customer support, to ensure alignment and successful project outcomes. Facilitate effective communication and collaboration among team members and stakeholders, fostering a spirit of teamwork and shared accountability. Proactively resolve conflicts and address dependencies between project teams, ensuring that all stakeholders are working towards common goals and objectives. 8. Reporting and Communication: Keep management and stakeholders informed of project progress, milestones, and potential risks through regular status updates, presentations, and written reports. Facilitate transparent and open communication channels between the project team, management, and stakeholders, ensuring that everyone is aware of project status, objectives, and challenges. Proactively escalate any significant issues or concerns to senior management, providing timely recommendations and proposed solutions to address them effectively. Solicit feedback from stakeholders throughout the project lifecycle, incorporating their input and preferences to ensure alignment with organizational goals and client expectations. Act as a liaison between the project team and external stakeholders, representing the project's interests and advocating for resources, support, and buy-in as needed. 9. Technical Expertise: Stay abreast of industry trends and best practices in data analysis, leveraging new tools and technologies to enhance analytical capabilities. Provide guidance and support to internal teams on data analysis techniques, tools, and methodologies, fostering a culture of data-driven decision-making and continuous improvement. 10. Team Management and Development: Manage and develop a team of Associate Project Managers, fostering a culture of collaboration, accountability, and continuous improvement. Provide ongoing training and professional development opportunities to enhance team members' skills and capabilities. Serve as a point of escalation for complex client issues, guiding team members in effective problem-solving and conflict resolution. Desired Candidate Profile: 2-5 years of experience in project management, preferably in SaaS or IT industry, with a proven track record of successfully delivering complex projects on time and within budget. Strong leadership skills with the ability to inspire and motivate cross-functional teams to achieve project goals. Excellent communication and interpersonal skills, with the ability to effectively engage and build relationships with clients, stakeholders, and team members. Proficiency in project management software tools such as JIRA, Asana, or Trello. Strong analytical and problem-solving skills, with the ability to quickly identify issues, develop solutions, and drive resolution. Demonstrated ability to thrive in a fast-paced, dynamic environment, managing multiple projects simultaneously while maintaining a high level of attention to detail Education Qualification: BE/ BTech/ ME/ MTech/ BSc/ MSc/ MCA or other equivalent technical degree required.   Reasons to Join Us: Young Environment : Join a vibrant and innovative work culture where creativity and collaboration thrive. Be part of a dynamic team of professionals dedicated to pushing boundaries and driving success. Work-Life Balance:  Enjoy a Monday to Friday-work schedule, allowing for a healthy balance between work and personal life. We value our employees' well-being and believe in fostering a supportive and flexible work environment. Opportunity to Grow:  Take your career to the next level with ample opportunities for professional development and growth. Whether you're looking to expand your skills, take on new challenges, or advance your career, we provide the resources and support you need to succeed.   For more Information about the company & work culture please visit the following sites - Company website - https://www.cointab.net/ Linkedin - https://www.linkedin.com/company/cointab/ Instagram - https://www.instagram.com/cointabhq/
