column2: Job   Responsibilities: Engagement begins with an early-stage consultation to understand the partners needs, resources and targeted timeframe. Conversations will continue as a co-design solution with the partner, agreeing on scope, and timelines (solutioning) is created. Close coordination with multiple stakeholders and teams internally will be required to develop, implement, and launch the agreed upon solution, so fundamental project management skill is key. The role holder will have end-to-end engagement responsibility for the cross-border solution designed as the client onboarding lead, ensuring a successful launch. ??The role will be a key team member of the NIPL Implementation & Commercialization group responsible for leading solution design client discussions for clients to offer cross-border acceptance, remittance and license model. ??The role will be to work closely across various teams to successfully develop solutions that supports scale the business. As  one of the most diverse roles at NIPL, you will excel at handling ambiguity and uncertainty. The ideal candidate should know  what it is like to start something from scratch, grow it structurally and methodically. ??Collaborate with clients to understand their business challenges and serve as a technical advisor on cross border solutions and offered services. ??Analyze complex requirements and propose multiple viable solution options & recommendations that meet client needs. ??In collaboration with other teams, manage overall client onboarding and implementation with clients through to support their program launch. ??Identify gaps and opportunities for solution completeness to help deliver best in class money movement solutions. ??Provide technical leadership and guidance to clients to help accelerate solution design and readiness to adopt new product platform features. ??Acquire deep understanding of APIs (Card/Account/Wallet) and develop ability to explain complex API concepts to clients. ??Collaborate with cross-functional business, product, technology, client services & other teams to drive best in class client solutions. ??Work closely with the sales & account managers to plan and manage the clients integration strategy, schedule, and deadlines. ??Collaborate with the sales and account management teams to identify new business opportunities and develop technical proposals. ??Monitor and analyze the effectiveness of implemented solutions and make necessary adjustments to optimize the performance. ??Create presentations for internal approvals and external client facing discussions. ??Communicate effectively with clients and internal stakeholders at various levels (including executive leadership). ??You will represent the voice of the customer to internal stakeholders. Strong customer-facing communication skills and technical aptitude. ??Handholding customer right from Onboarding, integration with various internal systems and APIs, certification to go-live. Essentially a go-to-person for a customer during the entire enablement journey. ??Manage requirement gathering, manage project schedules and participate in performance standards discussions. ??Create presentations, detailed solutioning document, user manual etc. supporting agreed scope of work. ??Create Test Case/Test Condition documents and Test specification documents.   Skills   &   Qualifications: ??Minimum of 13+ years in BFSI domain with a working experience of payments industry, its ecosystem and the various players involved in its value chain (acquirer, issuers, processors, networks, payment service providers, remitters). ??Experience in cross-border remittance operations, foreign exchange rates will be a plus. ??Experience in software/technology with practical experience with systems analysis & design techniques. ??Ability to manage client relationships, engaging in both business-level and technical solutioning discussions at various levels of the organization. ??Retail Banking, Central Banking, Forex, Card payments and payments systems like UPI, NEFT, RTGS, SWIFT, Reconciliation. ??The role requires a unique combination of product expertise, problem solving ability, flexibility with rapid changes, intellectual curiosity, and attention to detail. ??Proven ability to understand and dive deep into technical details when needed. Possess a unique combination of product expertise, problem solving ability, flexibility with rapid changes, intellectual curiosity, and attention to detail. ??Excellent problem-solving and data analysis skills with a strong emphasis on results. ??Strong team player, self-directed and able to work independently at coordinating cross functional activities, data collection, strong decision-making abilities to raise issues at appropriate times and work towards a shared goal. ??Critical thinker, strong organization skills, ability to create solutions that are well planned. ??Management Consulting experience beneficial but not necessary. ??Comfortable working closely with cross-functional teams. ??Excellent communication, storytelling, and presentation skills ??Open to travel within India and Internationally. ??Knowledge in building presentation decks, word proposals and excel. ??Top notch verbal & written communication skills and influencing skills.

column2: The responsibility of a Project Manager is to ensure the successful completion of projects within scope, on time, and within budget      This involves coordinating resources, managing risks, communicating effectively, and providing leadership to the project team      Ultimately, the Project Manager is accountable for delivering the projects objectives while meeting team member expectations and maintaining quality standards            Primary Responsibilities:            Develop comprehensive project plans outlining tasks, timelines, resources and budget requirement.      Coordinating internal team members, external third parties/vendor and other collaborators to ensure resources are allocated effectively for the perfect execution of projects.      Ensure that all projects are delivered on time, within scope, and within budget by monitoring progress, identifying potential delays, and implementing solution to keep project on track.      Tracking projects expenses and manage budget to ensure project is within financial constraints.      Report and raise to management as needed.      Accountable for implementing project contract terms and conditions for the project.      Supports and presents status review meetings weekly with management.      Ensures involvement of site team / local business partners at the appropriate project phase      Responsible for the smooth handover of the project to the LCS Team.      Identifying, assessing and Perform risk management to minimize project risks.      Facilitating clear and open communication among team members, collaborators, and clients to ensure everyone is informed and aligned.      Being responsible for quality control measures to ensure deliverables meet project requirements and industry standards.      Managing changes to project scope, schedule, and objectives while minimizing disruption and maintaining project alignment.      Creating and maintaining project documentation, including plans, progress reports, and issue logs.      Establish and maintain relationships with third parties/vendors.      Create and maintain comprehensive project documentation.      Follow up with Customer for payment collection achieved and follow-up through accounts receipt and closure.          Knowledge, Skills, and Abilities:          Understanding of project management principles, methodologies and standard processes.      Ability to lead and motivate teams, delegate tasks effectively, and provide direction and guidance to achieve project goals.      Strong verbal and written communication skills to effectively convey information, negotiate contracts, and manage collaborator expectations.      Excellent organizational abilities to plan and prioritize tasks, manage resources, and coordinate schedules to meet project deadlines.      Capacity to identify issues, analyze problems, and develop creative solutions to overcome challenges that may arise during the project lifecycle.      Understanding of budgeting, cost estimation, and financial management to ensure projects are delivered within budget constraints.      Proficiency in identifying, assessing, and mitigating risks to minimize potential disruptions to project progress.      Familiarity with project management tools and software, as well as relevant industry-specific knowledge to effectively manage projects in various domains.      Ability to negotiate contracts, resolve conflicts, and manage collaborator expectations to achieve mutually beneficial outcomes.      Flexibility to adapt to changing project requirements, priorities, and environments while maintaining focus on project objectives.      Capability to build and maintain positive relationships with clients, understand their needs, and ensure their satisfaction throughout the project lifecycle.      Effective time management skills to prioritize tasks, allocate resources efficiently, and meet project timeline.            Education / Experience Required:            Bachelor s degree or equivalent experience in engineering (Mechanical, Materials, Electrical and Instrumentation) required.      demonstrated ability in proven project management experience      Conversant in English is a must and ability to speak Hindi is an advantage.

column2: The company is looking to recruit a skilled and experienced Project Management Team Lead to oversee candi s project management team        As the team lead, you will be responsible for managing project managers and ensuring the successful execution of projects from initiation to completion as per the defined PTO      Your role will involve providing leadership, guidance, and technical expertise to the team, as well as collaborating with cross-functional teams and external stakeholders to achieve project objectives      The ideal candidate will have a strong background in photovoltaic solar project management, excellent leadership skills, and a passion for renewable energy             Specifically, the job requires taking ownership of the following:                Project oversight            Review and sign off on several aspects of the project such as bill of material (BOM), project task order (PTO), variations requests, construction timeline, subcontractor payments, etc.          Manage, negotiate and enforce contracts with EPCs and any subcontractors, suppliers, and service providers to optimize the project costs, scope and timelines.          Ensure compliance with quality and EHS standards, regulations and requirements throughout the project lifecycle.            Team management:            Hire, lead and manage a team of project managers responsible for solar projects.          Provide leadership, guidance, and technical expertise to project managers.          Coach and mentor project managers to support their professional development and career growth.          Foster a culture of continuous improvement, innovation, and knowledge sharing within the project management team.            Stakeholder management            Foster positive relationships with stakeholders to support successful project outcomes.          Collaborate with clients, EPCs, and regulatory authorities to address project requirements and resolve any issues.          Communicate project updates to management and stakeholders            Performance monitoring            Develop monitoring and reporting frameworks tracking team and individual performance.          Control and enforce data hygiene and timely reports on project progress, variations and challenges.          Ensure timely and cost-effective project delivery in line with targets and objectives.          Identify opportunities for processes, methodologies and documentations optimisation.            Technical expertise:            Provide technical expertise and support to project managers, assisting with complex technical challenges, quality/EHS standards, design optimization, and troubleshooting.          Stay updated on industry trends, emerging technologies, and regulatory changes relevant to PV solar projects. column2: As the    Project Management & Compliance Lead   , you will play a critical role in ensuring the successful execution of projects within our organization. Key Responsibilities         Coordinate Projects   : Oversee project execution, ensuring alignment with organizational goals and adherence to project constraints (time, cost, scope, quality, risk, and resources). Technical Understanding   : Leverage technical background to comprehend cybersecurity and IT-related aspects. GRC Expertise   : Utilize GRC (Governance, Risk, and Compliance) tools and best practices (e.g., ZenGRC, OneTrust, RSA Archer). Relationship Building   : Develop influential relationships across senior levels of the organization.       Strategic Planning   : Lead strategic planning sessions and facilitate workstream deliverables.       Feedback Loop   : Proactively seek feedback from supervisors and managers during project deliverable finalization.       Testing and Surveillance   : Create and test surveillance mechanisms to ensure compliance. column2: We are seeking a highly skilled and motivated Project Manager to join our team. The ideal candidate will have a strong background in project management, with specific experience in the data analytics field within the financial industry. The Project Manager will be responsible for overseeing the planning, execution, and delivery of data analytics projects, ensuring they are completed on time, within budget, and to the highest quality standards. Key Responsibilities: Project manage data analytics projects from initiation to closure, ensuring alignment with client objectives, timelines, and budget constraints. Collaborate with cross-functional teams, including data scientists, analysts, developers, and stakeholders, to define project scope, requirements, and deliverables. Develop project plans, schedules, and resource allocation to effectively manage project timelines and resources. Monitor project progress, identify risks and issues, and implement mitigation strategies to ensure successful project delivery. Track project budgets and expenditures, providing regular updates to stakeholders on project financial status. Communicate project status, milestones, and dependencies to internal teams and external clients, fostering transparency and collaboration. Conduct post-project reviews and lessons learned sessions to identify areas for improvement and best practices. What We Are Looking For: Project Management Skills: The ideal candidate should demonstrate proficiency in project management, including planning, execution, and delivery of data analytics projects. Financial Industry Knowledge: A deep understanding of the financial industry and its nuances is essential, enabling effective tailoring of data analytics solutions to meet client needs. Communication and Collaboration: Strong communication skills, coupled with the ability to collaborate effectively with cross-functional teams and stakeholders, are critical for success in this role. Experience in Project Management tools such as Microsoft Planner, Microsoft Project, Microsoft Lists and more.  Qualifications: Bachelor's degree in business administration, Computer Science, Engineering, or related field; PMP certification is a plus. Proven experience (10 years) in project management, preferably in the data analytics field within the financial industry. Strong understanding of data analytics concepts, methodologies, and tools, with the ability to effectively communicate technical concepts to non-technical stakeholders. Excellent leadership, communication, and interpersonal skills, with the ability to build and maintain relationships at all levels of the organization. Solid organizational and time management skills, with the ability to prioritize tasks and manage multiple projects simultaneously.   Demonstrated problem-solving and decision-making abilities, with a focus on delivering high-quality results under tight deadlines. Proficiency in project management tools such as Microsoft Planner, Jira, or similar software. Why Join Us: Impactful Work: At our firm, you'll have the opportunity to work on cutting-edge data analytics projects that directly impact the financial industry. Your contributions will help our clients make informed decisions and drive positive outcomes in their businesses. Professional Growth: We are committed to fostering a culture of continuous learning and development. You'll have access to resources, training programs, and mentorship opportunities to enhance your skills and advance your career in the dynamic field of data analytics. Collaborative Environment: Join a team of talented professionals who are passionate about leveraging data analytics to solve complex challenges. You'll collaborate with experts from diverse backgrounds, fostering innovation, creativity, and collaboration. Mission-Driven Culture: Our firm is driven by a shared mission to empower our clients with actionable insights and solutions. You'll be part of a mission-driven organization that values integrity, excellence, and making a positive impact in the financial industry. Ckuens Analytics provide equal employment opportunities to all employees and applicants for employment and prohibits discrimination and harassment of any type without regard to race, color, religion, age, sex, national origin, disability status, genetics, sexual orientation, gender identity or expression, or any other characteristic protected by federal, state or local laws.

The Project Manager is responsible for a broad range of complex market research, administrative, and technical activities. Project handling: Monitoring job progress and providing feedback; ensuring deadlines are met and taking corrective action where necessary; liaising with client service and data processing on code frames and DP specs; handling project-related queries from data collection or data processing post field; ensuring work meets quality standards. column2: ClinicMind, the nation s leader in multi-specialty Electronic Healthcare Records (EHR) software and Revenue Cycle Management (RCM) services, is looking for a full-time Technical Project Manager     If you re excited to be part of a winning team, ClinicMind is a perfect place to get ahead               RESPONSIBILITIES        Oversee the entire lifecycle of healthcare products from concept through development, launch, and phase-out. Ensure the delivery of high-quality products or solutions by implementing appropriate quality management processes.         Identify and assess project risks and develop mitigation strategies.         Managing project budgets through budget management, cost estimation, and financial reporting. Work closely with key stakeholders, including customers, users, and senior executives, to gather requirements, communicate progress, and align product vision. column2: The   Project Manager  is responsible for leading and managing projects within a specific functional area of an organization. They collaborate with cross-functional teams, stakeholders, and subject matter experts to define project objectives, scope, and deliverables. The Functional Project Manager ensures successful project execution by managing timelines, resources, and risks, while also facilitating communication and providing regular updates to stakeholders. They are responsible for delivering projects that meet quality standards, budget requirements, and stakeholder expectations.  Role & responsibilities      Possess 5 to 15 years of  project management  experience.  Plan and facilitate workshops to  define project scope  and align stakeholders.  Take charge as the  project driver  and act as a  Project Leader  when necessary.  Demonstrate exceptional proficiency in  Risk Management and Risk Assessment .   Prepare project updates and presentations  for senior stakeholders.  Exhibit solid project experience in  stakeholder management, project timelines, and budgets .  Display a good  understanding of project risks and mitigation strategies .  Showcase  expertise in project planning, scheduling, and critical path analysis .  Develop comprehensive project plans,  identify key milestones, and critical path activities .   Prior experience in New Product Development is preferred , particularly in domains such as FMCG, Pharma, Retail, Logistics, Food & Beverages and Manufacturing.  Familiarity with risk management and supply chain practices is beneficial.  Advanced skills in  MS Project PM Tool  is essential.  Proficiency in  Project Management Book of Knowledge (PMBOK) concepts  like Schedule Variance and Cost Variance is required. Preferred candidate profile     Project Management qualification (PMP/ Prince2 Certified) Graduate/Post Graduate  Perks and benefits   Best in the Industry

column2: A Construction Manager (CM)  plays a crucial role in overseeing construction projects from inception to completion. job description (JD) for a Construction Manager: Position Title: Construction Manager Location: Baddi (Himachal Pradesh ) Overview: We are seeking a competent Construction Manager to oversee our construction projects. The ideal candidate will have a strong background in construction management, excellent leadership skills, and a proven track record of delivering projects on time and within budget. The Construction Manager will be responsible for managing all aspects of construction projects, including planning, budgeting, scheduling, and coordinating with subcontractors and other stakeholders. Note Must Require:  Experience in Civil and Mechanical Construction management. Responsible for creating Construction professional services (CPS), Bills of Quantities (BOQ), Construction plans, etc. Responsibilities: 1. Project Planning and Scheduling: Develop project plans and schedules in collaboration with project stakeholders. Monitor progress and make adjustments as necessary to ensure timely completion of the project. 2. Budget Management : Develop project budgets and monitor expenses throughout the project lifecycle. Identify cost-saving opportunities and implement strategies to stay within budget. 3. Resource Allocation : Coordinate with subcontractors, suppliers, and other resources to ensure timely delivery of materials and services. Allocate resources effectively to maximize productivity and minimize downtime. 4. Quality Assurance : Implement quality control measures to ensure that construction work meets industry standards and client expectations. Conduct regular inspections and address any issues that arise during construction. 5. Risk Management : Identify potential risks and develop strategies to mitigate them. Proactively address safety concerns and ensure compliance with all relevant regulations and standards. 6. Communication and Collaboration:  Maintain regular communication with project stakeholders, including clients, architects, engineers, and subcontractors. Foster a collaborative working environment to promote teamwork and project success. 7. Client Relations:  Build and maintain positive relationships with clients by providing excellent customer service and addressing any concerns or issues in a timely and professional manner. 8. Team Leadership:  Lead and motivate project teams to achieve project goals and objectives. Provide guidance, support, and mentorship to team members to help them succeed in their roles. 9. Documentation and Reporting : Maintain accurate project documentation, including contracts, permits, and change orders. Generate regular progress reports and updates for project stakeholders. 10. Continuous Improvement : Stay abreast of industry trends, best practices, and emerging technologies. Identify opportunities for process improvement and implement innovative solutions to enhance project efficiency and effectiveness. Qualifications : - Bachelor's degree in  Mechanical Engineering, Civil Engineering , or a related field -  Proven experience in construction management, with a minimum of [10+] years of relevant experience. - Strong knowledge of construction methods, materials, and techniques. - Excellent leadership, communication, and interpersonal skills. - Proficiency in project management software and tools . - Ability to multitask, prioritize tasks, and work under pressure in a fast-paced environment. Thanks & Regards Your Manpower Manager DIVYA SHARMA Contact No-8305735460 Officer- TA | HR Ashkom Media India Private Limited Website: www.ashkom.com

Develop and execute solutions when issues arise that might jeopardise either of these objectives.     Record project milestones, maintain records of project correspondence, and produce project close-out summaries, including cost analysis.     Manage customer change requests to ensure optimal solutions for successful project delivery.     Lead frequent team calls to support project execution.     Provide monthly reports on project status.     Manage the SR1 quality incidents through eQMS and work closely with assigned incident managers to close the incidents in time and ensure RCA/8Ds are available where applicable.     Support process streamlining activities, ISO IQMs compliance, and support SES initiatives.     Other project delivery initiative tasks as assigned.             The Individual        What youll definitely need -       Degree educated in a technical discipline. Electrical, Mechanical, or Chemical Engineering preferred.     Minimum 15 years experience in Oil and Gas / Petrochemical projects business with at least five years working as a Project / Contract Manager.     Must be able to read, interpret, and explain complex project specifications and drawings.     Ability to achieve the agreed goals & objectives by constantly focusing on a set of priorities.     Excellent communication, negotiation & presentation skills, both verbal and written.     Commercially very astute with a proper understanding of basic finance.     Strong facilitation skills and experience in operating in a matrix environment and adept at swiftly reaching solutions and building consensus under tight deadlines.     A PMI Project Management Professional (PMP) certification or a comparable credential is preferred, showcasing a solid foundation in project management methodologies and practices.     Experience and knowledge in process improvement methodologies such as Lean Six Sigma are preferred, highlighting a commitment to efficiency and continuous project optimisation.     Good knowledge of Microsoft suite of products, including MS Project. Preferred experience with Project Lifecycle Management tools (e.g., Teamcenter).     Strong level of cultural awareness and capability to adapt behaviour accordingly.     Fluent in English.     Travel up to 30%

column2: We are seeking a highly skilled Technical Project Manager with expertise in C#, .NET Core, and Azure Services to lead and manage our software development projects. As a Technical Project Manager, you will be responsible for overseeing the successful delivery of projects, ensuring that they are completed on time, within budget, and meet the required quality standards. You will work closely with cross-functional teams, including developers, designers, and stakeholders, to drive project success.         ?       Responsibilities:       1. Project Planning: Collaborate with stakeholders to define project objectives, scope, and requirements. Develop detailed project plans, including timelines, milestones, and resource allocation.     2. Team Management: Lead and motivate a team of developers, ensuring effective communication, collaboration, and task delegation. Provide guidance and support to team members throughout the project lifecycle.     3. Technical Expertise: Possess a deep understanding of C#, .NET Core, and Azure Services to provide technical guidance and support to the development team. Stay updated with the latest industry trends and technologies.     4. Risk Management: Identify and assess project risks and develop mitigation strategies. Proactively monitor project progress, identify potential roadblocks, and take corrective actions to ensure project success.     5. Quality Assurance: Implement and enforce software development best practices, coding standards, and quality control processes. Conduct regular code reviews to ensure adherence to standards and optimize performance.     6. Stakeholder Management: Engage and communicate with stakeholders to provide project updates, gather feedback, and manage expectations. Address any concerns or issues raised by stakeholders in a timely manner.     7. Project Documentation: Create and maintain project documentation, including project charters, requirements documents, technical specifications, and user manuals.     8. Continuous Improvement: Drive continuous improvement initiatives by identifying areas for process optimization, automation, and efficiency gains. Foster a culture of learning and innovation within the team.       Requirements:       1. Proven experience as a Technical Project Manager, leading software development projects using C#, .NET Core, and Azure Services.     2. Strong technical background with hands-on experience in software development using C# and .NET Core.     3. In-depth knowledge of Azure Services, such as Azure App Service, Azure Functions, Azure Storage, and Azure DevOps.     4. Experience with Agile/Scrum methodologies and project management tools like Jira or Azure DevOps.     5. Excellent leadership and team management skills, with the ability to mentor and guide technical teams.     6. Strong problem-solving and decision-making abilities, with a proactive and result-oriented mindset.     7. Excellent communication and interpersonal skills, with the ability to effectively collaborate with cross-functional teams and stakeholders

column2: The Project Manager II defines job requirements for project planning, scheduling, monitoring, reporting, and implementing project and/or interrelated programs activities. manages sub-contractors      Typically manages a project with a team size of around 15 FTEs            Qualifications:      Skills:      Required        Strong communication (both business and technical) and interpersonal skills      Detail-oriented, project management skills      Ability to support multiple projects and corresponding documentation      Ability to break down problems and estimate effort      Deep Knowledge of Project Management Tools and Processes      Familiarity with Scaled Agile Framework (SAFe)/ Agile / Scrum principles            Certificates / Training:        Preferred: Project Management Professional (PMP) certification      Preferred: SAFe Agile/Scrum certification            Experience:      Level II        6+ years of technology experience      3+ years of IT Project Management experience or equivalent            Education:      Required        Bachelors in Information Technology, Business or equivalent            Principles Related Competencies:      Ethical        Complies with policies and procedures; Takes the high road and upholds our values; Maintains confidentiality; Acts with integrity, honesty and respect.        Leader        Communicates the big picture whether remotely or in-person, connecting the dots globally and overcoming obstacles; Gives and receives frequent feedback, learns, teaches, encourages information sharing and cooperation among teams; Celebrates the individual and the team; Ability to clearly communicate.        Collaborative        Communicates the big picture whether remotely or in-person, connecting the dots globally and overcoming obstacles; Gives and receives frequent feedback, learns, teaches, encourages information sharing and cooperation among teams; Celebrates the individual and the team; Ability to clearly communicate.        Looks Beyond Oneself        (Team Leader) Demonstrates humility through servant leadership by thinking about what can I do as a leader to help you achieve your goals; Develops a vision (strategy) and sets goals and targets, fostering an environment which encourages achievement; Inspires and influences people to work together cohesively and enthusiastically engages with them;      Welcomes a diversity of backgrounds and ideas; Values Distributors and teammates.        Drives Innovation        Add value through: Driving opportunities for all 3 types of innovation (incremental, evolutionary or disruptive);      Proposing ideas and creative solutions to employee, distributor and/or customer challenges; Celebrating and learning from failures and successes, willing to experiment and take educated risks making decisions based on facts data; Welcoming other s ideas and suggestions and acting on them.        Delivers Change        Delivers Change Through: Experiencing and leading change; Understanding Herbalife Nutrition s business; Creating a sense of urgency for delivering business benefits; Flexibility and openness to change.

column2: As a Sr Implementation Project Manager, you will define, plan, and deliver complex programs that require cross-functional collaboration and management of inter-dependencies between a group of projects and/or related activities within the constraint of scope, quality, time, and budget            Includes the management of a group of matrixed employees and contractors that serve on the program(s) to deliver solutions for the business      You will also be responsible for the successful implementation and ongoing support of Elsevier s products for India-based customers        As a member of this team, you will manage product development and project implementation, obtain requirements, evaluate, and determine the objectives, goals, and scope of multiple complex projects, and overcome barriers      You will be responsible for networking across organizations to drive initiatives, strategies, issue resolutions, and alignment      This includes creating, monitoring, and providing ongoing communications to appropriate stakeholders while coaching and facilitating the effectiveness of a team by growing their capabilities to organize, manage, and make decisions      You will also identify risk areas and provide alternative strategies to leadership that address concerns as well as manage interdependencies or dependencies between projects or programs in addition to managing project process documentation        In this role that is both customer-facing and technical, you will provide customer support and guidance throughout the implementation process by providing an outstanding customer experience, removing roadblocks, building relationships, and leading improvement initiatives      You ll act as a trusted advisor to our customers, ensuring adaptation and maximum value from our solutions      You should have a passion for driving customer success               About the Responsibilities:            Working with the Executive Sponsor and Business Owner of a Program, and other management as required, to achieve the Program objectives.          Working with business and technical team/s to drive out program strategy and approach. Organize, plan, and maintain a program roadmap consisting of cross-functional activities/projects.          Working with business and technical organizations to assemble project teams. Lead Project and/or Program team in the development and maintenance of comprehensive plans for a defined program.          Acquiring an understanding of the business objectives for an assigned area.          Monitoring, evaluating, and reporting on Program status inclusive of scope, schedule, budget, and alignment to Program and strategic goals. Directing corrective action, as needed, to maintain the viability of the Program.          Developing and maintaining positive customer relationships. Deliver presentations of project status to effectively communicate throughout the project life cycle.          Adhering to the Organizations project management methods, project life-cycle methodologies, and audit requirements. Support and contribute to the improvement of project management methods and practices.          Functioning as the project manager and customers primary point of contact          Developing customizations and configurations and prioritizing, track, and drive product implementations.              Driving successful implementation and adoption of solutions to new customers          Conducting calls with each customer to ensure open lines of communication and problem resolution.          Monitoring and maintaining a high level of focus on customer satisfaction.          Analyzing usage reporting from key customers.          Responsible for partner relationships and retention          Liaising with customers and product development teams                    About the Requirement:            Bachelor s Degree in Business or related field, or equivalent relevant work experience            At least 10 years of project management work experience            Project management certification (PMP, PRINCE2, Agile, etc.)          Extensive experience solely managing budgets ($3M+)          Change Management experience          Experience providing regular reports and summaries to management.          SmartSheets, Microsoft Project, or other PM tools, 5 years          Agile knowledge          Go-to-Market knowledge.          Strong professionalism and strong interpersonal skills required.          Customer service and technical support experience          Experience in working in an international matrix organization.          Experience working in a business-to-business environment.          Ability to learn new skills and assimilate knowledge quickly.          Excellent written and oral communication skills              Ability to build and foster strong relationships, both internally and externally          Exceptional time management and organizational skills, with a high attention to detail          Growth mindset, bias for action, innovative          Strong leadership skills          Languages: Hindi and English required                  Preferred Qualifications              Additional Project management certification (Six Sigma, etc.)          Minimum 3 years of Healthcare IT project management experience and working knowledge of hospital and clinic departmental workflows.          Advanced knowledge of current IT and Healthcare technologies          Practical knowledge and training in healthcare privacy and data                  Knowledge, Skills, and Abilities              Solid project management skills. Previous demonstrated experience leading Business/technical projects, building project plans and leading project meetings.          Strong project delivery skills accurate project planning, delivering to milestone dates, managing resources effectively, communicating status effectively, managing risks, and can juggle multiple activities at once to accomplish goals.          Experience working with JIRA, SmartSheets, Confluence, or other similar tools.          Solid technical skills including working knowledge of computer systems and Microsoft Office applications.          Demonstrated ability to work well with all levels of stakeholders.          Possess personal qualities of integrity, credibility, and commitment to the corporate mission.          Ability to work flexibly and able to multitask; self-motivated and can work within an ambiguous, fast-moving environment, while also driving toward clarity and solutions; demonstrated resourcefulness in setting priorities and guiding investment in people and systems.          Exemplary communication skills (written, presentation, meeting management, and documentation)          Experience partnering with other project stakeholders to resolve issues and mitigate project impacts.          A results-oriented outlook with the ability to prioritize and deliver key initiatives.          Highly adaptable to changing needs within the organization adapts to rapidly changing priorities.

column2: The Associate Project Manager for Electronic Data Capture (EDC) will play a crucial role in our eClinical research projects, ensuring the efficient and effective management of data collection and study execution        This individual will collaborate with cross-functional teams, sponsors, and clients to deliver high-quality EDC solutions and support project timelines                     Primary Responsibilities            Develop and Manage Project Plans            Supporting Project Manager with all facets of (a) project(s) by demonstrating proficiency in the basic knowledge, skills and abilities (KSAs) related to proper planning, efficient organization of resources, thorough coordination between internal and external agencies, appropriate directing of concurrent and consecutive work packages/tasks and timely communications of current and future activities.          Ensuring every member of the project team knows the critical path deliverables and knowing who is responsible, accountable and to be consulted and informed (RACI) on those activities.          Supporting Project Manager in development and management of a robust project plan and is able to prepare and/or edit a range of correspondence, capture meeting notes, and ensure all key documents are accurate and kept up to date.          Provides timely support to Project Team and assigned PM(s), as required.          Overseeing simultaneous project events and maintaining progress to successful completion and customer satisfaction.          Ensure that all critical path project activities are completed within time boundaries and are acceptable to primary internal and external customers.          Diagnose root cause of the breakdown of planned activities during project execution.            Provides project team performance management and leadership            Leading by example with professional and collaborative conduct          Effectively manage the efforts required to ensure that all key deliverables are identified and produced in a timely manner for the initiate, build, maintenance, and/or closeout phases of the project          Manage multiple work packages and their associated milestones simultaneously; many of which are assigned to other team members.          Support Project Manager in developing and delivering team project training.          Providing input to departmental managers of respective team members performance level          Analyzing team performance for consistency/quality within established project guidelines          Collaborating with the departmental managers for team coaching/mentoring            Timeline Management            Working within a time-constrained environment, account for the longer-term project deliverables in the Initiate stage of the PLC and establish realistic milestones related to effective requirements management and ensure the eClinical team is positioned to meet customer expectations.          Work closely with the Project Team, other internal resources and the Customer throughout the project life cycle (PLC), ensuring key product delivery tasks (standard and customized specifications) can be developed, configured, documented, tested, delivered, maintained and closed out according to established schedules.          Maximize the use of templates, checklists and other job aids for routine work package to focus attention on the more critical and complex elements of a study project plan          Routinely review timelines with Project Managers to address current and potential risks and/or customer issues to ensure that all deliverables will be met.            Subject Matter Expertise            Develops and maintains sufficient product knowledge of Sitero Mentor products, including being able to interact with customer technical experts and facilitate internal discussions with product-specific SMEs as projects progress through the PLC.          Ensures that the requirements and project scope are appropriate and comprehensive by engaging with SMEs at the early stage of a project.              Secondary Responsibilities            Maintains Quality Service and Departmental Standards by            Reading, understanding and adhering to organizational Standard Operating Procedures ( SOP )              Establishing and enforcing departmental standards              Reviewing and updating company SOPs related to Project Management Services            Contributes to team effort by            Exploring new opportunities to add value to organization and departmental processes.          Helping others to accomplish results.              Performing other duties as assigned and deemed necessary.            Maintains Technical Knowledge by            Attending and participating in applicable company sponsored training.              Qualifications:            Education:            Bachelors degree in a related field (e.g., Life Sciences, IT, Project Management).          5+ years project management experience will be considered in lieu of a degree              Experience:              2+ years Project Management experience, preferably within the clinical trials space.              Additional skill set:              Working knowledge of eClinical systems (EDC, IRT and CTMS)          Strong interpersonal and communication skills, both verbal and written          Strong organizational and leadership skills          Goal oriented          Ability to maintain professional and positive attitude          PMP or similar project management certification is a plus.              COMPENSATION & BENEFITS:            Sitero proudly offers an impressive compensation package and benefits, including a competitive salary, Variable pay, paid time off, and healthcare and retirement benefits.                    EMPLOYMENT TYPE:            Full Time, Permanent                    COMMITMENTS:                  Standard Hours 40 hours per week, one hour lunch, Monday - Friday. Additional hours as needed.              Willing to work in shifts as and when needed.

column2: Drive and execute the Project to implement the Business Operations Transformation (BOT) end-to-end rollout of the new Target Operating Model underpinned by SAP S/4 HANA and Ariba technology defined in a Global Template as part of a Cluster of defined countries in a single release        Secure the transformation required according to BOT principles which include a brutally standard approach      Drive the business transformation to ensure each local market is operationally ready to receive BOT      Ensure handover to BAU organisation is managed in an orderly way             Role and Responsibilities:              Prepare, monitor, and drive the implementation plan for the assigned project          Manage and mitigate all project risk & issues          Define and manage programme resources required for project deliverables          Accountable for the successful implementation of BOT in the assigned country or Cluster as per the Cluster plan          Lead the day-to-day management to deliver a successful implementation on time, on budget and agreed quality as per go live exit criteria.          Manage engagement and transition of local markets to Global Business Operations team          Manage SI delivery and challenge when appropriate          Manage the Business Transformation to ensure business operational readiness to receive BOT, including change, comms, and training for local country          Flag any potential deviations from agreed timelines or quality levels as per the Governance          First escalation point for the Country or Cluster          Stakeholder management to local country leadership team                    Eligibility              Senior professional with minimum 5+ years of strong programme management experience on large-scale Global Business Transformation programs.          Minimum 2 full lifecycle SAP implementation          SAP S4 Hana Implementation experience in large multi-cultural organisations          Global Business Transformation and Change Experience          Global experience of managing and challenging SI delivery          Experience in complex programme environments involving multiple system integrators operating with a global delivery model          SAP S/4 HANA and Ariba a must, SAP Retail a plus          Ability to drive teams in a diverse international and distributed team a must          Strong communication and decision-making skills - ability to balance conflicting needs a must          Knowledge of multiple project management methodologies          Excellent knowledge of English          Strong stakeholder management across all levels a must          Formal Project Manager qualification (e.g., PMP, Prince2 Practitioner or equivalent)

column2: As a Senior Technical Project Manager, you will be responsible for leading and coordinating complex technical projects, ensuring their successful delivery while being hands-on with the technology stack      This role requires a seasoned professional with extensive technical expertise, a proven track record in project management, and the ability to effectively manage client relationships                Responsibilities                  Project Management:                Lead and oversee end-to-end project management, ensuring the successful delivery of technical projects within scope, time, and budget constraints. Client Relationship Management:                Act as the primary point of contact for clients, understanding their technical requirements, and ensuring effective communication throughout the project lifecycle.          Manage client expectations, address concerns, and provide regular project updates.            Technical Leadership:                Provide hands-on technical oversight and guidance on projects involving SAS or PowerBI, SQL Server Administration, Azure DevOps, .NET development, and QA automation.          Collaborate closely with technical teams to ensure alignment with project objectives.            Resource Allocation:                Efficiently allocate and manage resources, both internal and external, to ensure optimal project delivery.          Monitor resource utilization and make adjustments as needed.            Quality Assurance:                Implement and oversee robust QA processes, both manual and automated, to ensure the delivery of high-quality solutions.          Work closely with QA teams to identify and address issues proactively.            Stakeholder Communication:                Effectively communicate project goals, progress, and challenges to stakeholders, including clients, team members, and leadership.          Conduct regular project status meetings and provide detailed reports.            Risk Management:                Identify and mitigate project risks, proactively addressing issues that may impact project timelines or deliverables.          Develop contingency plans to ensure project success.                Qualifications:                Bachelors degree in computer science, Information Technology, or a related field.          Proven experience (10-15 years) as a Technical Project Manager, managing projects involving SAS or PowerBI, SQL Server Administration, Azure DevOps, .NET development, and QA automation.          Strong understanding of project management methodologies and tools.          Excellent client-facing and communication skills.          Ability to lead and motivate cross-functional teams.          Hands-on technical proficiency with a focus on SAS or PowerBI, SQL Server Administration, Azure DevOps, .NET development, and QA automation.

column2: As a Project Manager you will be part of the Customer Success (CS) department.      We undertake exciting projects at top-tier banks all over the world to implement our online banking solutions.        Your task is to manage projects all around the world and be a bridge between      Backbase internal teams and our clients.      Manage multiple complex projects in APAC and be a bridge between Backbase internal teams and our clients.        Meet the job        Backbase is a fast growing and dynamic environment. Taking upon this position means that you will be a key person in providing effective coordination and communication among all the project stakeholders at various levels.      You may not be a technical expert but you are experienced in IT and digital projects and Agile methodology.      You are confident in managing clients expectations within the Backbase framework and methodology.      You will be expected to manage the relationship with customers/partners and support and advise clients on implementing their online applications using Backbase Solution to its full potential.        How about you        You are a solid project manager (5+ years) who is result driven and ready to adapt to a constantly changing environment.        You have integrated end-to-end (min. 3 projects) web-based projects and you are a master in Agile project management.        You have had (3+ years) of experience managing application support teams.        You have client-facing experience in complex environments (3+ years);        Key behavioural competencies including customer insight, stakeholder management, build effective teams and manage expectations.        You should have experience in full-cycle project management, ideally starting with requirements gathering, proposal preparation, integration of partner solutions/products, as well as planning (project plan, resource allocation, cost calculation), supporting sales and pre-sales as and when required.        You jump on opportunities to collaborate with colleagues and clients and enjoy being an accelerator.        You are very much hands-on and have the mentality to get things done;        Proficiency in English is an absolute must since you will be dealing with clients across the globe.        Additional local languages are most welcome.        We are extra delighted if you have experience in the Banking/ finance industry.

column2: Summary: We are seeking a motivated and skilled Associate Project Manager with a minimum of 2 years of experience in managing projects related to Enterprise Software as a Service (SaaS). The ideal candidate will have a strong understanding of SaaS implementation methodologies, excellent organizational skills, and the ability to collaborate effectively with cross-functional teams. This role requires attention to detail, adaptability, and a proactive approach to project management. Responsibilities: Project Planning and Coordination: Assist in the development of project plans, timelines, and milestones for Enterprise SaaS implementation projects. Coordinate project activities and resources to ensure timely delivery of project objectives within scope and budget. Collaborate with project stakeholders to define project requirements, deliverables, and success criteria. Stakeholder Communication: Serve as a central point of contact for project stakeholders, including clients, internal teams, and third-party vendors. Facilitate regular communication and updates regarding project status, milestones, and risks. Prepare and distribute project documentation, reports, and presentations as needed. Requirements Management and Analysis: Work closely with clients and internal teams to gather, analyze, and document project requirements. Translate business requirements into technical specifications and project deliverables. Ensure that project requirements are clearly defined, understood, and aligned with stakeholder expectations. Quality Assurance and Testing: Support quality assurance activities by assisting in the development and execution of test plans, test cases, and acceptance criteria. Coordinate user acceptance testing (UAT) and feedback collection to validate SaaS solutions against client expectations. Work with development teams to address and resolve issues identified during testing and UAT. Training and User Adoption: Assist in the development and delivery of training materials and sessions for end-users to ensure successful adoption of SaaS solutions. Provide ongoing support and assistance to users during the implementation and post-implementation phases. Gather user feedback and insights to identify opportunities for improvement and optimization. Risk Management and Issue Resolution: Identify potential risks and issues impacting project delivery and work with project managers to develop mitigation strategies. Escalate critical issues to project managers and assist in resolving them in a timely manner to minimize project disruptions. Proactively monitor project progress and performance metrics to identify deviations from planned objectives. Qualifications: Bachelors degree in Business Administration, Information Technology, Computer Science, or a related field. Minimum of 2 years of experience in project management, with a focus on Enterprise SaaS implementation. Strong understanding of SaaS platforms, cloud technologies, and software delivery methodologies. Excellent communication, interpersonal, and stakeholder management skills. Proficiency in project management tools and software (e.g., Asana, Trello, Microsoft Project). Ability to work independently and collaboratively in a fast-paced, dynamic environment. Project management certification (e.g., CAPM, PMP) is a plus.

column2: Job Title: Infrastructure Manager Service Project Manager Overview:  As the Infrastructure Manager Service Project Manager, you will be responsible for overseeing the planning, implementation, and management of infrastructure projects within our organization. Your role will involve coordinating with various teams to ensure the successful delivery of projects, while also maintaining the reliability and efficiency of our infrastructure services. This position requires strong project management skills, technical expertise in infrastructure systems, and the ability to communicate effectively with stakeholders at all levels. Key Responsibilities: Project Planning and Execution: Develop project plans, timelines, and budgets for infrastructure projects. Coordinate with internal teams and external vendors to ensure project objectives are met on time and within budget. Monitor project progress and address any issues or delays that arise during implementation. Conduct regular project status meetings and provide updates to stakeholders. Infrastructure Management: Oversee the maintenance and operation of existing infrastructure systems, including servers, networks, and storage. Implement best practices for infrastructure management, including monitoring, security, and disaster recovery. Collaborate with IT teams to identify opportunities for infrastructure optimization and efficiency improvements. Ensure compliance with industry standards and regulations related to infrastructure management. Team Leadership and Development: Lead a team of infrastructure engineers and technicians, providing guidance and support as needed. Foster a culture of collaboration, innovation, and continuous improvement within the team. Identify training and development needs for team members and facilitate learning opportunities. Conduct performance evaluations and provide feedback to team members on a regular basis. Stakeholder Communication: Communicate project status, risks, and issues to stakeholders at all levels of the organization. Act as a liaison between technical teams and non-technical stakeholders, translating technical concepts into understandable language. Solicit feedback from stakeholders to ensure project requirements are being met and expectations are being managed effectively. Qualifications: Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, Information Technology, or a related field. Master's degree preferred. Project Management Professional (PMP) certification is highly desirable. Minimum of 5 years of experience in infrastructure management, with at least 3 years in a project management role. Strong technical background in infrastructure systems, including servers, networks, and storage. Proficiency in project management tools and methodologies, such as Agile or Scrum. column2: In the role of Project Manager, you will ensure the successful progress and completion of projects for our client Vodafone. For projects you can think at new customer or product implementations, process improvements or implementations. You will ensure that the project is successfully delivered within the agreed conditions such as time, budget, and customer requirements. Once a week, you will engage with the client, usually through a call, to align their needs and requirements and provide advice on possibilities and feasibility. Within the existing projects, you will identify opportunities for further expansion or new projects within the partnership.                                 You have influence on how these projects are successfully delivered. When necessary, you will assemble a project team consisting of colleagues from Account Support, Warehouse Operations, Finance, and IT, both in the Netherlands and abroad. There is a weekly meeting with the entire team of internal colleagues involved in these projects to discuss progress and any special considerations. In your role, you will also ensure proper prioritization and documentation. This includes capturing (new) agreements with the client, documenting performance, tracking hours, and monitoring progress. This information will provide input to your Finance colleagues for invoicing the client.                                      WHAT ARE YOU GOING TO DO?                                       Initiate, plan, execute, monitor and coordinate projects and ensure successful completion;                                         Ensuring that all agreements made are adhered to and properly recorded;                                         Creating the Statement of Work (SOW) and its financial follow-up;                                         Providing progress reports;                                         Participate and support in other projects and proactively improve cooperation with the client(s).                                       WHAT ARE WE LOOKING FOR?                                 Hbo working and thinking level;                             Minimum of 4 years working experience in a similar job;                             Strong knowledge of IT Project Management;                           Affinity with Supply Chain and Telecom.

column2: Project Manager For Biogas / Biodiesel Plant/s Purdrop Biochem Experience: 12-20 Years CTC : Rs. 8 L.P.A. - 12.0 L.P.A. Location: Ahmedabad, Gujarat Job Summary: We are seeking a Project Manager to oversee the development and construction of a Biogas plant at the greenfield stage. The ideal candidate will be responsible for planning, executing, and finalizing projects within strict deadlines and budget constraints. Key Responsibilities: Pre-Feasibility Study: - Evaluate technical and economic viability of biogas projects, assess feedstock sources, agricultural practices, and infrastructure, identify challenges and risks, estimate energy output and environmental benefits. Feasibility Report: - Prepare detailed reports with technical specifications and cost estimates, analyze financial viability and return on investment, evaluate regulatory and policy framework, recommend strategies to optimize project performance and mitigate risks, present reports to stakeholders for approval, monitor and evaluate implementation of recommendations for project success. 1. Develop and implement project plans, schedules, and budgets for the Biogas plant project. 2. Coordinate activities of engineers, contractors, and suppliers involved in the project. 3. Monitor project progress, ensuring deadlines and budgets are met. 4. Identify and mitigate project risks. 5. Ensure compliance with environmental regulations and safety standards. 6. Communicate regularly with stakeholders and address any concerns. 7. Oversee the commissioning and start-up of the Biogas plant. 8. Liaise with government agencies. Qualifications: 1. Bachelor's degree in Engineering, Construction Management, or relevant field. MBA in Project Management or Industrial Management preferred. 2. Proven project management experience in the renewable energy sector. 3. Strong knowledge of Biogas plant technology, construction processes, and environmental regulations. 4. Excellent communication, interpersonal, leadership, and problem-solving skills. 5. Ability to work under pressure and manage multiple tasks. 6. PMP certification is a plus. 7. Proficiency in project management software and tools. 8. Experience with managing projects in the renewable energy sector. Immediate joiners residing in Ahmedabad are preferred.  If you meet the qualifications and are passionate about sustainable energy projects, please submit your application with an updated resume to rajesh.desai@purdrop.in

column1: Project Manager ( Urban Planning ) - Noida - Rudrabhishek Enterprises
column2: We are seeking a highly skilled and experienced  Project Manager  specializing in Urban Planning with a focus on Planning. The ideal candidate will hold a Master's degree in Urban Planning  (M.Plan)  or a related field, coupled with a minimum of 10 years of practical experience in urban planning projects. Key Responsibilities: Project Planning and Coordination : Lead the planning and coordination of urban planning projects from conception to completion. This includes defining project scope, goals, and deliverables, as well as developing project schedules and budgets. Team Management : Supervise and mentor a team of planners, designers, and analysts throughout the project lifecycle. Delegate tasks effectively, provide guidance, and ensure the team meets project milestones and deadlines. Stakeholder Engagement : Act as the primary point of contact for clients, government agencies, community groups, and other stakeholders involved in urban planning projects. Foster positive relationships, facilitate communication, and address stakeholder concerns or feedback. Research and Analysis : Conduct thorough research and analysis on urban planning issues, trends, and best practices. Utilize data-driven insights to inform decision-making and develop innovative solutions to complex urban challenges. Policy Development : Assist in the development and implementation of urban planning policies, regulations, and guidelines. Stay abreast of legislative changes and regulatory requirements impacting urban development projects. Technical Expertise : Demonstrate proficiency in urban planning principles, including land use zoning, transportation planning, environmental sustainability, and community development. Utilize specialized software and tools to support planning activities. Quality Assurance : Ensure the quality and accuracy of project deliverables, including reports, presentations, maps, and technical drawings. Conduct thorough reviews and assessments to uphold professional standards and meet client expectations. Budget and Resource Management : Manage project budgets, expenditures, and resource allocation effectively. Identify cost-saving opportunities, track project expenses, and optimize resource utilization to maximize project efficiency and profitability. Risk Management : Identify potential risks and uncertainties associated with urban planning projects and develop mitigation strategies to address them. Monitor project progress, identify deviations from the plan, and take proactive measures to minimize disruptions or delays. Qualifications: Master's degree in Urban Planning (M.Plan) or a related field required. Minimum of 10 years of experience in urban planning, with a focus on project management and planning. Strong leadership, communication, and interpersonal skills. Proficiency in urban planning software and tools, such as GIS, CAD, and statistical analysis software. Demonstrated ability to manage multiple projects simultaneously and deliver results within tight deadlines. Knowledge of relevant urban planning regulations, policies, and best practices. Experience working with diverse stakeholders, including government agencies, community organizations, and private sector clients.

column2: Role & responsibilities   Project Planning and Coordination: Develop detailed project plans, including timelines, budgets, and resource allocation. Coordinate with architects, engineers, contractors, and other stakeholders to ensure project requirements are understood and met. Budget and Cost Management: Prepare project budgets and monitor costs throughout the project lifecycle. Identify cost-saving opportunities and implement strategies to optimize project expenses without compromising quality. Schedule Management: Create project schedules and milestones to track progress and ensure timely completion. Anticipate and mitigate potential delays or obstacles to keep projects on track. Quality Assurance and Compliance: Implement quality control measures to ensure that all work meets regulatory standards and project specifications. Conduct regular inspections and quality audits to identify and address any issues promptly. Risk Management: Identify potential risks and develop risk mitigation strategies to minimize project disruptions. Monitor and address safety hazards and ensure compliance with health and safety regulations. Stakeholder Communication: Serve as the primary point of contact for clients, contractors, and other project stakeholders. Communicate project status, updates, and issues effectively and proactively. Team Leadership and Development: Lead and motivate project teams to achieve project goals and objectives. Provide guidance, support, and mentor ship?to team members to foster professional growth and development. Preferred candidate profile   Bachelor's degree in Civil Engineering, Construction Management, or a related field. Master's degree preferred. Proven experience as a Project Manager in the civil engineering and property development industry. Strong understanding of construction processes, building codes, and regulations. Excellent project management skills, including budgeting, scheduling, and resource management. Proficiency in project management software and MS Office suite. Exceptional leadership and communication skills. Ability to manage multiple projects simultaneously. Perks and benefits   No bar for Right Candidtae

column2: Technical Project Manager We are seeking a Technical Project Manager to guide Automation PMO team and help them to grow. You will be working alongside Automation PMO team and cross-functional team managers to deftly identify dependencies and risks, resolve blockers, communicate status to all levels of the business and champion companys project management best practices.  Who?  We are looking for a project management professional who lives the has a demonstrated track record of managing projects for fast-moving organizations. They also have:   4+ years of project management experience   Experienced communicator and able to collaborate with diverse sets of technical, non-technical, on-site, and remote people across different teams and business functions   Experience collaborating with cross-functional stakeholders and geographically diverse teams to achieve successful results   Technical experience and expertise sufficient to understand higher-level technical problems being solved   Experience in spotting blockers and dependency problems in advance of impact and moving solutions for these blockers forward   Ability to look through an Agile lens to determine what tasks can be delivered first to provide the largest value up front and also phase efforts as needed   Motivated to do or achieve something because of your own enthusiasm or interest, without needing pressure from others   Willing to answer for the outcomes resulting from your own choices, behaviors, and actions. Take ownership of situations that you??e involved in.  What?  As a Project Manager, you will live the company?? Magic values:   WRITE IT DOWN: Clearly and concisely document all project inputs and outputs and provide key findings and project/program summaries to internal stakeholders. Discern and identify hidden requirements that will impact risk or dependencies during planning, design, and implementation.   DRAW THE OWL: Identify opportunities for operational improvement within Technology Services and drive solution definition.   BE AN OWNER & BE BOLD: Enroll teams in change initiatives and lead them through with little disruption. Lead or assist in defining a project?? clear path forward with the right stakeholders. Proactively identify and clearly communicate messages and updates regarding blockers, dependencies, risks, and current status to all stakeholders for IT projects, including escalating through levels of management when necessary.   EMPOWER OTHERS: Interact across multiple functional teams within Technical Services by removing roadblocks and enabling project team members to do their best work.   WEAR THE CUSTOMER?? SHOES: Listen closely to deeply understand business problems and solve the problems from the customer?? perspective.   NO SHENANIGANS: Help Tech Services become a trusted business partner by building trust through every interaction with fellow teammates.  Why?  The Project Management team is central to the Automation PMO?? execution function. We champion the repeatable mechanism for project work that keeps teams collaborating and working toward a shared vision. We continuously improve our project transparency, communication across teams, and the processes for prioritization and resource allocation within the Tech Services department. We incrementally create value for Tech Services by strategically addressing our most difficult problems in a thoughtful manner and delivering high-quality projects. We are a company that is empowering the world?? developers with modern communication in order to build better applications.  We are truly unique; we are a company committed to your growth, your learning, your development, and your entire employee experience. We only win when our employees succeed and we're dedicated to helping you develop your strengths. We have a cultural foundation built on diversity, inclusion, and innovation and we want you and your ideas to thrive at here.  Where? We employ diverse talent from all over the world and we believe great work can be done anywhere. Around the world, We offers benefits and perks to support the physical, financial, and emotional well being of you and your loved ones. No matter where you are based, you will experience a company that believes in small teams for maximum impact; seeks well-rounded talent to ensure a full perspective on our customers??experience, understands that this is a marathon, not a sprint; that continuously and purposefully builds an inclusive culture that empowers everyone to do their best work and be the best version of themselves.

column2: Role & responsibilities     JD for Technical Project Manager (10+ years experience) Location : Chennai Responsibilities: Project Planning and Execution: - Lead the planning, execution, and delivery of Adobe Experience Manager (AEM) front-end migration projects. - Define project scope, goals, and deliverables in collaboration with stakeholders. - Develop project plans, schedules, and budgets, ensuring alignment with client expectations and organizational objectives. Stakeholder Management: - Serve as the primary point of contact for clients and internal stakeholders regarding AEM front-end projects. - Gather and analyze requirements, communicate project progress, and manage stakeholder expectations throughout the project lifecycle. - Build and maintain strong relationships with clients, fostering trust and ensuring satisfaction with project outcomes. Team Leadership and Collaboration: - Lead cross-functional teams of front-end developers, AEM Developers, and QA testers. - Provide guidance, direction, and support to team members, fostering collaboration and innovation. - Facilitate communication and collaboration between technical and non-technical team members to ensure successful project delivery. Risk Management: - Identify project risks, dependencies, and constraints, developing mitigation strategies to minimize their impact on project outcomes. - Proactively monitor project risks and issues, implementing corrective actions and adjustments to project plans as necessary. - Anticipate and manage scope changes, negotiating with stakeholders and adjusting project parameters while minimizing disruption. Quality Assurance: - Establish and enforce quality standards and processes to ensure the delivery of high-quality AEM front-end websites. - Develop and execute testing strategies to identify and resolve defects, usability issues, and performance bottlenecks. - Conduct regular reviews and audits to ensure compliance with design specifications, accessibility standards, and brand guidelines. Budget and Resource Management: - Develop project budgets and track expenses to ensure projects stay within allocated funds. - Optimize resource utilization and allocation to maximize efficiency and minimize costs. Documentation and Reporting: - Maintain accurate project documentation, including project plans, status reports, and minutes of meeting. - Generate regular reports for management and stakeholders, highlighting key metrics and project milestones. Technical Expertise: - Strong understanding of frontend development frameworks and languages, such as HTML, CSS, JavaScript, React, Angular, etc. - Possess a good understanding of Adobe Experience Manager (AEM) and front-end web development technologies. - Work closely with development teams to define technical requirements, and address technical challenges. - Stay abreast of industry best practices and emerging trends in web performance and front-end development, providing recommendations for optimization and improvement. Qualifications: - Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, Information Technology, or a related field (Master's degree preferred). - Proven experience managing AEM front-end website projects, preferably in a digital agency or IT consulting environment. - Good understanding of AEM architecture, components, templates, and front-end web technologies (HTML, CSS, JavaScript). - Previous experience in a technical project management role, with a track record of successfully delivering complex web projects on time and within budget. - Excellent communication, leadership, and interpersonal skills, with the ability to collaborate effectively with diverse stakeholders. - Proficiency in Agile methodologies, waterfall, and experience with project management tools such as Jira and Confluence. - Project Management Professional (PMP) certification is desirable (not manadatory). Additional Requirements: - Strong problem-solving skills and strategic thinking abilities. - Attention to detail and a commitment to delivering high-quality results. - Ability to thrive in a fast-paced, dynamic environment and manage multiple projects simultaneously. - Flexibility to adapt to changing priorities and requirements. - Willingness to travel occasionally for client meetings or project-related activities, as needed.
