column2: The Senior Technical Architect for IT Infrastructure Management, specializing in end-user computing technologies, is responsible for designing, implementing, and managing a comprehensive suite of technologies that collectively support the end-user experience. This role covers a broad spectrum of end-user computing technologies, including Active Directory, messaging systems, Citrix VDI, MDM, Microsoft Intune, VMware End User Computing, and Desktop Engineering.       Key Responsibilities:       End-User Computing Strategy:             Develop and execute a holistic EUC strategy that encompasses multiple technologies, ensuring a seamless, secure, and user-centric computing environment.     Active Directory Management:             Oversee the design and management of Active Directory services, including user and group policies, domain controllers, identity and access management, and directory consolidation.     Messaging Systems Management:             Manage messaging systems, including Microsoft Exchange, Office 365, or other email platforms, ensuring reliable email services and collaboration tools for end users.     Citrix VDI Implementation:             Design, deploy, and manage Citrix Virtual Desktop Infrastructure (VDI) solutions, providing remote access and virtualized desktop environments.     Mobile Device Management (MDM):             Implement and manage MDM solutions to secure and control mobile devices, applications, and data for end users.     Microsoft Intune Management:             Manage Microsoft Intune to secure and manage mobile devices and apps, ensuring compliance, security, and user productivity.     VMware End User Computing:             Design, implement, and manage VMware End User Computing solutions, such as Horizon View, to deliver virtual desktops and applications.     Desktop Engineering:             Lead desktop engineering initiatives, including operating system deployment, application packaging, image management, and end-user support technologies.     Security and Compliance:             Implement robust security measures and compliance protocols for all EUC technologies, ensuring data protection, identity management, and regulatory compliance.     Capacity Planning and Performance Optimization:             Conduct capacity planning for EUC resources, optimizing infrastructure to meet current and future demands and ensuring high performance.     Vendor Management and Partnerships:             Manage vendor relationships and service contracts for EUC technologies, ensuring adherence to SLAs and cost-effectiveness.     Project Management:             Lead EUC-related projects, including deployments, updates, and optimizations, with a focus on budget management and timelines.     Disaster Recovery and Business Continuity:             Develop and maintain comprehensive disaster recovery and business continuity plans for EUC environments, ensuring minimal disruption in the event of system failures or disasters.     Collaboration and Communication:             Collaborate with cross-functional IT teams, business stakeholders, and EUC technology vendors to align infrastructure solutions with end-user needs and organizational objectives.     Documentation and Reporting:             Maintain detailed documentation of EUC configurations, policies, and procedures, and provide regular reports and updates to management.       Qualifications   :             Bachelor s or master s degree in computer science, Information Technology, or a related field.             Extensive experience in EUC environment management, including Active Directory, messaging systems, Citrix VDI, MDM, Microsoft Intune, VMware End User Computing, and Desktop Engineering.             Relevant certifications in EUC technologies and management, such as Citrix Certified Professional, VMware Certified Professional, or Microsoft 365 Certified: Enterprise Administrator.             Proficiency in security, identity and access management, and regulatory compliance.             Strong leadership, communication, and collaboration skills, with a demonstrated ability to work effectively with cross-functional teams and stakeholders.             In-depth knowledge of ITIL and IT service management principles, with a focus on enhancing end-user experiences and optimizing EUC infrastructure.

column2: The Associate Project Manager will serve to assist senior Client Services peers through effective project management coordination and execution, as part of the Client Services Global Resourcing Team of individuals serving North America clients from other    geographies. Successful    candidates will have relevant experience in service delivery, preferably in eDiscovery, as well as a proven history of execution in a fast-paced environment.     The Associate Project Manager is primarily responsible for making sure the client receives the proper service through proactive attention to planning, analysis, execution, and proper close-out on a project.      The Associate Project Manager is responsible for the day-to-day execution of the project including providing the client and their internal project teams with clear direction, according to the client s requirements and company standards.             Essential Job Responsibilities            Correspond with the client on the project kick-off call led by project manager and document project timelines and workflows.         Ensure the entire project is running smoothly without any issues and risk to deadlines.         Proactively responding to client emails from multiple clients and acting on them within the timelines         Convert client requirements into operational work requests, monitor progress, and proactively provide updates to clients and project team stakeholders on deadlines.         Ensures client and project requirements are being met with the highest quality and accuracy through verifying and communicating routinely with both the client and internal partners.         Obtain, examine, and prepare client data for Intake.         Deliver media reports to the client, Coordinate FTP access setup for clients, User requests by coordinating with support teams.         Submit work requests to coordinate data ingestion and deliver reports to clients.         Coordinate with peer teams and clients for narrowing down search hit reports and promotion of data to review platform.         Assist in troubleshooting and resolving any client issues with delivered or hosted data.         Handle review platform (DMX or Relativity) specific items including but not limited to User requests, database management    (archiving/deletion),    creation of    layouts / views / fields / choices / highlighting ,     creation, and execution of STR s, creation and management of batch sets, reporting, creating, and delivering productions.         Correspond with the client to understand custom client needs and provide consultative solutions to meet their requirements.         Regular coordination with Project Manager and Team Lead to ensure the project is running smoothly and being delivered with the highest quality.          Understand project budgets and obtain required approvals before incurring additional costs outside of project estimates.         Ensures continuity of client service between shifts by providing clear handoffs and client updates.         Participate in process improvement initiatives and collaborate with teammates to standardize and improve the customer experience.         Ensure effective control of all aspects of a project from initial planning through final production; development of project plans; balance overall client requirements; development of relationships; and review financial and billing information in a timely manner to ensure deadlines are consistently met. To update the HO & respective Business Heads with all relevant information about plans, deviations from these plan (work & financial progress). Essential Duties And Responsibilities Responsibility Area: Planning Ensuring that project schedules with resources /cost loaded are prepared on sound assumptions related with productivity, cycle time local factors, project logistics corresponding with chosen methodology in line with business plan. This shall include activities spanning from approvals/ Design/ Procurement/ execution and handover. Preparing / reviewing construction Master & subsequent project Schedules & methodologies in line with Business Plans, Project Execution Plan (PEP) & logistic Plan. Supporting RO planning resources in Identifying and including the Ideal sequencing of events in the correct order to establish & monitor accurate critical path for the project to finish on time and on budget. Establishing construction Milestones to be achieved in line with financial targets of business plan w.r.t. construction spends. Monitoring Monitoring the progress of the project at different stages of its development & ensuring achieved progress on the project that fits the progress anticipated in the schedule in line with the Business Plans. Monitoring projects and raises early warning /suggests corrective action with respect to Resource Planning & Deployment, Time cost overruns. Monitoring all projects activities & milestones as per the contract requirement and provide effective HO Support to regional planning resources at RO. Overseeing the performance of Contractors, sub-contractors ensuring compliance with submitted programs / plans. Co-ordinate with the stakeholders (Internal /External) & PMC to ensure no slippage of planned activities. Oversee Contractual correspondence Related to time, function and input to safeguard companys interest. Supporting Costing, Budgeting, team cost monitoring for the project MIS Reporting Review weekly & monthly Progress reports, charts & tables, establish trends. Prepare and implement necessary formats for progress monitoring and reports as and when required. Review and coordinate procurement with Central Procurement Group. Process Adherence Complies with company defined guidelines and processes Adheres to project timelines Process Improvement Identifies processes/procedures in own work area that need improvement Recommends process improvement ideas to streamline efficiency/costs/productivity Undertakes process improvement activities in own work area Learning and Development Identifies self-development needs Takes concrete steps to pursue self-development through training, education, projects etc. Key Interactions Internal interactions Purpose of Interaction Support in Highlighting & resolving all issues concerning planning, scheduling and resources needed. Facilitate decision making in cases of resolving project delays, by coordinating between region and HO functions. Representatives of Interfacing Departments (Costing-Budgeting, Contracts-Procurement, Strategy, Sales etc.) Scheduling, Monitoring & Coordination. External Contractors, Architects, Consultants, As and when Required Threshold Education Qualification & Experience Position Specifications (Know-How, Skills and Knowledge for this position): BE (Civil), PGDACM (NICMAR) / ME / M Tech (Construction Management) Working knowledge in MS Projects and /or Primavera/ Mivan Technology Should possess 10-15 years of planning experience in large construction projects (office and residential multi-storied apartment complex / townships) out of which 6-8 years at construction site in execution role will be an advantage. To have hands-on experience in planning various activities of the projects, coordinating with all departments including micro planning and budgeting.
column11: High Rise Building, Residential, Project Manager, Monitoring And Evaluation, Site Management, Coordination, Civil Project Management, Building Construction, Budget Management, Planning, Project Reports

Experience in fabrication, Erection & commissioning of steel structure, Boiler, tanks, Rotary equipment's etc. Experience in preparation of Specifications, Data sheets & Technical Bid evaluation of Rotating equipment & packages Experience in Selection of Pumps, boilers, Compressors, Turbines & Packages etc. Experience in Vendor interaction and review of Vendor & contractors docs/Drawings Functional & Technical expertise: Good technical understanding of Project engineering. Good knowledge of Erection & Commissioning of mechanical equipment's. Excellent MS Office skills with ability to represent information in forms of documents, graphs, reports and presentations etc.  Be able to develop personal relationship within team & external customers.

column2: Lead the implementation for Microsoft Dynamics 365 ERP, HR and Customer Engagement applications ( D365 ) of 1-4 projects simultaneously across all phases including analysis, design, build, test, train, cutover, operations, and support.      Manage a project team between 6-10[RS1] D365 functional consultants and developers including providing them day to day guidance.      Follow PMO processes while completing agreed PMO documentation, making recommendations for improvement as necessary.      Draft weekly the project status reports outlining the progress of current projects, milestones and activities completed in the prior week, planned but not completed and milestones and activities planned for the current week and distribute internally and to the client.      Do Project Planning including creating baseline project plan and update plan on a weekly basis. Ensure project is delivered on time and within budget and where that is not possible provide early indicators to management of delays or budget overrun.      Create a draft Steering committee deck listing down accomplishments, project status overview, budget to cost, key action items and help requested. Distribute the Steering committee deck internally at least 3 working days prior to the Steering Committee meeting with the customer.      Manage client engagement and lead client workshops to define business requirements required for them to successfully implement the D365 solution. Ensure these requirements are captured in Business Scenario Documents/ Functional Requirements Documents / User Stories per the requirements of the project and onto Azure DevOps.      Lead Conference Room Pilots to show case the D365 solution to clients.      Identify potential challenges to the project and communicate with the Implementation Team and internal leadership appropriately to alleviate risk to the project and ensure it is delivered per agreed timeline and cost.      Review design documents for customizations, reports for D365, data mapping, integration mapping, Test scenarios and Test Scripts written by other team members. Ensure the design documents capture boundary conditions and include comprehensive test scenarios.      Ensure a high-quality solution by providing leadership for testing including functional testing, integration testing and automated testing using the Regression suite automation test tool.      Lead training for D365 and associated systems to clients as we'll as to other Unify Dots team members.      Lead pre-go live cutover and post go live support to clients and manage any issues including escalating to Microsoft for support.      Conduct 2 training sessions at Unify University every year.      Provide pre-sales support as required.      Write 2-3 D365 functional blogs articles per year on the Unify Dots blog.      Qualifications              Bachelors Degree      Fluent English language communication skills      At least 7 years of work experience in doing Project Management work on ERP projects      At least

column2: Looking for challenging roleIf you really want to make a difference - make it with us           Meeting the need for smart mobility solutions.      We re making the lives of people who travel easier and more enjoyable while constantly developing new, intelligent mobility solutions.           Your new role - challenging and future-oriented        As System Manager / Technical Architect, you will be responsible for following:           Objectives           The objective of the system manager in project (SMiP) is to define the system requirements and establish a system concept which is optimum for complete Projects covering different Subsystem also namely Interlocking, Train Control, Train Supervision and Traffic Management. Consistent system management is to be ensured throughout the entire project execution phase to minimize the technical risks of complex projects.      System Manager role involves an integrative technical management task regarding all involved departments / regions. The SMiP is a project core team role.             Work assignments:           You will take the overall technical responsibility for the mass roll-outs for project based on ETCS L2 technology at its heart, as part of large-scale customer projects within time, budget and quality framework: Carrying the responsibility for the Project architecture, application scope, both technical and commercial.                   Planning and Controlling:               For overall projects derivation of the comprehensive project objectives from the Contract, Customer, Project Management and provided documents. Preparation of the project planning and delivery of project documents.               Application implementation:               Coordination of the complex application implementation with international partners. Ensuring that the application goals defined with the technical management, project management and all project participants are achieved.                       Exploration of further business opportunities:               Identification and exploitation of additional business opportunities during project implementation, e.g. identifying Change Requests or extending the scope towards generic application work packages.                       Leadership:               Technical leadership of the overall system having ETCS L2, Interlocking, Train Supervision and Traffic Management, Project including resource planning and coordination with the organizational units involved. Managing following setup:           -               Design, Interface, Scope and Engineering Input clarification with customer and partners.           -               Interfacing/Clarification with all Project teams for Architecture, Engineering         and alignment with independent safety assessor           -               Evaluation of customer and internal requirements towards establishing suitable project specific solution and requirements engineering/compliance           -               Have performed hands on design engineering activities for System Design, Architecture, Technical leadership, Engineering for wayside and onboard ETCS, Evaluation of operational scenarios, requirements, and interfaces.         Understanding of other subsystem like Interlocking, ATS, Communication and Diagnostic Systems           -               Knowledge on Test Management, Validation and RAMS               -               Supporting installation and tests activities/teams onsite           -               Knowledge of Projects Support functions (RM/DM/CM) and Quality Management           -               Knowledge of Project Management principles towards planning, scheduling and budget controlling.           This role for technical management involves focus on system activities with 80% efforts and also management of team/cost/schedule approximately 20% efforts.                     We don t need superheroes, just super minds                               Degree in electrical/electronics engineering or systems engineering preferably with railway specific specialization                         Extensive professional experience (10+ years) in railway transportation systems, ideally in the rail systems business.                           It would carry additional weightage if you at least have           5+ years of dedicated experience on system management/leading technical project teams with experience on all of these - Interlocking, Train Control and Train Supervision.                         5+ years SW/HW engineering in either IxL, Train Control or ATS/TMS                         Experience with CBTC, ETCS L1 also acceptable, if candidate shows strong technical and managerial skills (alternatively for ETCS L2 experience).         Extensive technical knowledge on operation scenario, national values, terminology and packets/telegrams,      ETCS Subsets and UNISIG baseline 2/3.                         Extensive knowledge on ETCS L1/L2/L3 Hybrid operation scenario, national values, terminology and packets/telegram.                         Willingness for ~5% business travel (Europe, potentially to Egypt).                         Project executions covering activities like customer interfacing, scope clarification, Design/Engineering planning and resource allocation                         Knowledge of project management principles for project realization and execution                         Fluent English essential both written and oral.                         Independent and structured approach to work                         Team leadership and mediation skills between teams         This role is based in Pune. You ll also get to visit other locations in India and beyond, so you ll need to go where this journey takes you. In return, you ll get the chance to work with teams impacting entire cities, countries - and the shape of things to come.

column2: Our Mission: Powering Innovation That Drives Human Advancement?   When visionary companies need to know how their world-changing ideas will perform, they close the gap between design and reality with Ansys simulation. For more than 50 years, Ansys software has enabled innovators across industries to push boundaries by using the predictive power of simulation. From sustainable transportation to advanced semiconductors, from satellite systems to life-saving medical devices, the next great leaps in human advancement will be powered by Ansys.? Innovate With Ansys, Power Your Career.?? Summary / Role Purpose Join the Ansys Customer Excellence team to partner with our customers to engineer what's ahead, solve their real-world engineering problems, deploy Ansys software and solutions in their design workflows, and grow Ansys business. The Project Manager leads the scoping and planning of key projects and successfully executes them against the established commitments.?Serves as the central focal point of contact, and coordinates and manages internal and external communication of cross-functional teams across all levels of ANSYS and customer management.?Provides the central collaboration point between Customer, Account Management and Services Delivery. As part of the Project Management Office (PMO) team, the Project Manager will also manage and report on medium to low complexity projects. Key Duties and Responsibilities Guide Services engagements to successful outcomes using Project Management experience, planning and negotiation skills and industry knowledge. Facilitate the definition of project scope, goal, requirements, and deliverables. Define project tasks and resource requirements. Develop and manage project level initiatives and coordinate project plans. Participate and support a lead Project Manager in medium/complex programs (I.e. status updates, meeting minutes, financial tracking etc.) Responsible for leading small/medium projects from inception through closure (typically managed by third party Service Partners) Establish self as a trusted advisor to multiple customers; understand their key business initiatives, product design needs and engineering design workflows. Manage and track project resource allocations, timelines, and deliverables across multiple interconnected workstreams. Identify and manage project risk, escalate, and interact with ANSYS and customer management for status and issue resolution. Work under the direction of Ansys Services Management and within multi-disciplinary teams. Participate on development of PMO Standards and Processes Minimum Education/Certification Requirements and Experience Bachelors degree or master?? degree in engineering and/or business or related field. Required minimum years of professional experience in an engineering software environment: BE/BTECH +3, ME/MTECH +2 Experience working in engineering / product development environment. Proven experience in project management with multiple workstreams Proven stakeholder management skills Strong interpersonal and communication skills, with the ability to lead status presentations to customers, fluent in writing and speaking English. Strong organizational and time management skills, possesses a sense of urgency. Projects a professional image and demonstrates business acumen, driven= to succeed. Strong leadership and mentoring skills Competency in Microsoft applications including Word, Excel, and Outlook. Ability to travel domestically up to 10% of time Ability to work in different time zones with other geographies (North America, Europe). Preferred Qualifications and Skills 1-3 years of experience in Project Management with an enterprise software and technology deployment focus Demonstrated use of relevant Ansys software or knowledge of other commercial CAE, CAD, EDA, PLM software packages Experience with both Waterfall and Agile Project Management methodologies. Ability to interact effectively with customers senior business managers. Project Management certifications like PMP, Prince2 Practitioner, CSM or PSM. At Ansys, we know that changing the world takes vision, skill, and each other. We fuel new ideas, build relationships, and help each other realize our greatest potential. We are ONE Ansys. We operate on three key components: the commitments to our stakeholders, the behaviors of how we work together, and the actions of how we deliver results.  Together as ONE Ansys, we are powering innovation that drives human advancement.? Our Commitments:? Amaze with innovative products and solutions Make our?customers incredibly successful Act with integrity Ensure employees thrive and shareholders prosper Our Values:? Adaptability: Be open, welcome what's next Courage: Be courageous, move forward passionately Generosity: Be generous, share, listen, serve Authenticity: Be you, make us stronger Our Actions:? We commit to audacious goals We work seamlessly as a team We demonstrate mastery We deliver outstanding results INCLUSION IS AT OUR CORE? We believe diverse thinking leads to better outcomes. We are committed to creating and nurturing a workplace that fuels this by welcoming people, no matter their background, identity, or experience, to a workplace where they are valued and where diversity, inclusion, equity, and belonging thrive.? WELCOME WHAT?? NEXT IN YOUR CAREER AT ANSYS? At Ansys, you will find yourself among the sharpest minds and most visionary leaders across the globe. Collectively we strive to change the world with innovative technology and transformational solutions. With a prestigious reputation in working with well-known, world-class companies, standards at Ansys are high ??met by those willing to rise to the occasion and meet those challenges head on. Our team is passionate about pushing the limits of world-class simulation technology, empowering our customers to turn their design concepts into successful, innovative products faster and at a lower cost.? At Ansys, it?? about the learning, the discovery, and the collaboration. It?? about the ??hat?? next??as much as the ??ission accomplished.??And it?? about the melding of disciplined intellect with strategic direction and results that have, can, and do impact real people in real ways. All this is forged within a working environment built on respect, autonomy, and ethics.?   CREATING A PLACE WE??E PROUD TO BE   Ansys is an S&P 500 company and a member of the NASDAQ-100. We are proud to have been recognized for the following more recent awards, although our list goes on: Newsweek?? Most Loved Workplace globally and in the U.S., Gold Stevie Award Winner, America?? Most Responsible Companies, Fast Company World Changing Ideas, Great Place to Work Certified (Belgium, China, Greece, France, India, Japan, Korea, Spain, Sweden, Taiwan, and U.K.).? For more information, please visit us at www.ansys.com?   Ansys is an Equal Opportunity Employer. All qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to race, color, religion, sex, sexual orientation, gender identity, national origin, disability, veteran status, and other protected characteristics.?   Ansys does not accept unsolicited referrals for vacancies, and any unsolicited referral will become the property of Ansys. Upon hire, no fee will be owed to the agency, person, or entity.?

column2: The Project Manager for O&M is responsible for ensuring all the post- installation deliverables including operation and maintenance of the solar system and equipment, annual maintenance by the vendors, end user follow-up, and make sure solutions provided are functioning well.         ?       Key responsibilities for the position:       The Project Manager for O&M will primarily implement O&M plans across the geographies specifically, North East India, Odisha and Karnataka and the main roles and responsibilities are:       Primarily learn trouble shooting for solar systems as well as processing and value adding machines.         Providing meaningful direction and necessary support to the internal and stakeholder team for execution of O&M.         Building a complete understanding of the livelihood sectors and interventions and mapping nodal points of required O&M to ensure successful post implementation and utilization of solar powered livelihood solutions.         Coordinating of all post-installation operations and maintenance for the solar system and equipment installed at the intervention sites across different geographic locations.         Monitoring the performance of the vendors selected for the work regularly and providing constructive feedback accordingly.         Assisting the vendor/organization to develop good practices to resolve the solar system/ equipment issues without delay.         Personally visiting the non-functional livelihood sites if the problem persists and service performance by the vendor is usually poor.         Who can apply:         Minimum 5 to 7 years of work experience in end user service, supporting management and leadership; work experience in relevant sectors is preferred.         BE/Diploma in Electrical and Electronics is preferred         Understanding of the local communities, exposure to project implementation in resource poor settings         Demonstrating proactive approaches to problem-solving with strong decision-making capability and ability to work in an interdisciplinary and multicultural environment.         Strong communication skills, both written and oral.         Willingness to learn, grow and develop at personal and professional front, at a rapid pace with a steep learning curve.         Willingness to travel extensively in difficult terrains within and outside the State as and when required

column2: Lead as Brake System Project Engineering Manager with team of engineers reporting functionally in India and in other sites.     Be the engineering point of contact for customer from business award till commissioning phase     Support system level issues during warranty phase         Main responsibilities:         Ensure correct handover of brake system contractual technical specifications from tendering team after business award.     Ensure that all technical requirements and demands by the Customer are fulfilled deliverables in the scope of Engineering.     Ensure Technical risks are identified and covered throughout the project.     To manage, control and report all non-recurring costs pertaining to engineering deliverables.     Be single point of contact to customer for Engineering for specific project on Brake system.     Prepare and discuss with the customer, about technical proposal in line with the Division strategy.     Manage the engineering project plan, with focus on implementation, integration, verification and homologation. It shall cover all the products involved in the project, including software.     Approve all changes to engineering budget, schedule, requirements and deliverables.     Ensure system and product design reviews at specific project gates     Manage customer gate reviews, ensuring a proper preparation by the project team and a positive achievement of the milestone.     Ensure that Verification & Validation is properly planned, performed and documented     Ensure that that the delivered product, as the sum of all sub-functions and subsystems, performs as requested to fulfil the Customer contract, the internal Faiveley requirements and the safety requirements.     Manage within the project team the brake system commissioning, ensuring the respect and the management of all homologation and certification requirements.     Support to customer technical queries and product issues until the end of warranty phase       People Management: Yes; Indirect people management in a project organisation, multi-site; Number of people : Varies depending on the Project scope     Budget Management: Yes; Project Budget management       Candidate Profile         Education/Training:    Bachelor or Masters in Mechanical Engineering or equivalent domain       Professional Experience:         Minimum 6 - 8 years of relevant experience on brake systems & control, from Automotive / Rolling stock / Brake system manufacturer     Knowledge of standards, application and customer requirements on automotive or rolling stock for braking system     Knowledge on Brake Control Electronics and Software is an advantage     Minimum 3 years of experience of leading a team in projects     Strong communication skills     High customer focus     Mindset to work in global environment with interaction with counterparts across other sites in Europe.         Key Competences (Transversal/Professional)         Competence & Level (1 to 5, 1 - low, 5- high)       Relevant experience on Braking system in railway / automotive industry : 3 to 4     Communication skills : 4 to 5     Experience of leading people in project organisation with people in different sites in a global environment : 3 to 4           Languages       English - fully proficient

column2: What you will do at Vymo You should be comfortable with managing remote project delivery teams, troubleshooting project implementation issues, and removing barriers to project success. If you meet these qualifications, exude passion, and enjoy the challenges of deploying highly technical and innovative projects at a massive scale, this job is for you A Day in Your Life  Leading Vymo onboarding and customer journeys for clients with agility, predictability being the face of Vymo  Run Launch implementations for new/existing customers of Vymo end to end (discovery  planning  delivery  launch management)  Opportunity to manage Senior business and IT client relationships  Work in cross-functional environment internally with Product, solution, Customer success/sales, engineering teams to set right expectations with customers and deliver predictably, in an agile manner, and with quality  Buddy / Mentor / Manager (based on seniority) to other Project Managers to help them onboard and perform within the organization  Opportunity to work on improving processes, building best practices, and building teams  Fast growth along with the high-growth SaaS Organization What you would have done  Excellent customer communication (written and verbal) and problem-solving skills (solve the issue and get things done attitude)  High sense of ownership and customer obsession  Considerable experience managing product implementations in US (SaaS, BFSI experience added advantage) and collaborating between US Leadership , India Engineering Team, and Customers. column2: Project Role : Program/Project Management Lead Project Role Description : Lead business and technology outcomes for assigned program, project, or contracted service. Leverage standard tools, methodologies and processes to deliver, monitor, and control service level agreements.  Must have skills : Program Project Management Good to have skills : NA Minimum  7.5  year(s) of experience is required Educational Qualification : As per Organization Standards Summary :The SAP - IBP is a demand planning project in MSC space. We need to have a Senior Level Project Manager who has expertise in SAP integration projects. We are looking for candidate having more than 15 years of experience and preferably in Planning space. Looking for a Senior Project Manager with experience in SAP - ERP space.  Ensures that all requirements are agreed and documented and are managed effectively through the full project lifecycle. Engages with stakeholders to identify and analyze potential risk scenarios, plan risk responses and mitigating actions, and monitor/control risks for the project. Identifies appropriate responsible owner(s) for each risk. Keeps sponsors and other key stakeholders informed of risk status. Identifies and implements project quality requirements, standards, measures, and processes. Ensures mandatory reviews and audits are conducted on schedule and according to procedure, and initiates reviews or solicits outside opinions when project deliverables or parameters have a risk of being compromised. Implements resultant recommendations to address shortcomings. Creates a motivated high-performing team through team building, information sharing, workload management, and appropriate recognition. Delegates meaningful tasks to team members and coaches them so that they develop or enhance their skills. Balances execution efficiency with risk mitigation and value delivery. Exercises good judgment regarding when and how to escalate issues. Plan for and acquire resources (Shell and/or third party, with preference given to low-cost locations), materials and services to ensure success of the project, using standard Shell processes and tools (e.g. Resource Management). Monitors the performance of resources or services and adjusts the resource plan and procurement approach as project needs change. Establishes and maintains appropriate Governance structures and procedures to obtain resources, drive decisions, resolve issues, and deliver project/programme objectives. Monitors the governance and acts when required to address ineffective stakeholder representation, improve timeliness or quality of decisions, or broker consensus or compromise among conflicting stakeholders. Partners with the Business Interface to identify, measure, and track planned vs. achieved benefits. Assigns responsibility and accountability for the realization of benefits to ensure that the benefits can be sustained. Understands, articulates and applies the terminology, metrics, and calculations relevant to business specific measures and KPIs, such as return on investment (ROI), stakeholder value, benefits realization and capability improvement. Leads Shell IT's largest and most complex projects and programmes with a focus on value and strategic outcomes. Identifies, assesses and addresses the major factors, assumptions and risks (including technical, business, adoption, organizational, government, cultural, etc.) that may influence project/programme direction and success. As parameters and external influences change, adjusts the project/programme approach to improve the delivery of intended benefits. Leverages the programme to offer staff development and to grow both individual and collective project and programme management capability. Uses creative costing and business models to capitalize on greater lever age power (e.g. award or penalty contracts instead of standard execution measurement contracts). Prioritizes and adjusts resources, activities, and schedules across projects and programme to balance risk and effort between strategic business change and ongoing operations. Optimizes resource allocation based on organizational priorities, capacity, skills, and development needs, exploiting. the Resource Management tool and taking advantage of cross-business sharing wherever possible. Assesses changes in risk and scope throughout the project to reduce contingency (both cost and schedule) and predict Latest Estimate. Coaches individuals and groups on advanced project and programme management principles and techniques, particularly entrepreneurial skills such as estimating, risk management, stakeholder partnership, decision making, and team leadership. Champions the development of long-term Project and Programme Management capability within Shell through bringing external perspectives, identifying and promoting best practices and contributing to community building.Proficiency Levels Training Curriculum Qualification As per Organization Standards

Human Capital Management (Core HR, Benefits, Payroll, Compensation, Recruiting, Absence Management)         Cloud ERP Financials (GL, AP, AR, FA, CM)         Supply Chain Management (Procure to Pay, Order to Cash)         Should have managed at least 3 full cycle implementations in the Oracle space. column2: The Lead NPD Project Manager works independently on the projects and determines the technical solutions to meet the needs. The final designs are validated through design reviews in collaboration with the technical experts (Controlled Title Holder - CTH) and the members of the project team (product manager, R&D manager, purchasing manager, etc...). We works in relationships with many of the companys department in order to take as far as possible into account the needs of these services and ensure the success of the new product.         ?       As a Lead NPD Project Manager, you will be responsible for         Analyzing and validate needs with product managers and understand the requirements for the new product to be developed.     Evaluating the needs (material, resources, prototype, etc.) required to carry out the project     Analyzing and measure risks that may occur during completion.     Establishing project structures and operating rules (methods, piloting tools, etc.).     Establishing project execution planning in collaboration with all project stakeholders (engineering, purchasing, methods, Configuration management, etc...)     Managing the project in accordance with the processes and procedures     Ensuring that projects are carried out in time, cost and in compliance with the initial requirements validated with the product managers.     Managing the local NPD engineers team.     Pilot and coordinate matrix execution teams from Engineering, Production, Procurement/Supply, Management configuration, ValvStream.     Conducting regular reviews with internal interlocutors to monitor performance during implementation, with associated indicators and implement corrective actions, if necessary.     Be the preferred contact of the Product Manager (USA) and communicate (reporting) the progress of the project towards the business leaders (USA)     Using feedback and good practices to promote continuous improvement within the NPD Group             To be successful in this role you will:         Have a Bachelors Degree or Masters in Mechanical from an accredited University or College     strong experience of 8-12 years in Mechanical stream     Have strong experience in Project Management ( NPD experience preferred)     Responsible for driving Valve for NPD (New Product Development)     PMP certification will be a plus     MS office suite, ERP (SAP Ideally) and planning tools (MS Project) knowledge     Have a good team spirit     Interest for innovation and technology               Work in a way that works for you         We recognize that everyone is different and that the way in which people want to work and deliver at their best is different for everyone too. In this role, we can offer the following flexible working patterns:       Working flexible hours - flexing the times when you work in the day to help you fit everything in and work when you are the most productive     Working remotely             Join us, and you can expect:         Contemporary work-life balance policies and wellbeing activities     Comprehensive private medical care options     Safety net of life insurance and disability programs     Tailored financial programs     Additional elected or voluntary benefits

Responsible for forecasting and control of the project budget (revenue and costs) to ensure the entire program realizes the expected financial & business benefits (eg, revenue, cost savings etc).     Facilitates requirements gathering sessions with key stakeholders and project teams as needed.     Provides a monthly (at minimum) assigned project review that reports of all scope, schedules, budget, and quality metrics as per the established P&G framework.     Identifies and helps remove project roadblocks. Has good knowledge and understanding of the appropriate escalation path. Escalates to a program manager or Director, Planning and Governance as needed.     Understands Business Unit requirements and ensure that program time logging and capitalizing requirements are met.     Provides performance feedback about project team members to resource managers as needed.     Understands and supports the framework to ensure projects and programs are prioritized and aligned to the FCC strategic roadmap and yield the desired results. Educating stakeholders on the business value score of their programs.     Ensure projects are closed upon completion (resources released, team celebrations and rewards are requested, lessons learned are conducted, and final status update is produced, etc) Understand the closing process and recognition/rewards available to teams.     Helps in determining the optimal resourcing mix required to best achieve project operational and financial goals.             Financial Industry Domain Expertise             Leverage domain expertise in the banking and financial industry to understand industry-specific challenges, opportunities, and regulatory requirements, ensuring alignment with industry standards and best practices on our new offerings.             Business Analytics & Market Validation Expertise             Utilize strong analytical skills to interpret data and trends, providing actionable insights to drive business decisions. If situation demands, lead market validation efforts, including conducting market research, analyzing market trends, and identifying opportunities for new offerings.             Subject Matter Knowledge and Risk Management         Demonstrates and applies a strong working knowledge of the major technologies that support project management including, but not limited to, Workflow tools (Gemini, JIRA, Smartsheet), and back-office ERP systems (SAP).     Demonstrates and maintains a high level of compliance and industry knowledge, including the trends that affect the financial services and insurance industries, our customers and Wolters Kluwer.     Interact with other Wolters Kluwer departments customers, alliance partners, and industry associations as needed to facilitate development and to manage risks for programs.             Other Duties         Possesses in-depth knowledge and understanding of the FCC products, services, processes, and technology supported across CIOx, and can recommend enhancements, solutions, or innovations. Proven ability to apply knowledge and understanding through coaching, mentoring, and/or training.     Implements efforts required to successfully implement corporate strategies and ensure Program Managers effectively implement process improvements and participates in creating interdepartmental OpEx initiatives.     Performs other duties as assigned by the director or executive management.               Job Qualifications         ?     bachelors degree in business or technical field (such as Computer Science, Management Information Systems, Business Management, Marketing, or related discipline). Masters degree or equivalent preferred.         ?       Experience:         6-9 years experience managing multiple, large-scale, complex, cross-functional projects/programs such as software product development, product/service implementation or marketing. Experience in financial compliance, documents, and transaction processing, risk management as well as Wolters Kluwer products is highly desired         Required Skills:           ?       Customer Focus         Excellent customer focus dedicated to meeting the expectations and requirements of internal and external customers, acts with customers in mind, and establishes and maintains effective working relationships with customers.         Project Management         Proven knowledge of Project/Program Management principles/methodologies (eg, waterfall and Agile) and the ability to coach and mentor less experienced program/project managers.     Proven process management skills skilled at figuring out the processes necessary to get things done, knows how to organize people and activities, knows how to separate and combine tasks into efficient workflow. Can recommend enhancements and present findings to executive stakeholders.     Proven planning skills can work with cross-functional project teams to accurately scope out length and difficulty of milestones, break work down into tasks, develop schedules for multiple, inter-connected and non-related projects and teams, anticipate and adjust for problems and roadblocks, measure performance against goals across the program, and evaluate results.         Communication         Embrace and lead change.     Demonstrates ability to effectively cope with change and shift gears comfortably.; help their teams and executive stakeholders move efficiently through the change curve.     Excellent communication skills (verbal, written, and interpersonal) with team members, stakeholders, and customers effective in a variety of informal and formal settings. Able to clearly articulate complex concepts.     Excellent decision-making skills can make quality decisions in a timely manner.     Excellent conflict resolution skills.     Demonstrates ability to thrive in a fast-paced, self-managing, team-based, dynamic environment.             Technical Understanding         Research functional and technical knowledge and programs needed to support the program.             Language         Proficiency in English required.             Other Knowledge, Skills, Abilities or Certifications:          Strong preference for a candidate with professional certification (PgMP, CMP or A-CSM) and active participation in professional societies such as a PMI chapter or desire to achieve certification(s) or equivalent experience.     Proficiency in a second language is a plus.     Excel in using Microsoft 365 (Word, Excel, PowerPoint, Teams, SharePoint, PowerBI) and Adobe Acrobat to create effective project projections/forecasts and communications for executive stakeholders.

column2: Overview -  The Deployment Project Manager provides leadership for the implementation and deployment of PowerSchool systems software. This role has the overall responsibility for delivering and supporting the implementation of multiple projects, with subprojects of varying scope and size to school districts. This customer-facing position manages various functions in delivery of software and service solutions to ensure accurate and timely completion with high customer satisfaction. This position is involved with implementation assignments, consultation and related deliverables while ensuring high quality and high customer satisfaction throughout the implementation effort. Duties and responsibilities of this position are divided into the separate functions of Application Specialist and Unified Deployment Specialist.  Description -   Application Specialist Service Delivery ??Completes implementation and training project work, on-time, within scope and meeting customers' expectations. Product Knowledge ??evelops knowledge and maintains continual understanding of designated applications and client business processes. Acts as a subject matter expert for designated area. Training Session Execution ??Able to deliver effective training to varied audiences, through webinars and on-site sessions. Consulting Skills -Responsible for determining client needs and making appropriate recommendations for current and future value-added services, products, etc. Assist with district/school configuration, process mapping, district data migration, reconciliation of customer satisfaction issues, clarification of customer requirements and stats/steering meetings. Communication - Liaises with clients either on-site, by phone or email. Sets project and software expectations and provides status updates regarding project work. Responds to feedback, resolving any issues in a manner that satisfies the customer while meeting business objectives. Project Management - Able to embrace Project Management methodologies (planning, time management, communications, etc.) to deliver these services. Peer Training -Empowering clients, teammates and others within our company by imparting applications knowledge and documentation. Process & Best Practices Knowledge - Ability to recommend and adherence to best practices and process optimization. Status Reporting - Keeping the necessary parties up to date on the status of your project/engagements and escalating as appropriate Unified Deployment Specialist Leadership - Drives and facilitates decision-making and consensus among key stakeholders (program and technical) at the local district. Serves as project team lead, guiding the work of internal and client teams while ensuring responsiveness to customer needs. Is accountable for overall performance and delivery of defined services scope of work. Develops relationships and works with key district and school stakeholders (e.g., program and technical leadership staff) to identify and articulate project goals and objectives; ensures all tasks and decisions align to goals and objectives. Applies project management methodology to all projects, including setting expectations and managing to scope. Capacity Planning -Schedules service projects; evaluates and balances capacity and maximizes utilization. Effectively allocates and manages project resources across all areas to create a successful unified deployment of individual products Communication ??Communicates project status and/or changes to project plans to the organization. Liaises with clients; Sets expectations and provides status updates regarding project work. Leads scheduled meetings. Coordinates process mapping, data migration. Acts as escalation point for reconciliation of customer satisfaction issues. Acts as liaison on customer?? behalf to internal business units (e.g., sales, business operations, implementation, product education, technical support). Communicates with stakeholders in an effective, professional manner throughout the duration of the implementation effort. Product Knowledge ??develops knowledge and maintains understanding of PowerSchool applications, client business processes and how they are built out in a unified deployment. Project Management - Creates and maintains project plans for designated areas. Maintains all project documentation including accurate records of individual implementation project deliverables/work products, status and issues. Uses industry standard project management methodologies to track progress, manage risk and coordinate resources. Strategy - Assists in the development and management of the processes and procedures associated with project deliverables. Provides direction for and coordinates efforts of all cross-functional project team members. Collaborates with Sales Team to actively identify additional products and services with existing customers; manages change control process as necessary. Understands and supports internal and partner vendor implementations, involving services. Status Reporting - Keeping the necessary parties up to date on the status of your project/engagements and escalating as appropriate.??ll other duties as assigned. Requirements -   Student Specific: Bachelor?? degree in Business, Education or related field or equivalent experience ERP Specific: Bachelor?? degree in Accounting, Computer Science, or Business 3+ years??project management or project coordinator experienceExperience working in K-12 large-scale, district technology implementations Student Specific: Familiarity with District, School, and Student data, including an understanding of relationships between types of data for areas including: students, courses, schedules, schedules, grade scales, terms, report cards, transcripts, state reporting data, standards, grade books. ERP Specific: Familiarity with accounting, payroll, or business practices, including an understanding of relational databases, and experience with SQL. Strong Microsoft Excel knowledge and use of working with data sets, reports and charts and budget information. Ability to do VLOOKUP?? and utilize excel functions. Experience writing reports using Crystal, Cognos, or similar reporting tool a plus. Subject matter expertise in at least one of PowerSchool?? current software solutions. MS Project or SmartSheets working knowledge Strong organizational skills Strong communication skills: written, verbal, and personally able to quickly build and maintain rapport with others Demonstrated ability to manage multiple projects, priorities and adapt to continual change in a fast-paced environment Must be proactive, action-oriented, and motivating Ability to drive consensus, facilitate solutions, and build options/alternatives PMP and/or CSM certification, preferred

column2: As a Project Manager at ELB Learning - Learning Experiences, you will play a pivotal role in overseeing the successful execution of learning projects for our clients. You will be responsible for engaging with our worldwide clients to ensure a delightful experience from project start to end. Managing project timelines, budgets, resources, and stakeholder communications to ensure the seamless delivery of learning solutions that exceed client expectations. The ideal candidate will demonstrate strong communication skills, leadership abilities, exceptional organizational skills, and a passion for driving meaningful and delightful end learning solutions. Role & responsibilities       Project planning and execution Collaborate with clients to define project objectives, scope, and deliverables. Develop comprehensive project plans, timelines, and budgets. Coordinate resources, including instructional designers, subject matter experts, and developers, to execute project tasks efficiently. Monitor project progress and mitigate risks to ensure timely delivery within budget constraints. Follow ELB Learnings proprietary project process and phases. Serve as the primary point of contact for clients, maintaining regular communication to provide updates on project status, address concerns, and gather feedback. Leverage lessons learned from past projects to inform best practices and drive continuous improvement initiatives within the organization. Strong understanding of instructional design principles and learning technologies. Excellent communication skills, with the ability to effectively engage with clients and internal stakeholders at all levels. Demonstrated leadership abilities, including the capacity to motivate and inspire team members to achieve project goals. Exceptional organizational skills and attention to detail, with the ability to manage multiple projects simultaneously. Proficiency in project management tools and software  Be responsive and available during normal and extended business hours to meet the needs of the assigned projects and clients. Interested candidates please share your profiles with shanmathi.mp@elblearning.com

The ideal candidate will possess a strong educational background in project management, business administration, or a related field, along with a proven track record of delivering successful programs/projects. column2: Planning and execution of API deployment on Finance Process solutions Primary Scope:  API Deployment Existing automated process New projects that require to be automated Experienced Program Manager with a strong background in Agile project management and expertise in technical deployment within the finance sector.  The individual will lead the planning, execution, and optimization of API deployment programs while leveraging Agile methodologies to drive efficiency, collaboration, and continuous improvement. Requires deep knowledge of financial systems, technology, and Agile practices, along with exceptional leadership and communication skills. Responsibilities: Program Planning and Strategy: Develop and execute a comprehensive strategy for API deployment in the finance domain, incorporating Agile principles and practices. Define program scope, goals, and objectives in collaboration with stakeholders, ensuring alignment with organizational priorities. Create and maintain program backlogs, release plans, and sprint schedules, prioritizing features and user stories based on business value and dependencies. Agile Project Management: Implement Agile frameworks such as Scrum or Kanban to facilitate iterative development, collaboration, and feedback. Lead Agile ceremonies, including sprint planning, daily stand-ups, sprint reviews, and retrospectives, fostering a culture of transparency and continuous improvement. Facilitate cross-functional teams in the estimation, breakdown, and prioritization of user stories, tasks, and deliverables. Monitor team velocity, identify bottlenecks, and implement strategies to optimize workflow and productivity. Stakeholder Engagement and Communication: Engage with key stakeholders across business units, IT, compliance, to gather requirements and align expectations. Provide regular updates on program progress, risks, and dependencies, maintaining open communication channels and managing stakeholder feedback effectively. Collaborate with product owners and business stakeholders to refine requirements, validate solutions, and ensure delivery of high-quality APIs that meet user needs. Risk Management and Compliance: Identify and mitigate risks related to API deployment, compliance, security, and regulatory requirements, working closely with compliance and legal teams. Ensure adherence to industry standards, best practices, and regulatory frameworks governing API integration in the finance sector. Implement security measures and controls to protect sensitive financial data transmitted through APIs, in alignment with organizational policies and standards. Performance Monitoring and Continuous Improvement: Define and track key performance indicators (KPIs) and metrics to measure the success of API deployment programs and Agile initiatives. Conduct regular retrospectives to reflect on team performance, identify areas for improvement, and implement actionable strategies for continuous learning and growth. Foster a culture of innovation, collaboration, and accountability within the program team, promoting knowledge sharing and cross-functional collaboration. Qualifications: Bachelor's degree in finance, computer science, business administration, or a related field. Master's degree preferred. Proven experience as a program manager or project manager in the finance industry, with a focus on API deployment and Agile methodologies. Strong understanding of financial systems, products, and processes, with expertise in API integration technologies and Agile frameworks. Certified Scrum Master (CSM) or equivalent Agile certifications preferred. Excellent leadership, communication, and facilitation skills, with the ability to lead cross-functional teams and drive consensus. Experience with Agile project management tools and software (e.g., Jira, AgileCraft, Rally). Familiarity with regulatory requirements and compliance frameworks relevant to API deployment in the finance sector. Shift - No shift premium (India).
column11: Project Management, Program Planning, API Deployment, Agile, API integration, Jira, Performance Monitoring

column2: Description - Job Title: Project Manager India Print Solutions Company & Team Overview: HPs vision is to create technology that makes life better for everyone, everywhere every person, every organization, and every community around the globe. With the heart, creativity, and energy of a startup, and the brain, muscles, and determination of a Fortune 100 corporation, we continue to deliver ground-breaking new technologies to build on our 80+ year legacy of innovation. As we look at the future, HP's expansion will increasingly hinge on high-growth countries, necessitating a tailored approach with local product and technology solutions. The mission of the India & Growing Market Business Unit team is to develop products and solutions geared towards fuelling rapid growth in India. Our team's overarching objective is to create solutions tailored specifically for India and in India! Position Overview | Reports to Product Management Leader As the Project Manager for India Print Solutions, you will be responsible for overseeing all aspects of project management related to the development and implementation of our printing app (Get My Print) and HP's Digital Print Learning Centre Program. You will collaborate with cross-functional teams to ensure that projects are completed on time, within budget, and to the highest quality standards. You will play a pivotal role in managing various initiatives within the programs to ensure its successful execution. This role offers an exciting opportunity to be at the forefront of print evolution & educational innovation and positively impact the learning experiences of children worldwide. Your leadership and strategic thinking will drive the successful delivery of printing solutions that meet the needs of our customers . Key Responsibilities 1. Project Planning and Execution: Develop comprehensive project plans supporting scope, goals, timelines, resources, and deliverables. Coordinate project activities and ensure adherence to timelines and budgets. 2. Team Leadership: Collaborate with a team of developers, designers, and other stakeholders, fostering a collaborative and high-performing work environment. Delegate tasks effectively and provide guidance and support as needed. 3. Stakeholder Communication: Serve as the primary point of contact for internal and external stakeholders, providing regular updates on project progress, addressing concerns, and managing expectations. 4. Risk Management: Identify potential risks and develop mitigation strategies to minimize project disruptions. Proactively address issues as they arise and escalate to senior management when necessary. 5. Ensure Quality Assurance: Implement processes to ensure the quality and functionality of the printing app, conducting thorough testing and reviews throughout the development lifecycle. 6. Continuous Improvement: Evaluate project performance and identify opportunities for process improvements and optimization. Implement best practices to enhance efficiency and effectiveness. 7. Documentation and Reporting: Maintain accurate project documentation, including project plans, status reports, and meeting minutes. Prepare and present regular progress reports to management and stakeholders. Qualifications: - Bachelor's degree in project management, business administration, education, or a related field. Master's degree preferred - Proven experience as a Project Manager, preferably in the print R&D, education sector, customer experience, or marketing team - Strong understanding of digital printing technologies, educational content development processes, and learning management systems - Excellent communication, negotiation, and interpersonal skills with the ability to effectively collaborate with diverse stakeholders - Ability to effectively manage multiple projects simultaneously in a fast-paced environment - Demonstrated leadership capabilities, including the ability to motivate and inspire cross-functional teams to achieve common goals. - Proficiency in project management tools and software (e.g., Microsoft Project, JIRA, Asana) and familiarity with agile methodologies is desirable. - PMP, PRINCE2, or other relevant project management certifications are a plus. Join our dynamic team and play a key role in revolutionizing the HP Indias printing industry with our innovative solutions. Apply now to be part of our exciting journey! Shift - No shift premium (India)
column11: project management, PMP, educational content development, learning management systems, Microsoft Project, negotiation, Project Manager, JIRA

column2: Business Case:                       India has one of the most complex GTM calendars with a high share of business coming from local production that is driven by a shorter development timeline compared to global     ,     and is supported by a very lean team set-up with no GTM lead.                         MOPS India has 2 FTEs currently vs 8 in EMC, 4 in SA, 3 in ISR Turkey                         This role will be pivotal in driving the Key Projects on GTM Local production creation for Adidas India that entails the responsibility to manage the local development calendar alignment with the global creation and EM GTM timelines influencing a range of 4000+ articles/year as we'll as will be responsible for streamlining the local production creation process for global availability digital sell-in readiness                         Local production is a key priority for the market and will influence more than 50% of the 300Mn India NS in 2024                       Objective of the STA:                         ?           Support in coordinating multiple initiatives aimed at enhancing our Go-To-Market (GTM) process. Assist in integrating local and global creation efforts, and collaborate on integrating systems and tools to enhance readiness for sales. This role provides an opportunity to learn and grow within a dynamic team environment while contributing to the improvement of our operational efficiency                           ?             Key Skills required:                     Ability to understanding and learn processes.                     Organized, structured working.                     Clear Communication skills.                     Learning Opportunity:                     Further develop leadership skills to lead the business. column2: Job Profile: We are seeking an experienced, proactive, and enthusiastic team player with a can-do attitude, passionate about delivering quality products to customers. The Amagi Project Manager will oversee the delivery of assigned projects on schedule, within budget, and meeting client expectations. Projects encompass a range of products from Planner, Playout, to Server-Side Ad Insertion for monetization. The Project Manager is responsible for ensuring a positive customer experience and team collaboration throughout the project lifecycle. Responsibilities: Develop top-down, structured Project Plans. Create high-level plans with key project stages and milestones. Define a structured organization for project delivery. Identify resource requirements and necessary skills for each project. Monitor project progress to ensure timely completion and within budget. Manage customer expectations and project scope, driving acceptance within documented boundaries. Handle customer escalations and drive successful resolutions among stakeholders. Prepare status reports for internal and external stakeholders on an agreed-upon schedule. Establish and manage processes for configuration, Change Control, Risk & Issues Management, Documentation Management, and Product Assurance. Write specification documents and workflows. Foster a team culture within assigned projects. Manage multiple projects at various stages while ensuring consistently high levels of service delivery. Professional Qualifications: Excellent communication, customer management, and negotiation skills. Strong leadership abilities. University Degree in electrical or computer engineering or Equivalent experience. Extensive knowledge of project management principles. Project Management Professional or Prince 2 Practitioner accreditation. Knowledge of Broadcast, Digital, Linear, or SSAI technologies. Experience: 3-7 years or equivalent project management experience. Experience with Complex Solutions. Proven track record in team environments and real-time project delivery under time constraints. Strong project management skills and competency. Technical knowledge is an asset. This job description outlines the general nature and level of work involved and is not exhaustive. Amagi is an equal opportunity employer and makes employment decisions without regard to gender, marital status, race, religion, color, age, disability, sexual orientation, or protected veteran status.

column2: ?     The Trial Master File (TMF) Project Management Assistant at Lilly Capability Center India (LCCI) serves in a key role for the execution of TMF Operations processes and administration. Provides process support for TMF creation, maintenance, closure and archival. Provides support for TMF Operations to resolve any issues identified with the TMF activities. Works with Trial Master File (TMF) Project Management Associate, study teams and functions to help mitigate issues, identify impact to applicable internal processes and support process improvements.     ?Executes change management oversight to ensure consistent application of revised standards, processes, and systems functionality across study teams. The TMF Project Management Assistant will ensure the TMF for the clinical trial(s) are inspection ready through a complete, accurate and readily available in the Electronic Trial Master File (eTMF). Additional country specific responsibilities may be required as needed/appropriate for the local geography and/or to cover regional differences.     Primary Responsibilities: This job description is intended to provide a general overview of the job requirements at the time it was prepared. The job requirements of any position may change over time and may include additional responsibilities not specifically described in the job description. Consult with your supervision regarding your actual job responsibilities and any related duties that may be required for the position.         1. TMF Expertise     Serve as TMF subject matter expert.     Partner with internal colleagues to create metrics dashboard and reporting capabilities to demonstrate control of the TMF process.     Support internal audits and external inspections, as appropriate (e.g. a table of contents based on the trial-specific TMF Expected Document Lists (EDLs).     Assists TMF Project Managers by supporting study teams with TMF related remediation and process execution inquiries.     Assists TMF Project Managers in eTMF process related questions and answers. Provide support to ongoing and ad-hoc TMF projects and initiatives.     2. Project Management     Support execution of TMF Functional Checks for the trial throughout the life of the trial.     Provide support with TMF Operations administrative activities such as TMF open office hours, meetings agendas/minutes, etc.     3. Partnership     Collaborate and influence functional representatives and record owners to ensure TMF remains complete, current and correct.     Identify opportunities to share learning to the functions as appropriate.     Support integration of partnered or acquired clinical information including transfer of TMFs in compliance with applicable regulations and best practices.     Assist with eTMF configuration testing, as needed.     4. Clinical Trial Essential Document Responsibilities     Perform quality review of documents submitted for entry into the TMF and liaise with project teams to resolve any issues identified     Complete administrative tasks (e.g., status reports) as requested     Participates in study specific training as required.     Evaluate and tailor the expected documents (ED) to ensure proper tailoring has been assessed to make a trial specific TMF.     Evaluate the TMF records prior to finalization, as appropriate.     Communicate directly with functional areas for proper hands-off to occur during the start-up, maintenance, and close-out of the trial.     Identify, communicate, and resolve issues.     Ensure appropriate functional check oversight activities occur for all functional areas.     Ensure appropriate archiving of clinical trial documents to meet Lilly record retention policies and regulatory requirements.     Understand, comply, and reinforce local regulations and guidance, Lilly medical policies and procedures, and good clinical practices (GCP)     Ensure inspection readiness through a complete, accurate and readily available Trial Master File.     Perform quality review of documents submitted for entry into the TMF and liaise with project teams to resolve any issues identified.     Minimum Qualification Requirements:         1-2 years experience with clinical development processes     Bachelor s degree or equivalent in one of the disciplines related to clinical practice/health care, life sciences, or drug development is desirable     Experience in document administration     Knowledge of cGCP     High attention to detail     Excellent organizational skills     Strong written and verbal communication skills; and Proficiency with MS Office/Adobe Acrobat     Experience in working with electronic trial master files strongly preferred     Demonstrated critical thinking capabilities with forward looking perspective and comfort with ambiguity.         Other Information/Additional Preferences:         1-2 years TMF experience a plus     Experience working in clinical research / medical environment, including exposure to medical or regulatory records highly desired     Ability to learn and comply with regulatory requirements and internal policies     Effective communication, teamwork and problem-solving skills     Self-management and organizational skills

Previous experience as a software developer is highly preferred Experience in Cloud Technologies and understanding of databases and third-party APIs and services is highly preferred                    What will you do    (areas that will play to your strength and all the responsibilities we will trust you with):                Employs best practices for agile/scrum methodology adapted to teams needs          Motivates and supports team members and ensures they have the tools and knowledge to do their jobs and that all blocking issues are resolved quickly          Creates self-organizing agile teams and facilitates the delegation of tasks and responsibilities to appropriate team members          Acts as moderator for iteration planning, daily standups, iteration demos, and refactoring/reflection sessions          Communicates team status to all internal stakeholders and continuously refines/improves metrics by working with the team          Plans, coordinates, and manages the development of organizational initiatives while ensuring smooth operations to meet present and future business requirements
